product_name: Armani Code EDT 75ml
description: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. Armani Code was launched in 2004. Armani Code was created by Antoine Lie and Antoine Maisondieu. Top notes are bergamot and lemon; middle notes are star anise and olive blossom; base notes are leather and tobacco.

product_name: 1919 Dry Pink Gin 700ml
description: Distilled with raspberries and locally grown strawberries it is sure to be a winner on a hot summer day. Inspired by Gin and Bitters this dry pink gin has subtle spice notes before finishing with an elegant yet subtle berry finish. 41% ABV

product_name: 1919 Classic Gin 700ml
description: Named for the year that New Zealanders stood up for their rights and voted down prohibition, our Original Gin (41% ABV) is locally produced in our custom made still. Created using Otago cherries, Manuka Honey, organic lemons and oranges, plus botanicals including juniper, angelica root and cinnamon, this is a classic gin that celebrates old world charm, passion and charisma.

product_name: 1919 Pineapple Bitts Gin 700ml
description: This tropical gin is perfect for those sun soaked days and pairs well with lemon. Pineapple, the first release in 1919's Kiwiana collection is inspired by New Zealand confectionery, think candied pineapple with a hint of chocolate. Pairs well with lemon ABV 41%

product_name: 1800 Tequila Cristalino 700ml
description: An ultra-premium clear Añejo Tequila finished in port wine casks. 1800® Cristalino is a beautiful contradiction. It is aged in French and American oak barrels, married together, then rested in port wine casks. Finally, it is meticulously filtered to crystal clear clarity while retaining the depth and complexity of Añejo along with the silky smoothness of a Claro. Alcohol:  35%

product_name: 1800 Tequila Silver 700ml
1800 Tequila Anejo 700ml
description: The world's leading brand of premium tequila, a dark amber with copper highlights that spends 3 years in French oak. Rich in flavour, smooth, rounded with spicy agave taste. It has aromas of oak driven agave with caramel, vanilla and toasted coconut, and a pleasantly spicy finish.

product_name: Armani Acqua Di Gio Men Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: A fresh aromatic scent. Heady notes of bergamot, green tangerine and neroli toned with rosemary, jasmine, rock rose and the sensual note of patchouli.

product_name: Benefit Chachatint Cheek & Lip Stain
description: Benefit Cheek&Lip Liq Blush Chachatint

product_name: 1800 Tequila Coconut 700ml
Benefit Brow Grooming Tweezer + Brush
description: Keep strays away with our double-duty brow tool. The slanted tweezers are coated with diamond dust to firmly grasp & pluck even the finest hairs. Use the custom-blended bristle brush to (1) brush brows upward to see where you need to tweeze (2) expertly groom brows into place.

product_name: Benefit Boi-ing Industrial Strength Concealer
Yealands Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description: Yealands Estate Single Vineyard wines are the truest expression of our coastal location, showcasing our unique environment & diversity of flavours across this singularly incredible vineyard. Tasting Notes: Bouquet: The nose is highly expressive, with salty green bean, fresh herbs & citrus Palate: The palate is textured & elegant, with the distinctive mineral finish that our Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc is renowned for Suitable for vegetarians, vegans & a gluten free diet. Alcohol:  12.5%

product_name: Benefit Hoola Matte Bronzer - Hoola Light
description: Now the award-winning hoola matte bronzer is joined by a lighter shade...hoola lite! This finely milled matte bronzer is perfect for fair complexions or for use as an all-over finishing powder. The soft-matte texture blends smoothly and seamlessly for a healthy, believable glow 365 days a year.

product_name: Wonderful Pistachios Pepper & Garlic Pistachios 168g
Benefit Boing High Coverage Concealer 1
description: Benefit Boing High Coverage Concealer 1

product_name: Benefit The Porefessional Face Primer Value Size
description: The bestseller...just bigger! the POREfessional quickly minimizes the appearance of pesky imperfections for smoother-than-smooth skin that looks practically â€œporeless!â€ Apply this silky, lightweight balm alone, under or over makeup. The translucent formula contains a vitamin E derivative known to protect skin from free radicals.

product_name: Zoa Feijoa Vodka 700ml
description: New Zealand’s iconic fruit. A smooth and fruity vodka with a subtle sweetness and a tangy finish. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: 1800 Tequila Reposado 700ml
description: 1800 tequilas are made by Casa Cuervo from 100% blue agave. The name comes from the "historic event" of aging tequila in oak for the very first time. The line was first launched in 1975 as a premium sipping tequila. 1800 Reserva Reposado tequila is the first of the sipping tequilas launched by Cuervo and called the "original premium tequila." The tequila is aged for at least 6 months in French oak.

product_name: Zoa Kiwifruit Vodka 700ml
description: Crisp, fresh, and beautifully aromatic, a perfect expression of New Zealand’s iconic fruit. A smooth and fruity vodka with a subtle sweetness and a tangy finish. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: YSL Loveshine Candy Glaze
description: Shine of a gloss, care of a balm. High colour & glossy shine double care™ balm. 8 hour nourish & restore with 78% caring ingredients including pomegranate extract, cold pressed mango oil, vitamin E and hyaluronic acid.

product_name: YSL Couture Mini Clutch
description: With the five nude palettes inspired by the dusky pinks of the Marrakech kasbah, the spice colours of the souks and the soothing tones of the designer’s Paris atelier, express yourself with a bold edge. There’s a palette that suits everyone, and every occasion, making each compact the ultimate in versatility.

product_name: YSL The Inks Vinyl Cream High Shine Lip Stain
description: A mirror shine staining color lacquer. Up to 24h moisturizing feel with a 90% care charged formula. Cream-like texture melts over your lips without stickiness. Powered by water-locker tuberose extract and prickly pear from our Ourika Community Garden. BENEFITS:  Instant Hydration, 24h comfort. FINISH & EFFECT:  Vinyl Shine and vibrant color payoff in one stroke. Visibly fuller & bouncier lips.

product_name: YSL All Hours Liquid Foundation LC2 Duo
description: This travel exclusive set contains:  a pair of All Hours Foundation LC2. Complexion perfection you can rely on all day, all night, ALL HOURS. An upgraded breathable formula providing 24h* full coverage and weightless feel. Experience an ultra-sensorial skin on skin sensation with a seamless cover action, as if you had a flawless naked skin. The new formula is infused with Hyaluronic acid. It provides all day hydration feel and day after day skin caring benefits, even after removal. Proven: skin feels softer, smoother, hydrated, after only 2 weeks*. For ALL HOURS renovation, YSL developed our first Skin-Fusing™ technology to mimic the composition of the skin for a total fusion. To achieve a triple proof: Transfer proof, Waterproof, and Sport proof. The complexion remains flawless and fresh, for a 24h* natural luminous matte makeup result. *Consumer test with 111 women.

product_name: YSL Pure Shots Airthin UV Defender 30ml
description: Pure Shots Airthin UV Defender Protects skin from UV, dust, smoke, pollution – even pm 2.5. An ultra lightweight, 8x thinner* & breathable technology, now proven to strenghten skin barrier. Our unique formula combines citrus peel extract from morocco with higher concentration of skin protecting 100% pure niacinamide. After two weeks skin looks more youthful and skintone looks visibly improved. *Evaluation by 15 experts vs Blanc Pur Couture UV Protection.

product_name: YSL Myslf 2-Piece Eau De Parfum Gift Set
description: This Holiday season, YSL Beauty invites you to break into an ice fantasy. Led by the light of an iconic YSL golden snowflake, discover the MYSLF gift set, containing a MYSLF full size 100ML with a 10ML travel case offered. This luxurious gift set box is made of 100% cardboard sourced from responsible sources (FSCTM mix). Reuse it or recycle it. BREAK THE ICE. CELEBRATE IN GOLD. Fragrance Notes: At first, a fresh & vibrant accord made of bergamot heart from Calabria and vert de bergamot. At heart, a raw & beating orange blossom absolute from Tunisia crafted for YSL beauty. At last, a sensual & textured woods accord made of Indonesian Patchouli heart and Ambrofix.

product_name: YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Tuxedo 75ml
description: A black ensemble, shiny satin and matt grain de poudre fabrics: the tuxedo is an icon. Reinvented by Mr Yves Saint Laurent, it reveals an insolent sensuality and draws the seemingly strict contours of an androgynous eroticism. An eternally bold look. TUXEDO reveals its refined sense in an architectural bottle, enlighted with a pure square silver trim and an ornamented jewel cap, mirror to the iconic tuxedo cloth: the “grain de poudre”. The matte texture of patchouli enlightened by the dark brightness of spices. A contemporary elegance twisted by a note of utter impertinence. Dry and smoked amber - fluid and shiny encence - sour berries. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Violet Leaf Accord Bergamot Oil Coriander Seeds Oil Heart Notes: Rose Oil Lily Of The Valley Accord Black Pepper Oil Base Notes: Ambergris Accord Patchouli Heart Vanilla Bourbon

product_name: YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Rouge Velours 75ml
description: THE OLFACTION A spectacular duet between a vividly natural red rose and a deep, velvety patchouli, ROUGE VELOURS allows men and women to express themselves at their most passionate. A COUTURE ICON From the sumptuous jet-embroidered bolero of the “Ballets Russes” collection, to today’s sharp-cut blazers worn on sexy bare skin, red velvet has always embodied Saint Laurent’s flair for audacity and transgression. LE VESTIAIRE DES PARFUMS A tribute to YVES SAINT LAURENT's style. Tuxedo, Trench, Blouse... each unisex fragrance interpreting a centerpiece of the emblematic Yves Saint Laurent wardrobe. A unique and luxury olfactory wardrobe to give the power to express identity and uniqueness where quintescence of style becomes fragrance. THE BOTTLE A fragrance enhanced by a jewel bottle with architectural and pure lines, with a couture ‘grain de poudre’ cap adorning a luxury solid glasswork. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: White Tea Accord - Pink Pepper Heart Notes: Rose - Jasmin - Orris Base Notes: Vetiver - Patchouli - Musks

product_name: YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Jumpsuit 75ml
description: In an echo to the house's vibrantly colored jumpsuits, the fragrance takes on a bright shade of carmine. The pink hue of magnolia petals in the sun. Bergamot picks up its citrusy brightness to enhance this intoxicating floral trail. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Bergamot - Petit Grain - Mandarin Heart Notes:Magnolia - Peony - Jasmine Base Notes: Sandalwood - Ambroxan - Peach Accord

product_name: Zoa Vodka 700ml
description: Gold medal and trophy NZ’s best vodka overall – NZ Spirits Awards. Smooth, pure and refreshingly clean, the very essence of New Zealand.  Made with Mount Taranaki spring mineral water, giving a rich and silky mouth feel.  Alcohol:  40%

product_name: YSL Pure Shots Light Up Serum 30ml
description: Is the city gloom making your skin look dull? Discover Light Up Serum, a brightening technology infused with the synergy of the optimal daily dose of illuminating Vitamin CG and protecting Marshmallow from Morocco.  After 1 Day: Skin looks brighter & transparent After 28 Days: Skintone is more even and dark spots are reduced.

product_name: WildCape UMF™ 20+ Manuka Honey 500g
description: WildCape is the only single source UMF™ Manuka honey harvested exclusively from the East Cape region of New Zealand. Widely regarded as producing the finest tasting Manuka honey in New Zealand, Manuka flowers in the East Cape region produce nectar naturally high in Dihydroxyacetone (DHA), a precursor to the compound Methylglyoxal (MGO). The result is Manuka honey with consistently higher UMF™ and a delicious, mild flavour. WildCape manages every aspect of the production supply chain, from our 15 fulltime beekeepers who care for the hives, to our specialist extraction and processing team who pack and label each jar by hand. WildCape UMF™ 20+ Manuka Honey contains at least 829 mg/kg of Methylglyoxal (MGO). Untouched. Unspoiled. Unlike anything else. Ingredients: Certified UMF™ 20+ New Zealand Manuka honey.  Usage: Enjoy straight from the spoon, or dissolved in hot (not boiling) water, tea or other beverages. Manuka honey is also widely used as a natural replacement for refined sugar. Add to smoothies, yogurt, whole grain toast, or oatmeal. Features & Benefits: Direct from the beekeeper. Single source. Raw. Unpasteurised. 100% traceable. Glyphosate-free. Gluten-free. Non GMO.

product_name: YSL Pure Shots Lines Away Serum 30ml
description: Did You Know That Living Fast Increases Wrinkles By 35%? Discover Lines Away Serum, A Breakthrough Micro-Filling Technology That Instantly Smoothes Skin And Creates A ""Second-Skin"" Effect. Infused With The Ideal Dose Of Plumping Hyaluronic Acid Complemented With Anti-Wrinkle Iris From Morocco, It Helps To Reduce The Appearance Of Wrinkles And Gives Skin Elasticity Overtime.  Day 1: Skin Feels More Comfortable, Softer And Looks Smoother (Asia Only) Day 28: Skin Is More Elastic, Lines & Wrinkles Are Reduced.

product_name: YSL Libre 2-Piece Eau De Parfum Gift Set
description: Libre Eau de Parfum is the new fragrance of freedom, a statement fragrance for those who live by their own rules. A reinvention of the floral perfume, it combines Lavender Essence from France with the sensuality of Moroccan Orange Blossom, for a unique floral fusion complemented by a daring note of Musk Accord. This set contains:  1 x YSL Libre Eau De Parfum 90ml, YSL Libre Eau De Parfum 10ml Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Lavender, Tangerine, Neroli Heart Notes: Orange Blossom, Jasmine Base Notes: White Musk, Tonka Bean, Vanilla Essence

product_name: YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Cuir 125ml
description: A woody fragrance with oud and violet leaves.  An icon of youth and freedom, made edgy and luxurious. A unique material that may both hug the skin erotically and let loose the body provocatively. Cuir is a woody fragrance blending the refinement of oud & sensual expression of violet leaves with a rebel twist of vanilla. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Mandarine Essence - Cardamom Essence - Violet Leaf Absolu Heart Notes: Clove Essence - Oud Assafi Essence - Suede Accord Base Notes: Patchouli Heart - Cedarwood Heart - Bourbon Vanilla - Sandalwood Heart

product_name: YSL Libre 4-Piece Fragrance Discovery Miniature Set
description: Discover this exclusive 4-piece 7.5ml miniature set, featuring Libre Eau de Parfum, Libre Eau de Toilette, and Libre Eau de Parfum Intense. Libre Eau de Parfum is a bold and floral perfume for women. A statement feminine fragrance for those who live by their own rules. Lavender essence from France combines with the sensuality of Moroccan orange blossom and daring notes of musk accord and vanilla for a unique long-lasting scent. Libre Eau de Toilette is a bright and floral women's fragrance. A fresh interpretation of the iconic Eau de Parfum, this feminine perfume has bursts of French Lavender Essence and Moroccan Orange Blossom that combine with an icy White Tea Accord to create a modern and youthful scent. Libre Eau de Parfum Intense is the more sensual take on the iconic YSL Libre Eau de Parfum. The signature notes of lavender essence from France and Moroccan orange blossom combine with glowing orchid and warm vanilla to push the perfume to the extreme. It is a long-lasting unique twist on the floral fragrance.

product_name: YSL Loveshine Lipstick
description: A wet shine lipstick that quenches your thirsty lips with 24H dripping hydration leaving juicy wet shine. Experience our unique transformative texture - from lipstick to wet-shine lip oil. Indulge in luscious colors so easily buildable. Up to 24H dripping hydration and water loss prevention. Lips feel hydrated, nourished and protected. Give in to the caring formula enriched with fig pulp from Ourika community garden and 6 pure nourishing oils for visibly softer and healthier looking lips.

product_name: YSL Libre Flowers & Flames Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Libre Flowers & Flames Is A New Sultry Floral Blast. A Sexy Warm Reinterpratation Of Libre, Deliberatly Sensual & Floral. The Hot & Powerful Lily From The Desert Blends With The Solar & Creamy Coco Palm Tree Flower, For A Blazing Yet Comforting Scent. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Lavender Heart & Bergamotte Essence Heart Notes: Lily Flower accord, Palm Tree flower accord, Orange blossom, Diva Lavender Base Notes: Vanilla

product_name: YSL Youth Liberator Serum Foundation - B10 F/P
description: An anti-aging & protective fluid foundation Formulated with Forever Youth Liberator Serum for rejuvenating benefits Blended with patented Color Tune-Up Complex to correct dullness. Provides a medium to full coverage Creates a firmer, sleeker, brighter, even-toned & younger looking complexion.

product_name: Baileys Original Irish Cream Liqueur 200ml
description: Baileys is the most popular Irish Cream Liqueur around the globe and has been awarded more medals at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition than any of its competitors. With its distinct velvety texture, it is a perfect combination of smooth cream and whiskey. Enjoy on its own, over ice or in your favourite coffee. And if you are looking for more ways to indulge, from gooey Baileys Irish Cream Cheesecake to classy Baileys Espresso Martini, Baileys recipes hit the sweet spot every time. Drawing on Irish traditions in dairy and distilling, the unique combination took four years to perfect the ultimate liquid treat.

product_name: YSL Mon Paris Eau de Parfum 90ml
Bacardi Carta Blanca 1L 37.5%
description: Bacardí Carta Blanca White Rum was first created by Don Facundo Bacardí Masso in 1862 and has since been recognised as the world's most-awarded rum. Alcohol: 37.5%

description: Benefit Boi-Ing Indust Strength Clr 03

product_name: Baileys Espresso Creme Liqueur 1L
description: A delicious combination that was meant to be. Real Colombian coffee and other natural flavours meet yummy Baileys Original Irish Cream for a big bold hit of wonderful. Perfect for when you need to concentrate on the important things in life: coffee, chocolate and creamy Baileys. Enjoy neat, in one of our indulgent coffee cocktail recipes, or splash into coffee and hot drinks for an extra shot of wow. Tasting notes:Coffee, cream and a hint of cocoa

product_name: YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Lavalliere 125ml
description: Taking Its Name From A Woman -The Duchess Of La Valliere - But Originally Inspired By Men’S Accessories - The Jabot – The Lavallière Is, By Its Very Nature, Gender-Fluid. Throughout Time, Saint Laurent Twisted The Lavallière Into The Most Ysl Accessory Of All. An Iconic Piece To Adorn Silhouettes Emancipated From All Gender Norms. In Lavallière, The Floral Family Becomes A Fragrant Tribute To The Most Flowing Accessory Inspiring The Most Fluid Attitude. Lavallière Is That Ysl Union Between Masculine & Feminine: The Silky Touch Of This Iconic Piece Is Found In The Luscious And Delicate Notes Of Fig. A Sparkling Blackcurrant Enhanced By Precious Facetted Rose Signs This Composition With A Floral Green Twist, Blurring The Line Between Masculinity And Feminity In A Sensual Sillage. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Blackcurrant - Fig Accord - Bergamot Heart Notes: Geranium Essence - Rose - Jasmine Base Notes: Vetiver Essence - Cashmeran - Musk

WildCape UMF™ 8+ Manuka Honey contains at least 182 mg/kg of Methylglyoxal (MGO). Untouched. Unspoiled. Unlike anything else. Ingredients: Certified UMF™ 8+ New Zealand Manuka honey.  Usage: Enjoy straight from the spoon, or dissolved in hot (not boiling) water, tea or other beverages. Manuka honey is also widely used as a natural replacement for refined sugar. Add to smoothies, yogurt, whole grain toast, or oatmeal. Features & Benefits: Direct from the beekeeper. Single source. Raw. Unpasteurised. 100% traceable. Glyphosate-free. Gluten-free. Non GMO.

product_name: Wonderful Pistachios Classic Roasted Salted Pistachios 454g
Woodford Reserve Bourbon 1L
description: Woodford Reserve is created at the historic Woodford Reserve Distillery (Labrot & Graham Proprietors) in Woodford County, the smallest and oldest operating distillery in Kentucky, which dates back to 1812. Woodford Reserve is painstakingly hand-crafted, resulting in a whiskey of exceptional depth and character. This medium-bodied Bourbon's nose is sweet and of citrus, tastes of smokey oak, vanilla and cinnamon and finishes long, round and spicy but mellow. Discover for yourself what discerning critics have deemed one of the very best Bourbons on the market. Woodford Reserve is the Official Bourbon of two of horse racing's most important events; The Kentucky Derby and the Breeders' Cup. Every bottle is individually numbered with the batch number and bottle number. 43.2% Alc./Vol.

product_name: Yealands Single Vineyard P.G.R 750ml

Alcohol:  12.5%

product_name: Yealands Single Vineyard Pinot Noir 750ml
description: Yealand Estate Single Vineyard wines are the truest expression of our coastal location, showcasing our unique environment & diversity of flavours across this singularly incredible vineyard. Tasting Notes: Bouquet: Lifted dark berry aromas of blackberries & boysenberry, with subtle floral & spice notes  Palate: The palate is structured, with generous ripe cherry & boysenberries flavours, balanced with tannins & hints of oak Suitable for vegetarians, vegans & a gluten free diet. product_name: YSL Pure Shots Perfect Plumper Cream 50ml
description: PROVIDES INSTANT GLOW. REPLUMPS AND REDUCES AGEING SIGNS OVERTIME. How to use:  A hectic urban life exposes the skin to many agressors (pollution, uvs, stress, bad diet, lack of sleep...), accelerating skin ageing by 35%. Perfect Plumper Cream bouncy technology was developed to plump and rejuvenate skin instantly and overtime. Its bouncy illuminating texture instantly plumps and brightens. Orange Blossom from Morocco hydrates skin and activate cells to be more receptive to the optimal daily dose of 98% pure Energizing Ribose. Skin iability to fight all ageing signs is boosted: lines, wrinkles, sagginess and dullness are reduced day after day.  3 steps for a visible plumped and smoothed skin:  1. Apply with spatula: Take the cream with the provided spatulawarm on the length of fingers.  2. Massage to smooth: apply the cream on the half of face at a time modeling the face from bottom to top.Start on the cheeks to the temples, then from the middle of the forehead to the temples. Do not forget your neck. 3. Massage to plump: massage your cheeks vigorously with your fingertips to plump your skin. Apply day and/or night. Features & Benefits:  - Radiance - Anti-wrinkle - Plumpness - Anti Sagginess RESULTS IMMEDIATELY: Skin looks smoother: 73 % AFTER 4 WEEKS: Skin seems bouncy: 88 % SOURCE: CONSUMER SELF ASSESSMENTS, *68 ASIAN WOMEN 25-40

YSL Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Blouse 75ml

The fragrance BLOUSE revisits the rose with an aerial facet like the fluidity of the fabric and gives a sensual twist with an animalic angelica enhancing the sensuality of this garment worn next to the skin. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Galbanum Essence Bergamot Essence Pink Pepper Heart Notes: Rose Essence Rosifolia Base Notes: Angelica Essence Musc Cashmeran

product_name: YSL Mon Paris Lumiere Eau de Toilette 50ml
description:
What it is 
 Intoxicating floral notes of datura flower, white lotus, and rose absolute are contrasted by fruity top notes of pear, lemon and black currant to create this sparkling feminine fragrance. A light and dazzling fruity floral perfume, Mon Paris Eau de Toilette Lumière captures the essence of spring in the city of love. About the fragrance The lavalliere on the neck of the Mon Paris Lumière bottle takes on a new sophistication. Inspired by Saint Laurent's transparent blouses, a sheath of black organza let's the nude-colored satin sparkle through.

product_name: YSL Libre Eau de Toilette 50ml
description: LIBRE, the new Eau de Toilette by Yves Saint Laurent. The fragrance of a sensual & irreverent woman unveiling a new undressed freedom, the freedom to live everything on the skin. LIBRE, THE NEW EAU DE TOILETTE BY YVES SAINT LAURENT Created by the master perfumers Anne Flipo & Carlos Benaim to unveil a new sensual & undressed freedom, The freedom to live everything on the skin. With initiatives of exceptional sourcing around the world, YSL BEAUTY selects precious natural ingredients that define the uniqueness of the scent of freedom. WHAT IT IS The iconic structure of LIBRE, a tension between noble orange blossom from Morocco and sustainably sourced lavender from France, exclusively crafted for Yves Saint Laurent, is reinterpreted in a modern, bright and fresh sensuality. The carnal femininity of orange blossom absolute is infused with a pure white tea accord, exacerbating the warm-cold duality of the fragrance to leave a shivering yet sun-kissed sensuous pleasure. The iconic LIBRE IT-bottle is reinvented in a new elongated shape whose vertical extension clashes with the couture extravagance of the gold oversize horizontal Cassandre bent & nailed into the glass. Libre Eau de Toilette encapsulates a new delicate golden pink fragrance shade, celebrating femininity on the edge of nude. The embodiment of a new undressed freedom.

product_name: YSL Libre Eau de Toilette 90ml
description: LIBRE, the new Eau de Toilette by Yves Saint Laurent. The fragrance of a sensual & irreverent woman unveiling a new undressed freedom, the freedom to live everything on the skin. product_name: YSL Libre Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: The floral perfume of a strong, bold and free woman experiencing her freedom at its most empowered extreme, to live everything to excess Libre: Women's Fragrance of Freedom LIBRE Eau De Parfum, the new women’s floral fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent, represents the freedom to live everything to excess. Your boundless creativity, your complete emancipation, your ever-evolving femininity. Libre, the French word for ‘free’, pays tribute to YSL’s most defining value: Freedom. The floral perfume of a strong, bold and free woman experiencing her freedom at its most empowered extreme. A statement women’s fragrance for those who lives by her own rules. Fragrance Scent The first floral lavender. The tension between the burning sensuality of orange blossom from Morocco, the boldness of lavender from France and a daring note of Musk Accord with a feminine twist. A singular trail like a breath of freedom. Fragrance Bottle A couture, sharp-angled bottle that is dually architecturally masculine and sensually feminine. The iconic Libre it-bottle reflects a tension between masculinity and femininity, like a straight geometric silhouette embedded in the smoking jacket. The iconic YSL Cassandre – an oversized luxury accessory – is strikingly bent and nailed into the glass like a jewel. Sexy golden chains and an asymmetric black lacquered cap adorn the bottle to complete it as a manifesto of freedom and irreverence.

In Lavallière, The Floral Family Becomes A Fragrant Tribute To The Most Flowing Accessory Inspiring The Most Fluid Attitude. Lavallière Is That Ysl Union Between Masculine & Feminine: The Silky Touch Of This Iconic Piece Is Found In The Luscious And Delicate Notes Of Fig. A Sparkling Blackcurrant Enhanced By Precious Facetted Rose Signs This Composition With A Floral Green Twist, Blurring The Line Between Masculinity And Feminity In A Sensual Sillage. product_name: Zacapa Solera Gran Reserva 700ml
description:
Zacapa Solera Gran Reserva is a a complex and full-bodied dark rum. Aged in ex-American Whiskey and ex-Sherry casks to deliver flavour notes of raisined fruit, Zacapa Solera Gran Reserva can be enjoyed neat, on the rocks or to give classic cocktails  like an Old-Fashioned a delicious twist.  Tasting notes:It has a sweet honeyed viscosity more reminiscent of a liqueur than an aged spirit; a great depth of raisined fruit and apricot preserves, building to an intense heart of savoury oak, nutmeg, with notes of coffee and delicately sweet vanilla, balanced with a spicy touch of cinnamon and ginger on the pleasantly astringent finish; truly a rum for the discerning
palate.

product_name: Wild Grace Pinot Noir 750ml
description: This is a softly rich and densely packed Pinot Noir with ripe flavours of blackberry and dark cherry, flowing through restrained hints of french oak.

product_name: Sheep Milk & Honey Gin 500ml
Waiheke Distilling Co. London Dry Gin 700ml
description: Our island take on this time-honoured classic tipple. Aromatic and juniper forward, with notes of lemon and Seville orange. The inclusion of macadamia provides an enriching mouth feel, and pink peppercorn adds a spicy warmth to this classic dry gin. Versatile and discerning, its a bartender's friend. Pair with Premium Indian Tonic and twist of lemon or cucumber. Signature cocktails- Classic Martini, Gin Gin Mule, French 75. Alcohol:  42%

product_name: Waiheke Distilling Co. Red Ruby Gin 700ml
description: Red Ruby Cherry gin is the jewel in our collection. An infusion of 100% pure New Zealand cherry juice sweetening our otherwise dry gin structure, results in a truly special drop that is the perfect refreshment on a hot summer's day. Smooth, with delicate sweetness, orange and warm spiced cinnamon on the palate. Enjoy with a Blood Orange Soda for a light and refreshing serve or pair with Aromatic or Elderflower Tonic. Signature cocktails, Negroni and Gin Spritz or savour on the rocks. Alcohol:  42%

product_name: Waiheke Distilling Co. Spirit Of Waiheke Gin 700ml
description: Our award-winning signature gin embodies the land, wind and sea. This contemporary dry gin pays homage to its Waiheke Island provenance with a coastal freshness on the nose. Distilled and bottled on Waiheke's Eastern shores with giant kelp, locally harvested citrus and a hint of spice. Clean lingering finish with subtle lime. Pairs perfectly with a Mediterranean or Elderflower tonic and a twist of lime, or with a sprig of rosemary. Fernmark endorsed and proudly vegan-friendly.  Alcohol:  42%

product_name: Wairau River Rose 750ml
description: Displaying subtle floral notes combined with lifted aromas of strawberry and raspberry. these characters translate generously to the palate, which is finely balanced by delicate acidity and an off dry finish.

product_name: YSL Mascara Volume Effet Faux Cils Waterproof 01 Noir

Finish: Fine and elegant aromatic structure providing additional length without losing crispness. Alcohol:  13%

Fragrance Scent The first floral lavender. The tension between the burning sensuality of orange blossom from Morocco, the boldness of lavender from France and a daring note of Musk Accord with a feminine twist. A singular trail like a breath of freedom. Fragrance Bottle A couture, sharp-angled bottle that is dually architecturally masculine and sensually feminine. The iconic Libre it-bottle reflects a tension between masculinity and femininity, like a straight geometric silhouette embedded in the smoking jacket. The iconic YSL Cassandre – an oversized luxury accessory – is strikingly bent and nailed into the glass like a jewel. Sexy golden chains and an asymmetric black lacquered cap adorn the bottle to complete it as a manifesto of freedom and irreverence.

product_name: Wild Turkey 81 Proof 1L
description: An 81 Proof bourbon crafted by Wild Turkey associate distiller Eddie Russell son of master distiller Jimmy. Palate: Rich and thick, notes of caramel, manuka honey and fudge, hints of rhubarb and custard sweets and oily espresso beans. Finish: Caramel and coffee, hints of Black Forest honey and Hot Cross Buns. Charred and spicy.  Alcohol: 40.5%.

product_name: Wild Turkey Long Branch 1L
description:
Wild Turkey Longbranch is an 8 year old; small-batch Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. 

 Matthew McConaughey and Master Distiller Eddie Russell teamed up to create a bourbon that reflects their Texas and Kentucky roots. The whiskey is refined with Texas Mesquite and Oak charcoals. It can be enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as the foundation of a refreshing cocktail like the Branchwater. To make a Branchwater, squeeze half a lime into a highball glass filled with ice; then add Wild Turkey Longbranch and top with sparkling water. Wild Turkey Longbranch is a unique bourbon that is destined to become a small-batch classic. 

 • A unique bourbon 
• Refined with Texas Mesquite and Oak charcoals

product_name: Wild Turkey Rare Breed Giftbox 1L
description: The Wild Turkey Rare Breed bottle has received a little bit of a redesign, it has! The shape is the same as before, but the label is new and shiny, as is the presentation tube (with focus on the 'shiny' bit). Rare Breed is Wild Turkey's barrel proof expression, and it now sits at a slightly-higher-than-previous-batches ABV of 56.4%. NOSE Plenty of plump raisins and sultanas, with heady notes of ground almond and marzipan. There’s also the clean fruitiness of green apple to balance things out plus some spice in the form of white pepper to lift the aromas. PALATE Rich, sweet and spicy – baked apples drenched in honey, dried fruit and cinnamon. Rich texture, mouth coating and very seductive. FINISH The rich spiciness and sweetness lingers, with everything in balance.

Perfectly suited for after-dinner consumption, it rounds-out Wild Turkey's portfolio of exceptional products. Wild Turkey Liqueur also marries well with Wild Turkey Bourbon to make a Kentucky-style Golden Nail. It also goes well with vanilla ice cream, pecan pie, or as an ingredient in a butterscotch sauce. Alcohol:  35.5%

Wild Turkey 8 Year-Old has an exceptionally soft, but rich aroma for a high proof bourbon, due to quality at all stages of making and aging for 8 years. Its taste is powerful and rich with caramel, vanilla and notes of honey and brown sugar. The finish is very long, rich and full-bodied, powerful, yet soothing.  Alcohol:  50.5%

product_name: Versace Eros Flame Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: A fragrance that hits straight to the heart, which conveys an important message to the new generations about the dignity of love and the power of diversity. Versace Eros Flame is the fragrance for a strong, passionate and self-confident man who lives his emotions on the skin.The olfactory notes of Versace Eros Flame are characterized by strong contrasts in which the noblest and most elegant ingredients are enriched and enhanced with each other. the others: lemon, mandarin, orange, black pepper, wild rosemary, pepperwood, geranium, rose facets, cedar, patchouli, tonka beans and vanilla. A persistent and enveloping fragrance, which manages to be virile at the same time, an ode to passion and a hymn to the voluptuousness of the senses. Ingredients: SD Alcohol 39C, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-Isomethy Ionone, Citronellol, Citral, Ethyhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Geraniol, Isoeugenol How to use:  Apply your perfume to pressure points for a long lasting scent at the inner wrists, the base of the throat, behind ear lobes and in the cleavage. Fragrance Notes:  Hesperidic, Amber, Woody, Chinotto Accord, Black Pepper, Rosemary, Patchouli Coeur, Haitian Vetiver

product_name: Versace Dylan Purple Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Dylan Purple is a bright and elegant fragrance. A sparkling bergamot is blended with the joyful tones of a freshly harvested orange. Heady scents of freesia deliver an explosion of bright purple colour and the delicate aroma of its petals is sublimated by Mahonial and Pomarose, both diffuse and powerful. Belambre and Ambrofix provide an asserted, elegant and vibrant tone underlined by soft Iso E Super and creamy Cedarwood. Silkolide signs the fragrance with a musky note and slight fruity accents. This set contains:  1 x Pour Homme Dylan Blue 100ml and 1 x Bath & Shower Gel 100ml Fragrance Notes: Top: water notes, fig leaves, bergamot, grapefruit Heart: Violet leaves, patchouli, papyrus, black pepper, ambroxan Base: Musk, tonka beans, saffron, frankincense Olfactory family: aromatic

product_name: Villa Maria Sparkling Cuvee Brut 750ml
description: Pale straw in colour with fresh citrus and floral notes on the nose. The crisp palate is refreshing with a subtle brioche note providing richness and complexity. Alcohol:  12%

product_name: Villa Maria Seaspray Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description: This Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc has distinctive briny seashell characters and lively acidity derived from the nearby oceanic influence. Flavours of kaffir lime, capsicum and freshly picked culinary herbs represent the cooler windy coastal Awatere sub region in Marlborough where these vines struggle to grow in the sandy river gravel soil. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Villa Maria Private Bin Hawkes Bay Merlot 750ml
description: Enjoy the smooth velvet texture with rich flavours of plum, blackberry with subtle hints of spice and vanilla from oak maturation. A sweet-fruited and textured palate possessing supple tannins makes this a versatile food friendly wine.  Alcohol:  13.5%

product_name: Villa Maria Ihumatao Auckland Chardonnay 750ml
description: This unique, single vineyard Auckland chardonnay is complex and refined. The nose possesses white peach and yellow citrus notes combining with bran biscuit, flint and toast.  Alcohol:  13.5%

product_name: Villa Maria Cellar Selection Pinot Rose 750ml
description: Our Marlborough Pinot Rose, made with Pinot Noir grapes captures summer in a bottle. A crisp and refreshing texture beautifully intermingles with flavours of juicy watermelon, strawberries and red cherries. Enjoy year round and while its young. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Villa Maria McDiarmid Hill Gisborne Chardonnay 750ml
description: McDiarmid Hill is Villa Maria's jewel in the crown Gisborne vineyard. This premium, single vineyard Chardonnay offers a medley of tropical fruit aromas, fig and smoky grilled nut. Alcohol:  14.5%

product_name: Villa Maria Private Bin Marlborough Riesling 750ml
description: Crack open the screw cap and taste our deliciously crisp Private Bin Riesling brimming with bright flavours of lime, mandarin and delicate florals. Alcohol:  11.5%

product_name: Veuve Cliquot Yellow Label Brut Magnum 1.5L
description: Our signature champagne since 1772, yellow label brut showcases the fine art of blending. with a predominance of pinot noir to provide that typical clicquot structure, a touch of meunier rounds out the blend whilst chardonnay adds elegance and finesse. as they say, the proof of a champagne house is in its brut non-vintage! veuve clicquot yellow label manages to reconcile two opposing factors - strength and silkiness - and to hold them in perfect balance with aromatic intensity and a lot of freshness. this consistent power to please makes it ideal as an aperitif, and perfect as the champagne to enjoy with a meal.

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Rich Rose 750ml
description: With the new RICH and RICH ROSE, Veuve Clicquot ccombines both fresh and fruity falvors while remaining true to the Maison's style. The blend and the liqueur make this champagne the very expression of a gourmet pleasure, where notes of fruit blend perfectly with its sweetness. The new RICH wine has evolved and been enhanced to meet the demand for simplicity of consumption as well as a more digestible, easier to drink cuvée. The RICH cuvée finds an ideal counterpart in RICH Rosé, a dazzling blend of red and exotic fruit with notes of cool peppermint. Tasting Notes:  The signature Pinot Noir of the Veuve Clicquot style is given a new versatility with a higher dosage, while a greater presence of Meunier emphasizes fresh, fruity and luscious notes.  On the palate, citrus and floral notes combine perfectly with a dynamic freshness and creamy finish. Showing exceptional roundness and sweetness, the wine is then magnified by the presence of thoughtfully selected ingredients to create the perfect balance

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Traveller’s Exclusive Yellow Label Brut 750ml
description: Since its foundation in 1772, Veuve Clicquot champagne has travelled across the oceans, faithful to Madame Clicquot's goal of "crossing borders" and bringing the finesse of her champagne all around the world. This travel edition collection is a subtle wink to her visionary spirit. Discover the insert that turns into a postcard. Tasting Notes: Veuve Clicquot Sydney TREX manages to reconcile two opposing factors - strength and silkiness - and to hold them in perfect balance with aromatic intensity and a lot of freshness. The predominance of Pinot Noir provides the structure that is so typically Veuve Clicquot, while a touch of Meunier rounds out the blend. Chardonnay adds the elegance and finesse essential in a perfectly balanced wine. This consistent power to please makes Veuve Clicquot Sydney TREX ideal as an apéritif, and perfect as the champagne to enjoy with a meal. Blend : 50-55% Pinot Noir / 28-33% Chardonnay / 15-20% Meunier (40 to 45% Reserve Wines) ABV : 12%

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Arrow Auckland 750ml
description: Veuve Clicquot 's belief is th at ev ery sunrise is th e promise of endless opportunities. More than a capsule collection , Arrow Follow Your Sun is an ode to our "solaire" culture, with profoundly optimistics tate of mind. Arrow Follow Your Sun Capsule Collection invites you to go back to your beloved places , and discover all the most beautiful and memories sunrises in the world. Alcohol:  12.5%

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Ice Box 750ml
description: A sleek and sustainable ice bucket, reissued as a collector's item. Reusable and recyclable, this clever box transforms an eco-friendly champagne bucket! Designed to last (and last) it is made of cardboard and paper sustainably managed and FSC certified forests. Comes with a bottle of Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label 750ml.

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Rose 750ml
description: In 1818, Madame Clicquot invented the first known blended Rose Champagne ever that you can enjoy and share today for its liveliness and burst of fruits. A fruity and full-bodied expression of the Veuve Clicquot style. 750ml 12%

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Rich 750ml
description: Veuve clicquot rich was created expressly to be combined with a selection of ingredients that bring out the mixologist-no, the clicquologist-in anyone. the signature notes of the wine are magnified by the presence of selected ingredients: pineapple, grapefruit zest, cucumber, celery, peppers or tea, all on the rocks.

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Vintage Blanc 750ml
description: Pours superbly with a lacy white mouse that holds well eventually revealing a pale straw base wine colour with tinges of pale gold around the edges. very fine bead showing excellent persistence. the bouquet is one of great finesse featuring yeast lees and citrus aromas interlaced with baked bread and a light toastiness followed by notes of brioche and cashew. light and airy the palate is graced with citrus, toast, yeast lees, subtle pear infusions, bready characters and subtle cashew. there’s an elegant creaminess to the texture and the finish is fresh with stimulating acidity. excellent length with a long yeast lees, citrus, subtle baked bread and cashew aftertaste. a classy, finely structured champagne. 12% alc./vol.

product_name: Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label Brut 750ml
description: The quintessential Yellow Label - famous the world over. Medium bodied with a fine bead. Citrus, light toast and soft brioche flavours.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Dew Eau De Parfum 50ml
Viktor & Rolf Spicebomb Infrared Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Inspired by the Infrared technology which detects body heat, VIKTOR& ROLF ignites a magnetic seduction game that burns like a flame. SPICEBOMB INFRARED turns the heat up in all senses, creating a crescendo of sexiness, a true frenzy of torrid feelings and seduction, impossible to deny, unbearable to ignore, even when one is alone. THE BOTTLE SPICEBOMB INFRARED  recreates the iconic SPICEBOMB bottle by taking the vibrant and magnetic red of the Infrared light and merging it into the black-colored glass. The result is an irresistible burning grenade, a pulsating bomb that can be unpinned for never ending seduction. THE OLFACTION SPICEBOMB INFRARED  is a never-before-seen Oriental Ambery fragrance. Created as an explosion of hot red spices, SPICEBOMB INFRARED opens up with the vibrant character of red berries leading the way to the incisive burn of the Habanero red pepper. The benzoin resinoid creates a very sensual dry down. OLFACTORY Red Berries Essence Saffron Accord Habanero Red Pepper Accord Cinnamon Leaf Essence Benzoin Resinoid Tobacco Accord OLFACTORY FAMILY Oriental Ambery  FAMILY FRAGRANCE Oriental / Yummy / Amber / Sweet INGREDIENTS:  ALCOHOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, AQUA / WATER, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, COUMARIN, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, EUGENOL, CINNAMAL, CITRONELLOL, METHYL ANTHRANILATE, GERANIOL, CITRAL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL. CODE FIL : B257480/1 How To Use:  Apply on pulse points of the skin: wrist, inner elbow and neck.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Eau De Parfum 100ml
Viktor & Rolf Spicebomb Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: The bottle of the fragrance spicebomb is a real luxury object: after being fashioned like a diamond for flowerbomb, the grenade is reinvented in a glass sculpture with chased, even and masculine facets. the ultimate detail: the fragrance is released by priming the pin, which has been revisited with the viktor&rolf seal. the olfactory explosion is inescapable.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: More concentrated, hence more glamorous and chic. Scent starts with bergamot, sambac jasmine. Comes the heart with osmanthus, white flowers, balms. Dry down unveils patchouli, amber, benzoin, vanilla.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Ruby Orchid Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid by Viktor&Rolf is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid was launched in 2021.  Top notes are Peach and Vine; middle note is Orchid; base note is Vanilla Bean.

product_name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Dew Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Flowerbomb Dew is the new second skin floral facet of Viktor & Rolf's Flowerbomb perfume: dewy and delicate, this Eau de Parfum makes you reconnect with the essential, and gives you the power to reveal your natural glow, with a pure and transparent sensuality.  Flowerbomb Dew is a floriental musky perfume for women, an olfactory bomb of fresh flowers designed around a Dewy Rose Accord. This rose growing in water is infused with transparent morning dew, for a scent that melts on your skin. Envelop yourself with comforting musks, and sensual iris to create the most glowy, second skin floral sensation. A long lasting perfume for women, sensual and second skin, dewy and delicate. The new scent is encapsulated in a slightly transparent pearly white bottle, a new gem in the Flowerbomb family by Viktor & Rolf, inviting women to get rid of all the unnecessary, to reveal their power. Directions: Apply on pulse points: wrist, inner elbow and neck. Product Ingredients:  CODE FIL : B242799/1 ALCOHOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, AQUA / WATER, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRONELLOL, COUMARIN, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, METHYL ANTHRANILATE, CITRAL, GERANIOL, CI 60730 / EXT. VIOLET 2, CI 14700 / RED 4.

description: The bottle of the fragrance Spicebomb is a real luxury object: after being fashioned like a diamond for Flowerbomb, the grenade is reinvented in a glass sculpture with chased, even and masculine facets. The ultimate detail: the fragrance is released by priming the pin, which has been revisited with the Viktor&Rolf seal. The olfactory explosion is inescapable.

product_name: Wild Ferns Manuka Honey Hand & Nail Creme 85ml
description: Filled with over 10 skin loving natural ingredients this quick absorbing hand and nail crème will leave you with conditioned cuticles and silky smooth hands. Contains premium certified Manuka Honey 80+ blended with Prosina, a hydrolysed keratin derived from New Zealand sheep’s wool. This proven combination improves the structure and strength of your nails while increasing the hydration and softness of your skin and cuticles. Shea Butter combined with the oils of Sweet Almond, Olive, Hazelnut and Orange Peel will deeply nourish, restoring elasticity and smoothness. Chamomile and Passionflower help to calm and soothe tired hands. Feature:  94% Natural How To Use: Apply as often as required on and around nails, cuticles and hands. Perfect for during the day. Ingredients : AQUA (WATER)*, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE*, CETEARYL ALCOHOL**, PROPANEDIOL*, PEG-20 STEARATE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER*, DECYL OLEATE, MEL (MANUKA HONEY)*, HYDROLYZED KERATIN*, CORYLUS AVELLANA (HAZELNUT) SEED OIL*, LAURYL OLIVATE**, MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) SEED BUTTER*, GLYCERIN*, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL*, PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL*, PARFUM, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ALCOHOL*, PASSIFLORA INCARNATA (PASSION) FLOWER EXTRACT*, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) PEEL OIL*, CAMELLIA SINENSIS (GREEN TEA) LEAF EXTRACT*, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (CHAMOMILE) FLOWER EXTRACT*, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, COUMRIN

Wild Ferns Manuka Honey Lip Care SPF15 12ml

How To Use: Apply to your lips when needed.  Ingredients : PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCTS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL*, CERA ALBA (BEES) WAX*, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BENZOPHENONE 3, LEPTOSPERMUM SCOPARIUM MEL (MANUKA HONEY)*, AQUA (WATER)*, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, MANGIFERAINDICA (MANGO) SEED BUTTER*, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E)**, POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIPOLYHYDROXYSTERATE, DEHYDROACETICACID AND BENZYL ALCOHOL**, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL*, TILIA CORDATA FLOWER (LINDEN) EXTRACT*, FLAVOUR

Enriched with a potent blend of essential fatty acid rich oils of Evening Primrose, Avocado, Olive and Raspberry Seed provide instant hydration and softness, while Chamomile helps calm and soothe for a healthier appearance and more even skin tone. Suitable for all skin types. Feature:  99% Natural How To Use: After cleansing, apply a small amount of crème and gently smooth in an upward direction onto the face and neck.  Ingredients : AQUA (WATER)*, GLYCERIN**, GLYCERYL STEARATE SE**, LEPTOSPERMUM SCOPARIUM MEL (MANUKA HONEY)*, CETEARYL ALCOHOL**, CETEARYL WHEAT STRAW GLYCOSIDES**, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL*, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL*, SODIUM STEARYL GLUTAMATE**, BENZYL ALCOHOL**, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL*, RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) SEED OIL*, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E)**, ALLANTOIN**, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITIA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*, CITRIC ACID*, DEHYDROACETIC ACID**, POLLEN*, PARFUM, BENZYL BENZOATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, COUMARIN, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL

product_name: Wild Ferns Manuka Honey Eye Creme 30ml
description: The skin around the eye area is delicate and sensitive so needs to be treated with extra love and care - your skin is 10 times thinner around this area, so it is important to use products that are gentle and do not irritate. This intensive eye crème containing premium certified Manuka Honey 80+ has been specially formulated to be used around the eye area to hydrate, brighten and soothe the skin. Rosehip, Borage, Wheatgerm and Hazelnut Oils soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while antioxidant high Vitamins A, C and E will help support collagen production. Feature:  92% Natural How To Use: Apply a small amount to your ring fingers (these have the least amount of strength). Use a light patting motion under and around the eye area. Press or tap but do not rub.  Ingredients : AQUA (WATER)*, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, GLYCERIN**, CETEARYL ALCOHOL**, LEPTOSPERMUM SCOPARIUM MEL (MANUKA HONEY)*, ROSA CANNINA FRUIT (ROSEHIP) OIL*, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E)**, PEG-20 STEARATE, PEG-100 STEARATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE**, PHENOXYETHANOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS SEED (BORAGE) OIL*, CERA ALBA (BEES) WAX*, CHAMOMILA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*, CORYLUS AMERICANA (HAZEL) SEED OIL*, TRITICUM VULGARE (WHEAT) GERM OIL*, RETINYL PALMITATE (VITAMIN A)**, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, ASCORBYL PALMITATE (VITAMIN C)**, CITRIC ACID*, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), COUMARIN, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL

description: Delicate pink hue with a captivating bouquet of red berries, florals, and subtle citrus notes. This sparkling wine is bright with lively acidity, balanced by a touch of sweetness, offering a harmonious and well-rounded palate.  Alcohol:  12%

product_name: Vavasour Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description: Vavasour Sauvignon Blanc is a meticulously made wine with grapes selected for intensity and concentration. The bouquet shows passionfruit and white peach aromas and the palate has ripe fruit flavours with mineral notes. Always one of our favourites. Alcohol:  12.5%

product_name: Vantage Infused Botanical Spirit 1L
description: Vantage Australia set out to capture the essence of this sunburnt  country and bottle the flavours of the bush to create its own unique  native spirit. Inspired by Australia’s own native flora, Vantage  was developed using only premium botanicals. Lemon myrtle  and Tasmanian mountain pepper were distilled creating a smoky  bush flavour complemented with a hint of zesty mandarin oil from  Australian grown mandarins. Vantage Australian Botanical Spirit at 37% ABV cuts  across the traditional spirit categories of gin, vodka and white rum

product_name: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Green Stravaganza Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: As the sun rises and shines over the eternal city, Born in Roma Green Stravaganza takes you on a bold adventure to the cool gardens of Roma where you are free to live and express your unique ways.  Born in Roma Green Stravaganza is a fougère ambery fragrance, revealing its magnetic aroma through confronting the freshness from Calabrian bergamot heart and the pure energy surge from the coffee accord. Born in Roma Green Stravaganza leads a way into the extravagance of Roma, allowing cool kids to feel the energy, unleash their personalities, and live excessively, because there are many vibrant ways to be you. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Fresh Calabrian Bergamot Heart reveals its full vitality while the fragrance unfolds, enriching the zesty and green notes. Heart Note: Like a pure shot of coffee captured in the fragrance bottle, the rich dark aroma of the coffee accord amplifies the magnetism of this juice. Base Note: Warm and woody notes of Vetiver Heart Essence Haiti intensifies the fragrance, giving away the authentic elegance and sophistication.

product_name: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Green Stravaganza Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: As the sun rises and shines over the eternal city, Born in Roma Green Stravaganza takes you on a bold adventure to the cool gardens of Roma where you are free to live and express your unique ways.  Born from the abundant gardens of Roma, this floral-ambery woody fragrance opens the door to an extravagant world created by distinctive lapsang souchong tea accord and radiant jasmine absolute with a captivating touch from vanilla extract. Born in Roma Green Stravaganza leads a way into the extravagance of Roma, allowing cool kids to feel the energy, unleash their personalities, and live excessively, because there are many vibrant ways to be you. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Opening with a smoky tea leaves scent, this fragrance draws you into a sensual garden with Lapsang Souchong tea accord. Heart Note: Delicate jasmine absolute illuminates the heart of the mix with its solar and floral facets, unveiling modern feminity of this note. Base Note: Sweet yet smoky drops of vanilla extract add a bewitching touch to this sensual journey, pushing the extravagance to extremes.

product_name: Valdouro Tawny Port 750ml
description: Fruit forward aromas of raspberry and fig blend with spice notes of caramel and hazelnut.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster A Witch Toning Lotion 250ml
description: A Witch Hazel Toning Lotion by Triumph & Disaster. This natural, alcohol-free toner is your ticket to the show. As the name suggests, ‘Logic’ is all about simplicity, accuracy and clarity, values espoused in the pursuit of an honest, natural, effective solution to toning and treating skin. By cleaning out the last remnants of each day’s (or last night's) oily residue and unwanted build up, ‘Logic’ works hard to clear pores and leave skin clean and taut. Engineered with a bespoke blend of proven actives this natural formulation balances, clears and tones without stripping or dehydrating sensitive skin, providing a much-needed ceremony to a daily routine. How to use: Day Use a splash of Logic Toner on your hands or on a cotton pad after cleansing with Ritual Cleanser. If you're shaving - make sure to use Logic Toner afterwards. Follow with Gameface Moisturiser. Night There's nothing wrong with finishing of the day with Logic! If you've cleansed - apply a dash of Logic Toner before applying Dark Moon Hydrating Cream. We suggesting allowing Logic to really penetrate the skin before applying Dark Moon. Features & Benefits: 1/ Water based and Alcohol Free (No Denatured Alcohol) – this means it is gentle on your skin and will not strip or dehydrate sensitive skin. 2/ An Everyday Balancing/Cleansing/Hydrating Toner – meaning ‘Logic’ works to balance, regulate and even out skin tone and appearance with a bespoke combination of known natural cleansing and toning agents. 3/ Natural acne treatment ingredients – well known natural alternatives to chemical washes Witch Hazel, and Tasmanian Pepper work topically on the skins surface to treat and protect against acne. 4/ Reduces pores creating a smooth appearance – with regular, daily use by cleaning out excess oil and unwanted build up ‘Logic’ will work to reduce pore size creating a smooth even skin tone. 5/ Soothes and treats the skin – this formulation has been developed with proven natural ingredients such as Mamaku extract and Tasmanian Pepper for their natural soothing and calming qualities that leave skin feeling toned and calm.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Fibre Royale 95g
description: Many tread the path, but few keep the way. Be true to yourself and take the fight to the world, this is Fibre Royale’s DNA. A strong, natural product that provides strength and hold without adding volume or dulling natural shine. Utilising a bespoke blend of Beeswax, Argan oil and Kawakawa to mould hair and treat the scalp, Fibre Royale (in France they call it something else) is a strong hold, low volume product that delivers a natural look & style. Perfect for medium to long hairstyles, ideal for both men’s and women’s cuts, best for thicker hair types. Fibre Royale is infused with T&D’s bespoke fragrance named Santa Monica. Like its namesake Santa Monica is a complex juxtaposition of muscle, art and good times, where everyone and anyone are welcome, so long as they come to play. Derived from the emotionally calming ‘Ho wood’ bark, mixed with cold pressed orange rind and pine needle, it has been said that Santa Monica smells like a block party from the 90’s. How to use:  Work a small amount of Fibre Royale through dry or damp hair. Walk tall, run strong. Features & Benefits: 1/ It’s ‘Non Volumising’ and delivers a strong hold 2/ Key ingredients ‘Beeswax and Argan oil’ combine to deliver tensile strength and weight with a natural look without adding volume. 3/ Kawakawa treats the scalp whilst the water based formulation allows pores to breathe.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Ponsonby Pomade 95g
description: Sangre de cargo or 'Dragon’s Blood' is a natural tree resin that combines with Harakeke (NZ Flax oil) to treat and balance the scalp while Argan oil attacks split ends and promotes healthy hair growth - in one wave of the metaphorical comb, Ponsonby Pomade is redefining the category, proving that a pomade can both style your hair while also protecting it from damage, calming the scalp with natural, active ingredients that leave both hair & scalp feeling clean and healthy. Ponsonby Pomade is a water based, nutrient rich product that treats the hair and scalp while you use it. Our Little Puck is a 25g hair hit ideal for travel, trial or to remix to your usual disguise. The same natural formula you love, now easier to smuggle across the border. If this formula is tried & true for you - go for the 95g. How to use:  Work a small amount into dry or damp hair and style away. Perfect for a non-greasy, high shine, wet look with a medium hold. Features & Benefits: 1/ Water based Pomade - predominant ingredient is water which means that it’s water-soluble and that it can easily be washed out. 2/ No petroleum means it's easy on the earth and easy on your head whilst delivering and maintaining a cracking hold. 3/ Non greasy – Greasy pomades and hair products are direct contributors to acne. No acne outbreaks using Ponsonby Pomade – just cold hard looks. 4/ Hold factor medium giving you complete control over the way you style your hair without the use of grease or petroleum chemicals. 5/ Dragons Blood, Argan and Harekeke work together as a treatment to nourish and protect hair and skin during the day or night whilst you maintain a killer style! With a nod to Auckland’s artery of style Ponsonby Pomade aims to turn heads with the same ethos that the patrons of Auckland’s Ponsonby Road have displayed for generations, that is, work hard, play harder and look great at both.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Karekare Tonic 150ml
description: Karekare Hair Tonic is Triumph & Disaster's all natural sea salt spray, designed to bring out the wild child in all of us. Karekare is an exotic fusion of natural salts and essential root extracts, blended to deliver the very definition of wild, dangerous hair. Named after the famous beach on New Zealand's West Coast, Karekare Tonic takes bland, dull, lifeless hair and drags it to the dance floor for one last intoxicating fling. How to use:  For a vibrant, textured look, spray into damp or dry hair, style with your hands, comb or brush then let dry. Shake before use. Flush pump with fresh water if unused for an extended period to avoid salt crystallisation. Avoid contact with eyes. External use only. Keep out of reach of children. Features & Benefits: 1/ Karekare Tonic creates dangerous, provocative hair – our unique combination of ingredients guarantees to deliver funk, punk and seventies roller disco rolled into a twisted tantrum of inner wild. 2/ Treats your scalp – Willow Herb treats your scalp as an anti-dandruff, anti-irritant tonic that calms enraged heads. 3/ Provides protection - Green tea and Sea Beet combine to protect hair from oxidative stress caused by the elements. 4/ Regulates oil production – no one wants it but we all need it, the good oil that is, but it needs regulating. Epsom salts and Willow Herb combine to balance out heady oil levels.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Silvertip Fibre Shave Brush - Cream
description: As it is between an artist and their muse, the relationship between shave brush and face is a sacred one. Our state of the art Silvertip Synthetic Fibre Shaving Brush* is the ultimate tool to apply your T&D shave cream like a pro. You'll be able to generate a rich, warm lather that softens and lifts the facial hair, making for a far more efficient use of your shave cream and an altogether better shaving experience. What is more, you will be shaving guilt-free, safe in the knowledge that no badger/goat/horse or boar was harmed in the process. You may even find yourself uttering that familiar catchphrase that goes something like ""Once you go synthetic, you'll never go back! Rinse well after use and shake to remove excess moisture, store in a dry place in preparation for your next shave. * German-made with the absolute latest technological advances this synthetic brush handles better than those made of animal hair, we truly believe this and you can believe us when we say we searched high and low for a brush that did not harm animals but actually elevated the shaving process. This be that very Brush. How to use:  We do recommend using a shave brush to create the perfect lather and give you the best shave.

product_name: Toblerone Pralines 380g
description: New Pralines by Toblerone. Delicious milk chocolate edges with a smooth chocolate center mixed with crunchy little bites of nougat inside

product_name: Toblerone Tiny Milk Bag 504g
description: The iconic milk chocolate with honey and almond nougat! Travel exclusive bag of 63 individually wrapped snack-sized pieces. Perfect to share with your loved ones.

product_name: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: With BORN IN ROMA CORAL FANTASY, Valentino invites you to a new Rome at sunset. Inspired by the coral-lit sky over the eternal city, it’s time for a new expression of fantasy. A celebration of the magnificent heritage of Rome in a moment of your own making. BORN IN ROMA CORAL FANTASY is an Amber fruity scent composed of colorful Red Apple accord blended with Sage and Tobacco. The provocative heart create a fresh yet powerful fragrance. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: The heart is aromatic and warm, thanks to the sage, introducing a new dimension to the scent. It blends perfectly with the top’s freshness, deepening the aura around this bouquet. Heart Note: The heart is aromatic and warm, thanks to the sage, introducing a new dimension to the scent. It blends perfectly with the top’s freshness, deepening the aura around this bouquet. Base Note: Incomparable sensuality at the base of the fragrance. Tobacco is a rich and powerful ingredient tying the scent together with a note of warmth and comfort.

product_name: Valentino Voce Viva Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: The sound of your voice, the scent of your fragrance, both a magnetic presence. Voce Viva celebrates every woman’s unique voice in one declaration: My voice, My strength. An invitation to voice dreams, and to live them. Voce Viva, a living voice. A floral reimagining in the spirit of Valentino’s contemporary femininity - couture Orange Blossom absolute and golden Gardenia accord paired with colorful Italian Bergamot and Mandarin. This harmony is made unexpectedly addictive through a surprising layer, a traditionally masculine accord of Crystal Moss with an infusion of Vanilla. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: A colorful and sparkling opening of Italian Bergamot is softened by sweet and juicy mandarin. Heart Note: An opulent bouquet of Orange Blossom absolute is refreshed with a Golden Gardenia accord. Base Note: An unexpected Crystal Moss brings a modern intensity to the base, becoming wholly addictive by the addition of an enveloping vanilla infusion.

product_name: Valentino Voce Viva Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: The sound of your voice, the scent of your fragrance, both a magnetic presence. Voce Viva celebrates every woman’s unique voice in one declaration: My voice, My strength. An invitation to voice dreams, and to live them. Voce Viva, a living voice. A floral reimagining in the spirit of Valentino’s contemporary femininity - couture Orange Blossom absolute and golden Gardenia accord paired with colorful Italian Bergamot and Mandarin. This harmony is made unexpectedly addictive through a surprising layer, a traditionally masculine accord of Crystal Moss with an infusion of Vanilla. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: A colorful and sparkling opening of Italian Bergamot is softened by sweet and juicy mandarin. Heart Note: An opulent bouquet of Orange Blossom absolute is refreshed with a Golden Gardenia accord. Base Note: An unexpected Crystal Moss brings a modern intensity to the base, becoming wholly addictive by the addition of an enveloping vanilla infusion.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster A Face Cleanser 150ml
description: Less is more. Especially when it comes to your face. Cleaning with normal soap will strip skin of natural oils and protective qualities leaving it dry and exposed. 'T&D A Face Cleanser' has been formulated to avoid drying and irritation by exploiting the natural benefits of Tamanu oil, Peppermint oil, Willow bark extract and Bentonite clay. A gentle, natural, peppermint scented formulation designed for everyday rituals, this cleanser gently dissolves grime while toning the skin, leaving you feeling fresh and looking bright. How to use:  Lather, rinse, repeat and you’re ready to go. Use daily. Follow with logic toner and gameface moisturiser (or dark moon at night) Features & Benefits:  Rich in Tamanu oil from Polynesia, an antioxidant wonder oil used to heal scars, treat burns and generally save skin. Natural based anti acne properties, perfect for oily skin, teenage skin or adult acne. A gentle Peppermint scented, natural formulation designed for everyday use. Free of harsh chemicals and will not dry out skin.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Fibre Royale 65g

A strong, natural product that provides strength and hold without adding volume or dulling natural shine. product_name: Triumph & Disaster Coltrane Clay 65g
description: Style is a state of mind, thoughts determine character and our actions define us. When it comes to crafting a look and a personal style, we believe in wearing your heart on your sleeve and shooting for the end zone. We built Coltrane clay to deliver on just such an ethos. It’s for anyone who understands that the best way to get to the dance is to ride along with the band How to use:  Add some Coltrane Clay to your hands, warm it up and apply to the mids and ends. Features & Benefits:  Utilising White Clay and Beeswax mixed with Pracaxi oil and a splash of Brazil wax this medium hold clay is designed to create the perfect hold for those who want a matte, firm, healthy wave that is flexible enough to mould your own way, but strong enough to keep it that way.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Shampoo 500ml
description: Soft notes of Mint mix with Acacia Concinna, Desert Date & Tazman Pepper to deliver a balanced, nourishing shampoo. Sulphate and Silicone free, Triumph & Disaster Shampoo is enriched with Hydrolysed Keratin & Argan oil that will leave hair and scalp cleansed, moisturised and becalmed. Like a girl called Tigerlily dancing under soft light, twirling in the corner. Triumph & Disasters Acacia and Gypsophila shampoo is a deep cleansing, gentle foaming, 100% naturally derived shampoo. The formula is enhanced with fresh peppermint notes while tazman pepper actively treats the scalp, the keratin rich formula ensures volume and structure are kept in balance and damaged hair the chance to recover and rebuild. Sulphate free to avoid pore blockage and brittle hair, Triumph & Disaster Shampoo utilises gentle plant based cleansers to remove build up of excess oils and residual hair products, making for a genuine hair & scalp treatment that has been cunningly disguised as a humble shampoo. Triumph & Disaster is proving that the future is truly now, a green healthy future that focuses on the right things for you and the planet and in the process delivers killer performance to your hair and scalp. Soft notes of Mint mix with Acacia Concinna, Desert Date & Tazman Pepper to deliver a balanced, nourishing shampoo. Sulphate and Silicone free, Triumph & Disaster Shampoo is enriched with Hydrolysed Keratin & Argan oil that will leave hair and scalp cleansed, moisturised and becalmed. Like a girl called Tigerlily dancing under soft light, twirling in the corner. How to use:  Apply to wet hair and scalp, rinse & repeat. Follow with Conditioner. Walk tall, run strong. Suitable for all hair types. Features & Benefits: 1/ Natural ingredients ensures no unnecessary synthetic chemicals on our skin and hair follicles, or reacting with the sensitive surface of the scalp. No SLS & SLES, No Silicones, No Parabens. 2/ Tazman Pepper – calms and treats sensitive and irritable scalp. Used for centuries by the indigenous people of Tasmania for all manner of ailments, this versatile ingredient is a fantastic tonic for scalp health. 3/ Argan oil provides tensile strength and flexibility to dehydrated and stressed out hair, providing much needed support for today’s hair with its natural nourishing qualities.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Conditioner 500ml
description: Yin to your Yang, this Cucumber & Mint fragranced conditioner is the other half of the story, the part where the tanned hero swings down from the trees to save the day. Silicone free, rich in Keratin, Argan oil and fortified with the natural benefits of the Colza plant, this hydrating and calming conditioner is engineered to repair, detangle and destress modern hair, whilst delivering natural volume & shine. Like a vision from the future; green science, rich in logic and loyal to the end. Triumph & Disaster 100% Natural, detangling conditioner delivers a lightweight nourishing formula that restores natural shine and hydrates hair without unnecessary chemicals and silicones. Proving nature knows best, it always has and always will. How to use:  After using Shampoo, apply to wet hair focussing on lengths and tips. Rinse. Walk tall, run strong. Suitable for all hair types. Features & Benefits:  Natural hydrating conditioner – a non oil formulation that will not overload the scalp with unnecessary oils and unwanted build up.

product_name: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Inspired by Rome, a place where past and present coexist, Born in Roma fragrances tell a story of self-expression: a celebration of people living life freely, while embracing their heritage. Born in Roma is a modern Haute Couture floriental. A couture elegance made of Sambac Jasmine to bring a luxurious femininity when blended with Vanilla Bourbon, the most expensive extract in the world. This mix is twisted with a radiant trio of modern woody notes, with a cashmeran accords, for an edgy touch inspired by Rome’s street culture today. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Considered one of the most luxurious ingredients in perfumery, jasmine has been an icon of femininity for centuries. Heart Note: An unusually spicy note adds a layer to the multi-facetted note, bringing a lively turn to this sensual note. Base Note: A refined sense of darkness doubled with extreme sensuality, crucial to the intensity of the signature. Its drydown is spicy and carnal, sensual and distinctive bringing an irreverent twist to the fragrance.

product_name: Toblerone Tiny Dark Bag 256g
description: Toblerone Tiny Dark - delicious dark chocolate with honey and almond nougat - offered in a shiny, travel exclusive black bag of 32 individually wrapped snack-sized pieces. Dainty and decadent!

product_name: Toblerone Golden Caramel Limited Edition 360g
Toblerone Tiny Mix Bag 256g
description: 32 individually wrapped pieces of delicious Toblerone Milk, White and Dark Chocolate with honey and almond nougat in miniature 8g bars - a travel exclusive bag that's great for sharing or as a gift.32 individually wrapped pieces of delicious Toblerone Milk, White and Dark Chocolate with honey and almond nougat in miniature 8g bars - a travel exclusive bag that's great for sharing or as a gift.

product_name: Tissot Seastar 1000 Powermatic 80 40mm Black/Silver Unisex Watch
description: This updated edition of one of Tissot's main collections now introduces a 40mm casing option with the Powermatic 80 at its heart. For this new release, the casing has undergone a subtle transformation, incorporating a notch along its case edges, resulting in a more compact and sophisticated appearance. These timepieces are perfect for those in search of a sporty yet assertive accessory, offering water resistance up to 1000 feet (300 meters) and improved visibility in dim conditions thanks to the Super-LumiNova® coated hands and hour markers. This release features five distinct models, varying in dial colours and finishes from stainless steel to bi-colour combinations, including unique blue to black gradients and exclusive black PVD-coated options. Each variant delivers a unique aesthetic while maintaining the collection's signature sporty yet bold appeal. T120.807.11.051.00

product_name: Tissot Seastar 1000 Powermatic 80 40mm Turquoise Unisex Watch
description: This updated edition of one of Tissot's main collections now introduces a 40mm casing option with the Powermatic 80 at its heart. For this new release, the casing has undergone a subtle transformation, incorporating a notch along its case edges, resulting in a more compact and sophisticated appearance. These timepieces are perfect for those in search of a sporty yet assertive accessory, offering water resistance up to 1000 feet (300 meters) and improved visibility in dim conditions thanks to the Super-LumiNova® coated hands and hour markers. This release features five distinct models, varying in dial colours and finishes from stainless steel to bi-colour combinations, including unique blue to black gradients and exclusive black PVD-coated options. Each variant delivers a unique aesthetic while maintaining the collection's signature sporty yet bold appeal. T120.807.11.091.00

product_name: Tissot T-Complication Squelette Mechanical Men's Watch
description: The exclusive mechanical skeleton movement is proudly displayed through both the front and back of the case. With its minute cogs and intricate mechanism clearly on show, this is a watch that will develop a close bond with its wearer. Blued, skeletonised hands with luminescent inlay add a touch of luxury and practicality, ensuring this watch serves its purpose as a practical timepiece as well as an intricate eye-catcher. At 43 mm it’s a size that lends itself to any wrist and a glossy, printed leather strap guarantees wearer comfort as well as style. All Tissot watches come with 2 year manufacturer's warranty. T070.405.16.411.00

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Stash Box
description: Based upon an old apothecary set, the T&D 'stash box' is a one stop shop of shaving & skincare gold that makes an ideal grooming kit or gift set for a modern man. Stocked with a tube of Old Fashioned Shave Cream, a genuine Badger Hair Shave brush, Rock & Roll Suicide Face Scrub & Gameface Moisturiser, this Stash Box delivers the essentials in grooming & when you are done you have somewhere to keep your marbles, dice, maps & knives, or anything else that you might rightly stash in a box, nice.
