product_name: Tissot PRX Digital 35mm Stainless Steel Unisex Watch
description: The Tissot PRX Digital, a harmonious blend of the iconic 1978 PRX design and the Tissot Digital Quartz (Calibre 4012), brilliantly exhibits a hybrid of past eras and digital influence. Seamlessly blending retro aesthetics with a contemporary twist, it's the timekeeper for today's trailblazers. The PRX Digital, available in 35mm and 40mm options and in a variety of colours, cater to all wrists, while the multitude of features - dual time zones, day-date, chronograph, and more - cater to all needs. Encased in a shell water-resistant up to 100 metres and fastened with a satin-finish bracelet and a triple-blade folding clasp, these timepieces are crafted for both endurance and comfort. The Tissot PRX Digital collection symbolises a journey through time, a tribute to the past and a toast to the future. All Tissot watches come with 2 year manufacturer's warranty. T137.263.11.030.00

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Dichotomy Eye Serum 15ml
description: Dichotomy Eye Serum is our happy collision of two historic foes. In the blue corner: Nature. Wild, untethered nature stacked with the supernatural benefits of Norwegian Kelp, Swamp Maple, Horopito, St Paul’s Wort and Persian Silk Tree. The red corner: Science, brandishing clinical evidence and proven efficacy like a killer dance move. Apart, they are tremendous. Colliding together, they are the future. Dichotomy is now. How to use:  Dot a small amount of serum around the orbital bone, working from the inner to the outer corners of the skin around your eye area.   Features & Benefits:  Dichotomy optimizes hydrous flow and moderates water circulation, reducing unnecessary puffiness caused by modern lifestyle excesses.

description: Gameface moisturiser is a tool to serve and protect you from the elements. Specifically engineered to be light on the skin and easily absorbed, Gameface is a unique formulation of Jojoba extract, Horopito oil, Ponga fern (Cumingii) and Vitamin E, combined with a subtle infusion of essential oils to deliver a fragrance we call 'smoke and wood'. The result is a nutrient-rich, hydrating cream that will leave skin feeling toned, supple and fresh.  A great moisturiser should add elasticity and toning; it should deliver active ingredients that work with the skin's composition assisting it to stay in balance and uplifted. It should have active properties that can treat and protect the surface of the skin, addressing any surface inflammation or abrasions. And of course, it should work to hydrate the skin, locking in the good oil to keep skin enriched and healthy. Ladies & Gentlemen we present to you ‘Gameface’. How to use: 1. Place a small amount on the palm of your hand 2. Massage into face and neck for a natural, soothing and hydrating experience. Adjust the amount to suit yourself. Dry skin may need a larger amount, oily skin types will require less. 3. Massage until absorbed & attack the day Features & Benefits:  Your skin's natural oils and dead skin cells combine to create a natural barrier on your skin that serves two purposes: one is to keep nasties out; the other is to keep the good stuff – like moisture, in. Everyday exposure to the elements chips away at this natural protection. Moisturising regularly with high quality, naturally engineered products like Gameface combats this process and acts to level the playing field in the fight between your skin and the world.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster A+R Soap 130g
description: Almond Milk & Rosehip Oil Soap (130g / 4.58Oz ) infused with a bespoke natural T&D fragrance inspired by a walk in the Whatipu bush. A+R is Freedom Soap for the Rebel Alliance still keeping the faith. How to use:  Work in a lather and apply generously to the hands and body. Features & Benefits:  Infused with an exotic blend of Cedar, Juniper, Cypress and Bergamot to deliver a bespoke T&D aroma that was inspired by a walk in Auckland’s ‘Whatipu bush’

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Rock & Roll Scrub 145g
description: Skin grows old and peels naturally. Left to their own devices dead layers of skin will sit on the surface until they either flake or are brushed away. Beneath dead skin pores build up deposits of sebum, the oil our skin naturally produces. Over time these deposits collect particles of dirt creating blackheads and unhealthy looking skin. Regular exfoliation with a well balanced and complete face scrub like Rock & Roll Scrub will remove this build up of unwanted material, cleaning out dirty pores and revealing the fresh layers of good skin underneath. Infused with a unique natural fragrance that we call 'Smoke and Wood', Rock & Roll Scrub is engineered with safe, efficient science combined with natural ingredients to be your own personal 'Mr WOLFE' for the face. How to use:  We say rock & roll face scrub is good twice a week; once for business and once for pleasure. We recommend Monday’s and Fridays to start and end the week feeling fresh. Lather on hand then rub into the face and pores for a deep rigorous cleanse. Features & Benefits: 1/ Bespoke 100% natural fragrance we call ‘smoke and wood’, because it reminds us of a great weekend. It also reflects the earthy herbal nature of this ingredient. 2/ Volcanic Ash is created when solid rock shatters and magma separates into minute particles during volcanic activity. A little like diamonds, this stuff is created under pressure. As a result this amazing organic matter is the star ingredient for a hard working face scrub. It acts as a natural abrasive and combines perfectly with natural clays for deep exfoliation. 3/ Two types of Clay – Green Clay and Kaolin rich in nutrients to draw out impurities. These two clays work in combination to rid the skin of unwanted oil and grime by drawing excess oil to the surface so that the Volcanic Ash can slough it away.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Old Fashioned Shave Cream 100ml
description: This Old-Fashioned Shave Cream reminds us that shaving is a skill passed down from generation to generation and as such, a thing of true value, like a good piece of advice. It's part ritual, part preparation, all 'you' time.  Triumph & Disaster Shave Cream delivers a great shave without any of the nasties we now frown upon. Unique aromas of old school medicinal notes, bright, fresh citrus tones and a hint of Turkish barbershop at the back end, evoke a sense of tradition and nostalgia befitting a gentleman's morning ritual.   How to use:  Rinse face with warm water to open pores and soften the hair. Using either palm or a Shave brush, apply cream directly to the face and bristles, work into foam with a swirling motion to lift and expose the hair follicle. Using a fresh razor shave clean. Lock in your fine work with Gameface moisturiser and attack the day. Features & Benefits: 1/ The best old-school knowledge with the best of modern (natural) science – produces a super smooth and unbeatable close shave. 2/ No Denatured Alcohol or Concentrated Menthols. Natural non irritant focused shave cream – ideal for sensitive skin. 3/ Natural Lanolin and Coconut formulation. Gentle natural ingredients that combine to produce a super thin slick and soft gentle foam.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster YLF Body Wash 500ml
description: Despite our best efforts we are forced to acknowledge that in today’s world time is scarce and speed often the order of the moment, so we get what we have right here, which is YLF. Built the way we want it, which is the way you will have it - rich in Argan oil, Green tea, Vitamin E and Kawakawa extract. YLF is a genuine ‘head, shoulders, knees and toes', that delivers a pleasant, slightly medicinal, Sandalwood and Neroli infused hit on the nose. It is a wash for those with too little time and too much to get done. How to use:  A genuine 'head, shoulders, knees and toes', meaning it can do it all, wash the body, clean the hair and even lather for a shave. Features & Benefits: When we designed YLF we asked ourselves what should the perfect wash actually do, the answer, four things; 1/ The perfect all-rounder – YLF is T&D’s head, shoulders, knees and toes. Meaning it can do it all, wash the body, clean the hair and even lather for a shave. 2/ Hydrate the skin; we utilise the smoothing and hydrating effects of Argan oil and plant-based surfactants.  3/ It should smell great – but not be too strong or overpowering, because you are in the shower, not a car wash. The sweet combination of Neroli and Sandalwood delivers on this herbal, woody promise. 4/ It should be nutrient-rich – nothing ensures this more than the combination of Argan oil, Kawakawa and Green tea leaf extract.  YLF actively protects the skin’s natural lipid balance and avoids stripping the skin of its moisture and nutrients, it is free of denatured alcohol and concentrated menthols - Triumph & Disaster does not use these ingredients ever.

product_name: Triumph & Disaster Old Fashioned Shave Cream 90ml
description: This Old-Fashioned Shave Cream reminds us that shaving is a skill passed down from generation to generation and as such, a thing of true value, like a good piece of advice. It's part ritual, part preparation, all 'you' time.  Triumph & Disaster Shave Cream delivers a great shave without any of the nasties we now frown upon. Unique aromas of old school medicinal notes, bright, fresh citrus tones and a hint of Turkish barbershop at the back end, evoke a sense of tradition and nostalgia befitting a gentleman's morning ritual.   How to use:  Rinse face with warm water to open pores and soften the hair. Using either palm or a Shave brush, apply cream directly to the face and bristles, work into foam with a swirling motion to lift and expose the hair follicle. Using a fresh razor shave clean. Lock in your fine work with Gameface moisturiser and attack the day. Features & Benefits: 1/ The best old-school knowledge with the best of modern (natural) science – produces a super smooth and unbeatable close shave. 2/ No Denatured Alcohol or Concentrated Menthols. Natural non irritant focused shave cream – ideal for sensitive skin. 3/ Natural Lanolin and Coconut formulation. Gentle natural ingredients that combine to produce a super thin slick and soft gentle foam.

product_name: Two Paddocks Pinot Noir 750ml
description: The flagship from two paddocks – an organically grown barrel selection from the family’s properties. in 2015 this wine was produced from all four of the neill’s central otago vineyards. these small sites are high-density planted in a range of clonal material cropped to under 5 tonne per hectare with most vineyard practices carried out by hand. as in the vineyard, the wine is hand crafted using traditional methods including a 25% whole bunch indigenous fermentation and hand plunging. maturation is in french barriques for 11 months, using a mix of older and new (25%) barrels.

product_name: Twelfth Hour Dry Gin 700ml
description: Twelfth hour dry gin is a crisp and refreshing gin with bursts of fresh citrus. The fragrant kaffir lime leaves provide floral aromatics and slight spicy note with lingering citrus that leads to a pleasant tingle on the tongue. Twelfth hour gin is best enjoyed with a good quality tonic or Soda with a twist of lime, or if you’re a bit more adventurous it’s a perfect dry martini gin. Alcohol:  43%

product_name: Picnic Riesling 750ml
description: The jovial chap with a pipe is sidney neill, importer of french wines (among other things) enjoying a picnic at karitane beach, otago circa 1919. Featuring the proprietor’s grandfather, sydney neill – wine merchant, on the label, picnic is our perennial favourite – the wine to enjoy everyday and a wonderful introduction to the pleasure of central otago pinot noir.

product_name: Picnic Central Otago Pinot Noir 750ml
description: Lifted red fruit, greengage, plum and spice aromatics. followed by a rich textural palate showing great density of fruit with lovely elegance, charm and persistence.

product_name: Valentino Born In Roma Donna Eau De Parfum Intense 50ml
description: An outstanding tribute to Rome and its sunsets, Born In Roma Intense aims at exalting your magnificent personality, celebrating a night in the eternal city. The scent of this Born in Roma fragrance amplifies the Born In Roma addiction by pushing powerful vanilla. This is enhanced by a trio of luminous Jasmine and warm benzoin giving a seductive allure to the Aristo punks evenings. This bewitching magnetic and floral Couture fragrance is designed for those who live intensely and passionately with a touch of extravagance.  Born In Roma Intense allows cool kids to express themselves with intensity and experience life with abundance and duality. This iconic duo playfully challenges the rivalry between day and night, classic and intensity and you and me. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: An ambery and solar vanilla bourbon note takes on new amplifying powers. This bewitching and enveloping vanilla is lifted by notes of bergamot and blackcurrant accord. The audacious Born In Roma signature is pushed into addiction with this intense accord in a seductive manner. Heart Note: The powerful and sensual trio of jasmine creates the heart of the scent revealing a luminous, creamy and modern florality offering opulence. Base Note: The scent of this Born In Roma fragrance becomes infinitely sensual with warm notes thanks to benzoin resin, again amplifying the magnetic vanilla into extravagance.

product_name: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Eau De Toilette 100ml
description: Inspired by Rome, a place where past and present coexist, Born in Roma fragrances tell a story of self-expression. A celebration of people living life freely, while embracing their heritage by twisting the classic with the unexpected into new fragrance statements. Born in Roma Uomo is a woody vetiver aromatic fragrance. A cool vibrating facet of mineral salt and spicy ginger twists the classic signature of aromatic sage and smoked vetiver. Born in Roma Uomo is a statement of personality. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: An unconventional ingredient for a masculine fragrance provides a floral twist of freshness. Heart Note: A blend of aromatic sage bring a powerful, earthy scent to the heart of the fragrance, for a sense of timeless elegance. Base Note: Smoked vetiver ties the fragrance together with smoky texture.

product_name: Valentino Born In Roma Uomo Eau De Parfum Intense 50ml
description: An outstanding tribute to Rome and its sunsets, Born In Roma Intense aims at exalting your magnificent personality, celebrating a night in the eternal city. The scent of this Born In Roma fragrance amplifies the Born In Roma addiction by pushing powerful vanilla infusion. This unsweetened and leathery note is intensified by the Heart of vetiver and lifted with a floral and aromatic freshness thanks to lavandin. This vibrating scent is a playful duel between an explosion of freshness and deep sensuality. Born In Roma Intense allows cool kids to express themselves with intensity and experience life with abundance and duality. This iconic duo playfully challenges the rivalry between day and night, classic and intensity and you and me. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: An ambery vanilla bourbon infusion note takes on new amplifying powers. This bewitching and enveloping vanilla is lifted by notes of ginger, known to oscillate between citrus and spicy notes. The audacious Born In Roma signature is pushed into addiction with this intense accord in a seductive manner. Heart Note: A nutmeg awakened by a salty accord lifted by the lavandin bringing a vibrant heart to the fragrance. A flaring aromatic note creating a spicy and woody scent. Base Note: The smoked vetiver exploits the natural elegance of woody notes contributing to the hypnotic aura of the fragrance. This ambery fougere makes the scent extremely addictive.

product_name: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Inspired by Rome, a place where past and present coexist, Born in Roma fragrances tell a story of self-expression: a celebration of people living life freely, while embracing their heritage. Born in Roma is a modern Haute Couture floriental. A couture elegance made of three Jasmine to bring a luxurious femininity when blended with Vanilla Bourbon, the most expensive extract in the world. This mix is twisted with a radiant trio of modern woody notes, for an edgy touch inspired by Rome’s street culture today. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Considered one of the most luxurious ingredients in perfumery, jasmine has been an icon of femininity for centuries. Heart Note: An unusually spicy note adds a layer to the multi-facetted note, bringing a lively turn to this sensual note. Base Note: A refined sense of darkness doubled with extreme sensuality, crucial to the intensity of the signature. Its drydown is spicy and carnal, sensual and distinctive bringing an irreverent twist to the fragrance.

product_name: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Coral Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: With Born in Roma Coral Fantasy, Valentino invites you to a new Rome at sunset. As coral light floods the skyline, it’s time for a new expression of fantasy: inspired by the cultural magnificence of Rome, in a moment of your own making. Born in Roma Donna Coral Fantasy is a floral fruity scent energized by a colorful pink gold kiwi accord. Blended with feminine Rose Accords and Jasmin Grandiflorum, this fragrance reveals a bright contemporary femininity Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Floral and fruity, built through the association of energetic orange, feminine rose and an aerial Jasmin grandiflorum, creating the feeling of lightness, with a scent. Heart Note: The rose accord brings unmatched femininity into the mix.The luminous and silky aroma softens the notes, blooming like an incomparable bouquet. Base Note: A unique signature thanks to the warmth and softness of Musks note combined with the edginess of Ambrette Seeds absolute accord.

product_name: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Yellow Dream Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: With Born in Roma Yellow Dream, Valentino opens a new chapter for a world that needs to dream. The color of Rome, the eternal city bathed in yellow light, inspires dreams of tomorrow, new beginnings for now. Born from the dream of Rome, bathing in a golden light, this floral perfume, created from the scent of a thousand rose petals is reinforced by the contrasting scent of musks. A scent full of optimism and energy. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: The delicacy of a peony accord captured in a scent. Like the flower, the fragrance’s petals peel one by one, offering a fresh and airy aroma at the top of this note. Heart Note: An airy bouquet blooms at the heart of this fragrance. Led by a delicate Turkish rose essence, obtained by re injecting rose water into a solid form revealing the flower’s fresh green facets, together with its silky, opulent trail. Base Note: This floral heart is soothed by the reassuring, comforting notes of a pure accord. Then in total contrast, the dry down is teased by the power of white musk a sensual white musk overdose that develops into a lingering powdery softness.

product_name: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: With Born in Roma Yellow Dream, Valentino opens a new chapter for a world that needs to dream. The color of Rome, bathed in yellow light, to inspires dreams of tomorrow, new beginnings for now. Signed by the depth and warmth of Rome’s light, Born in Roma Uomo Yellow Dream is a spicy oriental fragrance, built around a tension of comfort and floral notes. It is given an unexpected, generous addiction with a sensual vanilla accord. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: Spicy with a hint of freshness, the cinnamon in this scent compliments the sweet and comforting aroma it holds. Heart Note: Lavandin creates a blooming sense of freshness. The aromatic and floral notes give a refreshing texture to the scent, bringing a level of timeless yet familiar refinement. Base Note: Evolving into a warm and woody scent, the vanilla adds a wholesome and rich touch to finalize the bouquet created by this fragrance.

product_name: Valentino Donna Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Designed for living life in elegant irreverence, Valentino Donna is full of life, and romantic. Inspired by Rome, where past and present coexist, it tells a story of independent passion. A timeless floral scent, created around the distinct couture elegance of opulent Iris notes, Donna Eau De Parfum juxtaposes the flower’s powdery femininity with the mysterious sensuality of Turkish Rose accords, modernized with a touch of Patchouli. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: The opulence of Turkish rose is one like no other. It brings a light to the bouquet, redefining femininity and reframing the softness of a silky scent. Heart Note: Iris’s sophistication complexifies the fragrance, with an elegant twist and a powdery element. Base Note: At the base, patchouli’s woody and earthy notes deepen the bouquet into a powerful chypre scent, tying the fragrance together.

product_name: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Inspired by Rome, a place where past and present coexist, Born in Roma fragrances tell a story of self-expression. A celebration of people living life freely, while embracing their heritage by twisting the classic with the unexpected into new fragrance statements.  Born in Roma Uomo is a woody vetiver aromatic fragrance. A cool vibrating facet of mineral salt and spicy ginger twists the classic signature of aromatic sage and smoked vetiver. Born in Roma Uomo is a statement of personality. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. Celebrate your uniqueness with 3 duos to reveal the different aspects of your personality. Fragrance Notes: Top Note: An unconventional ingredient for a masculine fragrance provides a floral twist of freshness. Heart Note: A blend of aromatic sage bring a powerful, earthy scent to the heart of the fragrance, for a sense of timeless elegance. Base Note: Smoked vetiver ties the fragrance together with smoky texture.

product_name: Valentino Uomo Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Valentino Uomo is a classic Italian style, contemporary and uplifting scent. It’s been refined and crafted with the finest of materials and has a scent of aromatic, smooth and leathery men’s fragrance. The composition opens with bergamot and myrtle, succeeded in the heart by roasted coffee combined with gianduja cream, on a rich base created of cedar and precious leather. INGREDIENTS:  ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA/WATER/EAU, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, METHYL CYCLODEXTRIN, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, CITRAL, ALCOHOL, TRIS CITRATE, FARNESOL, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, EXT. D&C VIOLET NO. 2 (CI 60730), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 (CI 42090), FD&C RED NO. 4 (CI 14700).

product_name: Tissot Gentleman Powermatic 80 Open Heart Men's Watch
description: The understated exterior of the Gentleman collection hides the innovation at the heart of the automatic range. The Powermatic 80 movement is even more precise thanks to its silicon balance spring that offers additional resistance to the magnetic fields we encounter in everyday life. Open Heart models in the collection use innovative Nivachron balance springs to the same effect. With 80 hours of power reserve, it’s a movement that can keep pace with busy lifestyles. These Gentleman models are truly an impressive offering. All Tissot watches come with 2 year manufacturer's warranty. T127.407.11.041.01

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Cat Eye Havana On Tiffany Blue / Brown Gradient 0TF4089B Sunglasses
description: Tiffany Eyewear echoes the spirit of the House’s jewelry collections, its heritage of craftsmanship and 180-year legacy of innovation. With an array of classic to contemporary styles, every pair of Tiffany Eyewear arrives in the famous Tiffany Blue Box®. Size: 58 Bridge: 16mm Temple: 140mm Fitting: Global - Frame Material: Acetate Lens Shape: CAT EYE Frame Colour: HAVANA ON TIFFANY BLUE Lens Colour: BROWN GRADIENT

product_name: Thomson Whisky Manuka Smoke Pr 700ml 46%
description: Thomson Whisky brings you an update from the barrel. Made from 100% New Zealand grown malted barley, smoked using Manuka wood, and distilled through a hand beaten copper pot still, it’s our Manuka Smoke release in its youth. This ‘work in progress’ bottling offers natural smoke, cinnamon, clove, and Manuka oils.

product_name: Thomson Whisky Two Tone 700ml 40%
description: Two Tone refers to the two kinds of cask used for the maturation of this whisky; European oak which formerly held New Zealand red wine and American white oak used exclusively for whisky.  Taste: Find sea air and caramelised fruits on the nose, followed by red berries, apricot and spice on the palate.  In place of an age statement the infinity symbol marking this bottling is symbolic of the marriage of casks.

product_name: Thomson Whisky Island Peat Pr 700ml 46%
description: Thomson Whisky brings you an update from the barrel. Made from 100% New Zealand grown malted barley, smoked using South Island Peat, and distilled through our copper pot still, it’s our Peated release in its youth. Notes on flavour – iodine, smoke, and sweet vanillins.

product_name: The True Honey Co. Golden Pair Gift Set, 500g
description: Indulge in the essence of true wellness with The True Honey Co. Golden Pair Gift Set. Get two 1250 MGO/26 UMF™ pure mānuka honeys, beautifully paired together for gifting, for just $498 – usually $573 Sourced from pristine New Zealand forests and crafted for everyday ritual, this is the ultimate in luxurious, ultra-high MGO/ UMF™ mānuka honey. Stir in a warm drink, add to a smoothie, or simply savour from a spoon each day, and enjoy the feeling that you’re putting the very best into your body.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Women's 3-Piece Eau De Parfum + Body Lotion Gift Set
description: The Tiffany Eau de Parfum Holiday Gift Set for her is the perfect gift for the holiday season. Tiffany Eau de Parfum for Women is a radiant and modern floral fragrance that opens with vibrant top notes of vert de mandarine. At its heart, the precious iris flower adds strength and femininity that grounds the composition of this perfume with refinement and sophistication. This perfume for women gives the skin a sensual, long-lasting finish with warm nuances of patchouli wrapped in gentle musky notes. The Tiffany Perfumed Body Lotion is hydrating on the skin, leaving it soft and lightly scented with the radiant and modern notes of the Tiffany Eau de Parfum signature scent. This holiday gift set contains:  - Tiffany Eau de Parfum for Women 2.5oz - Tiffany Body Lotion for Women 3.3oz - Tiffany Eau de Parfum for Women .16oz

product_name: The Singleton 14YO Single Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: Lavish layers of silken texture ripple in the gentle breeze, catching the vivid light of the stunning French coastline, glowing resplendently. Shimmering gold, kissed by the gentle fig and citrus aromas of the coastal air, the stunning gown possesses an indulgent allure. Luminous and enchanting, it is the masterpiece of a silk atelier.  Alcohol:  55%

product_name: The Oamaruvian Revolution Single Malt Whisky 500ml
description: Tasting Notes: Nose: Cherries, caramelised sugar, cinnamon quills and fresh tobacco, hints of grains, vanilla and orange zest. Palate: Rounded, full mouthfeel with sweet cherries and orange zest dominate the mid palate married with rich toffee and salty, fresh cut tobacco on the sides. Finish: Long, spicy finish with toffee, cinnamon with mild rooibos. Alcohol:  46%

product_name: The Oamaruvian Cask Strength Whiskey 500ml
description: The Oamaruvian Cask Strength is now available as a bold & beautiful single malt whisky. After maturing in ex-bourbon barrels for 3 years, the Oamaruvian has gained a beautiful rusty red, burnt umber colour while ageing in NZ pinot noir barrels for an additional 1.5 years. With rich flavours of christmas cake, spices and madeira – this single malt whisky is bold and heavy – yet elegant, like an elephant dressed up in a ballet tutu. Big but surprisingly smooth.  52.4% Alcohol

product_name: The People's South Australia Shiraz 750ml
The People's Hawke's Bay Chardonnay 750ml
The People's South Eastern Australia Merlot 750ml
The Cardrona Single Malt Whisky The Falcon Single Malt 700ml
description: An exquisite trinity of three hand-selected casks, drawn from some of Cardrona Distillery's oldest stocks and reduced to 52% abv. Burnt toffee. Vanilla cream. Sun-scorched nectarine. Pepper. The Falcon was awarded two category titles and a gold medal at the 2024 World Whisky Awards. Alcohol:  52%

product_name: Teremana Anejo Tequila 1L
description: At Teremana we have a simple goal; to create a high quality, responsibly sourced tequila that brings people together. Teremana means spirit of the earth. From taking care of the land where we source our agave, to the painstaking process of creating our tequila, to the people we work and spend time with. Utilizing 100% brick oven roasting allows Teremana to bring out the bright citrus flavours of our 100% blue Weber Highlands agave. Crafted in a small Mexican town, amidst the highest peaks of the Jalisco Highlands, Teremana Anejo aged in American Whisky Barrels and has elegant taste of rich warm oak, vanilla and roasted agave with a lightly sweet and complex finish. Made in small batches, by hand, gluten free. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Ardmore Tradition 1L
description: Sweet with light peat to start off with. Bourbon cask influence as I pick up vanilla, some smoked honey (if it’s not a thing, it should be a thing), pear drops and light toffee. Cereal developing latterly. Taste: Light on the peat and there’s a youthful note there but it’s not harsh. The whole thing has a softness about it. The honey’s there but it’s joined by citrus and pudding spices. Very approachable. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Te Mata Estate Merlot Cabernets 750ml
description: Wonderfully aromatic and complex nose of red and black plums and wild berries layered with dried herbs, spice and cedar. The palate is soft and enticing, mid-weight and balanced with beautifully ripe raspberries and plum to the fore with powdery tannins and a savoury complexity finishing long and satisfying. Established in 1896, Te Mata Estate remains family owned, producing internationally recognized wines exclusively from its Hawke's Bay vineyards. The Estate's ownership varied frequently until John and Wendy Buck acquired it in 1978. John and Wendy instigated a twenty-year development program, which commenced with the restoration of the original winery building and the replanting of all of the original vineyards, as well as the acquisition of new vineyard sites. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Te Mata Estate Alma Pinot Noir 750ml
description: This is 'serious' pinot noir with flavours in the darker spectrum and weighty plum characters to the fore. it has a pronounced syrah-esque spiciness and a finish that is long and lasting with creamy acidity rounding out the palate.

product_name: Te Mata Cape Crest Blanc 750ml
description: The winery writes palest lemon green, cape crest sauvignon blanc is all about texture, refreshment and refinement. grapefruit and lime juice on the nose, with notes of white flowers, quince and cardamom, the wine expands into fennel, currants, elderflower, pears, honey and sweet nectarine on the palate. ripe sub tropical fruit is balanced by a long, dry finish with a crisp edge and floral, delicate lift.

product_name: Te Mata Awatea Camber 750ml
description: The baby brother of coleraine, awatea is a bordeaux blend from the hallowed soil of te mata estate. it is a silky, polished wine with much depth and a wavy film of ripe red fruit

product_name: Te Mata Bullnose Syrah 750ml
description: 100% syrah (no viognier) - elegant, powerful wine with intense dark berry fruit and subtle floral/violet flavours plus a seasoning of cracked black pepper. very aromatic and appealing red. classy wine with great cellaring potential. best ever vintage of this stylish red.

product_name: Te Mata Estate Syrah Red 750ml
description: Estate vineyards syrah has a touch of white viognier, a traditional winemaking technique in france’s rhône valley. it introduces a delightful floral aroma and supple texture to syrah’s spicy dark-berry flavours. 13% alc/vol.

product_name: Teeling Small Batch Irish Whiskey 1L 46%
description: Challenging the convention of what an Irish Whisky Blend should be, TEELING® Small Batch Irish Whiskey provides a smooth, sweet and slightly woody flavor that can be enjoyed with every savory sip.

product_name: Teeling Single Grain Irish Whiskey 1L 46%
description: TEELING® Single Grain Irish Whiskey is an award-winning whiskey that has won best in class annually at the World Whiskies Awards since its release, and is one of only a handful of Single Grain bottlings in the world.

product_name: Tenjaku Japanese Gin 700ml
description: Clear color. Aromas and flavors of anise candy coating, frosted fruit cake, honey butter, and pine sap with a silky, bright, dry-yet-fruity medium-to-full body and a smooth, engaging, medium-length finish revealing accents of lemon and papaya custard, pink peppercorn, and lady grey tea. A polished, mellow, earthy gin that will excel in creamy gin cocktails. Alcohol:  37.5%

product_name: Tenjaku Blended Whisky 700ml
description: This masterfully blended whisky features a agreeably pure, mellow flavour. Made in the beautiful surroundings of Mt Fuji using carefully selected whiskies and the finest natural spring waters which are expertly blended to create this distinctive whisky.   Alcohol:  40%

product_name: The Botanist 1.5L
description: This deeply alluring, premium-quality spirit from Cointreau promises to astound and enchant spirits connoisseurs and cocktail lovers alike, with the freshness of the orange flavour mingling with the velvety smooth caress of cognac for an experience of ultimate indulgence.

product_name: The Botanist Hebridean Strength Travel Exclusive 700ml
description: The Botanist Hebridean Strength introduces a new voyage of discovery into the wild, elemental beauty of Islay, our Hebridean home. Progressively distilled and batch produced at Bruichladdich Distillery, this new distiller’s blend explores the bolder side of The Botanist. The result is rich, viscous and complex - a deeper expression of our Islay essence. This new edition is available exclusively in travel retail only. Alcohol:  51.5%

product_name: The Botanist Gin 1L
description: For this, “The Botanist”, small-batch, artisanal Islay gin we use nine of the classic gin aromatics – orris root, cassia bark, coriander seed, etc – and augment these with a heady harvest of 22 local botanicals, hand-picked by our expert foraging team from the windswept hills, peat bogs and Atlantic shores of this Hebridean island of Islay. Alcohol:  46%

product_name: The Botanist Islay Dry Gin 200ml 46%
description: The Botanist is a gin of layered complexity. A progressive exploration of the botanical heritage of the isle of Islay. Nine classic gin botanicals are augmented by 22 local herbs and flowers, foraged responsibly and by hand from the hills, shores and bogs of this fertile Hebridean island. This fascinating seasonal cocktail is then slow "simmer" distilled in a unique Lomond pot-still. Affectionately known as "Ugly Betty" by the master distiller Jim McEwan, the still prefers to work at low-pressure and won't be rushed. So the precious botanicals are gently coaxed into releasing their complex, signature aromatics. The result is quicksilver: a highly distinctive, complex, floral gin with impeccable provenance; a truly artisanal, hand-crafted labour of love.

product_name: The Glenlivet Single Malt Captain'S Reserve 1L 40%
description:
Meet The Glenlivet Captain Reserve, a combination of raisin-rich cognac and signature citrus notes married with the creamy smoothness of our one and only, The Glenlivet. The luscious liquid finds its unique honey and spicy notes through its journey from bourbon and sherry casks to a selective finish in Cognac casks. Bursting in sweet and fruity aromas, The Glenlivet Captain’s Reserve shines as a proud celebration of our Speyside craft, taking you on a golden adventure that begins with the finish. Inspired by Captain Bill Smith Grant, great grandson of our Founder George Smith, our new product will make you wander through the misty glens of Scottish Speyside to the rolling vineyards of French Cognac at every sip. A new taste exploration by The Glenlivet that makes us THE Whisky.
 Colour: Rich Gold Nose: sweet and fruity aromas of honey and apricot jam, with notes of sweet cinnamon bread and subtle sensation of spicy liquorice Taste: succulent flavours of mandarins in syrup, ripe poached pears and chocolate-dipped raisins

product_name: The People's Hawke's Bay Pinot Gris 750ml
The Glenlivet Caskmakers Single Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: The Glenlivet Caskmakers is a new Travel Exclusive series designed to push the boundaries of Single Malt. The first of its kind: two casks, masterfully crafted into one, a feat of originality resulting in a liquid experience that’s as unique as its creation. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: The People's Hawke's Bay Rose 750ml
The Macallan Quest 1L
description: The Macallan Quest might sound like some sort of epic journey to throw an evil chime hoop into a massive sherry cask, but it's actually a Travel Retail bottling of Macallan single malt drawn from four varieties of cask - bourbon casks, sherry-seasoned European oak casks, sherry-seasoned American oak casks, and hogsheads. The name is a reference to the lengths taken by the Macallan team to source the best oak to mature whisky in.

product_name: The Glenlivet Groundbreaker Collection Single Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: The Glenlivet Groundbreaker Collection is a limited-edition series celebrating travel and creatives who forge their own path. In this first Chapter One: The Journey Inwards, we’ve collaborated with renowned artist Red Hong Yi to reflect upon how unique travel experiences shape who we become. The first ever TGL whisky selectively finished in both heavily charred oak and red wine casks. This unique finish on The Glenlivet’s signature style delivers one of the most approachable expressions in our portfolio. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: The Glenlivet Single Malt Whisky Scotland Founder'S Reserve 1L Bottle 40%
description:
The exceptional character of The Glenlivet spirit is apparent even before the cask ageing process begins, a result of the unique lantern shaped pot stills we use at The Glenlivet. For The Glenlivet Founder's Reserve, skilful selection of casks enhances the signature fruity flavours of The Glenlivet with traditional oak casks being complemented by selective use of American first-fill casks to give a hint of creamy sweetness – creating an exceptionally well-balanced and smooth malt.
 Nose: Delicate aromas of citrus fruit, notably sweet orange Taste: Sweet, fruit notes of zesty oranges and pears, with a hint of candy, toffee apples

product_name: The Glenlivet Single Malt Whisky Scotland Master Distiller'S Reserve 1L Bottle 40%
description:
Master Distiller’s Reserve is matured in three different types of wood. This gives the expression its unique flavour without losing the distinct fruity and floral characteristics of the single malt that started it all. Traditional oak casks complement the classic style of The Glenlivet: ripe pear and gentle summer notes. American oak provides depth with creamy notes of coconut and soft fudge. First fill ex-sherry oak imparts dried fruit flavours and spice aromas which offer a deeper complexity and richness.
 Nose: Bursting with ripe pear and soft fudge Taste: Fruity pear flavours with a spicy tang

product_name: The Glenlivet 12 Yo Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L 40%
description:
The Glenlivet 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky represents the signature style of The Glenlivet distillery. This iconic Single Malt is matured in European and American oak casks. The double oak maturation process imparts vanilla notes and gives The Glenlivet 12 Year Old its distinctive smoothness. Fruity and exceptionally well-balanced The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a delicate yet complex character.
 Nose: Fruity, summer-like fragrances Taste: Well-balanced and fruity with intense pineapple notes

product_name: Te Mata Coleraine 750ml
description: The deep crimson colour of Coleraine, edged in royal purple, is the first clue to this wine’s exceptional character. Pure Hawke’s Bay cabernet aromatics leap from the glass – wild blackberry, blackcurrant, thyme, and cedar, all interwoven with that signature Coleraine perfume of fresh roses. The palate precisely balances richness with vibrant energy; modern and varietally expressive, with cassis, raspberry, mocha, spice, and a distinctive minerality that is uniquely 2021. The fruit ripeness is so succulent, it cloaks those profound, chiselled tannins that carry the palate on endlessly. With perfume, power, finesse, and length this is an absolute original. Coleraine is ‘The One’.  Alcohol: 13.5%.

product_name: The Jelly Bean Factory Pop-A-Bean
description: Ready for flavour? At The Jelly Bean Factory we're obsessed with flavour. You too? Good. Join us in our flavour adventure. The Pop-a-bean one bean pops out per time! We've got 36 HUGE flavours waiting for you. We bet you can't just eat one. The Jelly Bean Factory. YES. That's flavour.

product_name: Toblerone Crunchy Almonds 360g
description: Enjoy Toblerone Crunchy Almonds, the iconic triangular chocolate from Switzerland, with a twist. Beloved Toblerone milk chocolate enriched with crunchy caramelized almonds and a drop of salt that take the taste and texture sensation to a whole new level! This travel exclusive pack contains 360g of Toblerone Crunchy Almonds - a perfect and surprising gift. Made in Switzerland. Ingredients:  Sugar, caramelised salted almonds [almonds (67%), sugar, glucose syrup, salt (2%), milk fat], whole milk powder, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, honey (2.5%), milk fat, almonds (1%), emulsifier (soya lecithin), egg white, flavouring. Milk chocolate contains: Cocoa solids 28% minimum. Milk solids 14% minimum. May contain other nuts. Storage conditions:  Store in a dry place. Protect from heat.

product_name: The Jelly Bean Factory 9 Sours Mix Tube 175g
description: The Jelly Bean Factory are the best sharing snack – but only if there’s enough to share. This tube contains 9 Sour flavors, can you guess which flavor? The gourmet beans from The Jelly Bean Factory are made with 100% natural flavors and no artificial colors. The Jelly Bean Factory assortment is gluten free, and gelatine free.

product_name: The Jelly Bean Factory 36 Flavour Gourmet Mix Atrium Box 225g
description: The Jelly Bean Factory are the best sharing snack – but only if there’s enough to share. This packaging contains 36 huge flavors, can you guess which flavor? The gourmet beans from The Jelly Bean Factory are made with 100% natural flavors and no artificial colors. The Jelly Bean Factory assortment is gluten free, and gelatine free.

product_name: The Jelly Bean Factory 18 Fruit Cocktails Mix Tube 175g
description: The Jelly Bean Factory are the best sharing snack – but only if there’s enough to share. This tube contains 18 Fruity flavors, can you guess which flavor? The gourmet beans from The Jelly Bean Factory are made with 100% natural flavors and no artificial colors. The Jelly Bean Factory assortment is gluten free, and gelatine free.

product_name: The Jelly Bean Factory 36 Flavour Gourmet Mix Tube 175g
description: The Jelly Bean Factory are the best sharing snack – but only if there’s enough to share. This tube contains 36 huge flavors, can you guess which flavor? The gourmet beans from The Jelly Bean Factory are made with 100% natural flavors and no artificial colors. The Jelly Bean Factory assortment is gluten free, and gelatine free.

product_name: The Singleton Exotic Spice Grove Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: Inspired by exotic spice groves, where nutmeg trees whisper in the breeze and the scent of honey fills the air. This whisky has been Triple Cask Matured, first rested in Ex-Wine and Rejuvenated casks before married together in Reserve Oak casks. The result is a rich Single Malt with unfolding opulent flavours.  Alcohol:  42.8%

product_name: The Singleton Golden Autumn Orchard Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: Inspired by autumnal orchards with fruity aromas and honied scents. To evoke the season richness, the whisky has been Double Oak Matured in ex-Bourbon and American White Oak casks. The result is a delectable Single Malt, ripe with sweet indulgence. Alcohol:  41.8%

product_name: The Singleton Deep Forest Riches Single Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: Inspired by the rich layers of deep forests, with opulent woody aromas and flavourful ripe fruits. This whisky has been Quadruple Cask Crafted, first matured in European oak before finishing in Palo Cortado, Marsala Wine, and Pedro Ximénez Oloroso seasoned casks. The result is a darkly delicious Single Malt.  Alcohol:  44.8%

product_name: The Shinobu Blended Whisky 700ml
description: A blend of carefully selected whiskies from all around the world, matured in a combination of ex-sherry and ex-bourbon casks, and then finished further in Mizunara Oak. This unique Japanese whisky is made with a 1:1 ration of malt to grain. Nose:  Notes of butter, coconut, mint, grass, old oak and a pinch of pepper Palate:  Slightly Oily with floral influences and hints of Chinese incense, butter and vanilla. Finish:  Short to Medium. Smooth, fragrant, sweet and earthy with sandalwood and vanilla spice Alcohol:  43%

product_name: The Shinobu Lightly Peat Gift Set 700ml
description: Tasting Notes: Nose: Smells creamy and minty with some light peat and a touch of lemon. Hints of charcoal smoke and ash Palate: The peat tastes stronger on the palate, mingled with notes of charcoal smoke, ash, and dry grass and a hint of saltiness Finish: Lingering taste of roasted wood with lots of sweetness from roasted malt Alcohol:  43%

product_name: The Shinobu Pure Malt Whisky 700ml
description: Niigata is known in Japan for its Three White treasures, i.e. snow, rice and sake, and a naturally blessed environment for pure water source. Made in Niigata, SHINOBU (meaning Forbearance in Japanese) Whisky is hand crafted by the creative master blender, Mr. Usami. He carefully selects whisky from around the world and first matures this in ex-Sherry and ex-Bourbon casks. Then finished in precious Japanese Mizunara oak and further matured in Japan. The result is a unique fusion of flavours and dynamic explosion across the palate. Displaying characters of plums, mint, baking spices, vanilla, citrus, toasty oak. Smooth and easy to drink. All natural with no colouring. Alcohol:  43%

product_name: The Shinobu Whisky Tasting Pack 200ml
description: Indulge in the luxurious flavours of Japan with our Premium Japanese Whisky Tasting Experience. This experience offers a journey through the rich and diverse world of Japanese whisky, allowing you to sample some of the finest and most sought-after blends from the Shinobu Distillery. This premium Japanese whisky tasting experience is a must for anyone who appreciates the art of fine spirits. Whether you’re a seasoned whisky enthusiast or a curious novice, this is an opportunity to taste some of the most exceptional whiskies in the world. This set contains:  4 x The Shinobu Whisky 50ml Alcohol:  43%

product_name: The True Honey Co. Digest Lozenges 22.4g
description: Support your digestion and ease abdominal discomfort with a natural solution designed for busy lifestyles. A potent blend of 650 MGO mānuka honey, GutGard™, and ginger, all in one convenient lozenge. Perfect for on-the-go digestive support. Ideal for consuming before or after meals to help alleviate digestive discomfort effectively.  - Contains 87% authentic, high MGO/UMF mānuka honey - No artificial colours, preservatives, or added sugars - 100% New Zealand made

product_name: The Singleton Radiant Spring Garden Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: Inspired by springtime gardens with blossoming fruit trees. This whisky has been matured in our Select White Oak casks. The result is an exceptional expression of Glendullan’s quintessential bright and fruity character.  Alcohol:  40%

product_name: The True Honey Co. Defence Lozenges 22.4g
description: A delicious and easy way to naturally support immune health and energy levels for people with busy lives. Experience the potent combination of 400 MGO mānuka honey, echinacea, and propolis in a lozenge form, perfect for on-the-go support and to keep you healthy and energized to stay on top of your daily schedule without interruption. - Packed with an impressive 90% authentic, high-grade MGO mānuka honey - No artificial colours, preservatives, or added sugars - 100% New Zealand made

Stir in a warm drink, add to a smoothie, or simply savour from a spoon each day and enjoy the feeling you're putting the very best into your body. • 	 100% natural  • 	 Made in remote mānuka forests free from pollutants • 	 Deliciously sweet taste • 	 No added sugar • 	 High potency for maximum wellness benefits • 	 Independently tested

product_name: The Good Blend Cleanse Body Bar 115g
description: This combination is the perfect blend to cleanse the mind, body and soul. Sage is widely known for its cleansing properties and warding off negative energy. The sweet aroma of Lime essential oil has been used to help move stagnant energy.  The infusion of Green Clay brings a gentle exfoliant, it is also known to draw toxins from the skin and cleanse pores.  Suitable for oily and dry skin.  Ingredients: Coconut oil, Olive oil, Avocado oil, Canola oil, Shea butter, Castor oil, Lye, Water, Green clay, Sage essential oil, Lime essential oil, Cedar wood essential oil Directions For Use:   Lather on wet skin, then rinse off with water. Can be applied to body and face. Avoid contact with eyes. Patch test recommended before use. Please leave somewhere to drain after use.

description: The True Honey Co. 2050+ MGO / 34 UMF™, limited release Rare Harvest is the crown jewel of their collection. It sets the bar even higher than before as the new highest MGO/ UMF™, mānuka honey ever recorded in the world – strictly limited to 1000 collectible jars. Featuring two-year-old barrel matured mānuka honey, decanted in amber glass with luxurious hand-turned native timber lid and drizzler nestled in a hand crafted mānuka blossom box - a must have for the discerning honey connoisseur. Ingredients:  100% New Zealand Mānuka Honey How to use:  A teaspoon daily direct from the spoon for powerful wellness benefits  Features & Benefits: • 	 The highest potency available for maximum wellness benefits • 	 100% natural  • 	 Made in manuka forests so remote, the only way in is via helicopter • 	 Deliciously sweet taste • 	 No added sugar • 	 Independently tested

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Sheer Eau De Toilette 75ml
description: A bright and sparkling interpretation of the signature fragrance, Tiffany Sheer Eau de Toilette is a vibrant floral scent with notes of ylang ylang, black currant and the noble iris.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Sheer Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: A bright and sparkling interpretation of the signature fragrance, Tiffany Sheer Eau de Toilette is a vibrant floral scent with notes of ylang ylang, black currant and the noble iris.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Tiffany & Love For Her Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Tiffany & Love Eau de Parfum for Her is a modern yet feminine floral woody scent. The fragrance opens with a burst of bright and sparkling top notes, beginning with blue basil–a botanical ingredient developed exclusively for Tiffany – paired with grapefruit for an aromatic crispness. The sweet floral bouquet of neroli is at the heart of the fragrance, with a woody blend of blue sequoia, vetiver and cedarwood at the base, creating a faceted and feminine scent.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Tiffany & Love For Her Eau De Parfum 90ml
description: Tiffany & Love Eau de Parfum for Her is a modern yet feminine floral woody scent. The fragrance opens with a burst of bright and sparkling top notes, beginning with blue basil–a botanical ingredient developed exclusively for Tiffany – paired with grapefruit for an aromatic crispness. The sweet floral bouquet of neroli is at the heart of the fragrance, with a woody blend of blue sequoia, vetiver and cedarwood at the base, creating a faceted and feminine scent.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Eau De Parfum 75ml
description: The House of Tiffany, renowned for its exquisite and iconic jewelry designs, introduces Tiffany Eau de Parfum, a sparkling floral musk signature fragrance for the modern woman.

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: The House of Tiffany, renowned for its exquisite and iconic jewelry designs, introduces Tiffany Eau de Parfum, a sparkling floral musk signature fragrance for the modern woman.

product_name: Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense Eau De Parfum 50ml
description: Tiffany & Co. Rose Gold Intense eau de parfum celebrates Tiffany’s expertise in precious metals. Maintaining the core identity of our Rose Gold eau de parfum, Rose Gold Intense evolves into a rich blend of sparkling citrus and fruits, tastefully balanced with pink pepper. At its heart lies a bouquet of orange flowers and jasmine sambac, blended with Turkish rose oil and orris butter. The base of the fragrance adds a playful complexity, anchored by sustainably sourced patchouli, warm woods, pink sugar and a marine accord. This fragrance is a sensual sensory experience that is long-lasting and memorable when worn

product_name: Tiffany & Co Rose Gold Intense Eau De Parfum 75ml
description: Tiffany & Co. Rose Gold Intense eau de parfum celebrates Tiffany’s expertise in precious metals. Size: 58 Bridge: 16mm Temple: 140mm Fitting: Global - Frame Material: Metal Lens Shape: PILLOW Frame Colour: PALE GOLD Lens Colour: BROWN GRADIENT

product_name: Tic Tac Bottle Mint T200 98g
description: Easy to carry and fun to share! Tic Tac® Bottle – shaped like a ultra-large Tic Tac® - contains 200 Mint flavored pills to satisfy even the long haul traveler.

product_name: Tiffany Square Havana / Gradient Brown 0TF4185 Sunglasses
description: Each Tiffany creation is a real work of art that features unrivalled craftsmanship and stunning beauty. These TF4185 80153B 54 full rim sunglasses amaze with their elegance and creative excellence. Their square silhouette has refined, clean lines and comes embellished with sleek and sophisticated details. The frame is crafted from a premium-quality plastic and metal and offered in size 54-19-140. For an  unmistakably feminine look, the shades come with Havana frame and Gradient Brown lenses. These outstanding Tiffany sunglasses have already found their fans among women all around the globe. Size: 54 Bridge: 19mm Temple: 140mm Fitting: Global Frame Material: Acetate  Lens Shape: Square Frame Colour: HAVANA Lens Colour: GRADIENT BROWN

product_name: Tiffany & Co. Tiffany & Love For Him Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Tiffany & Love Eau de Toilette for Him is a citrusy, aromatic fragrance with a fresh and masculine scent. An enticing composition, the scent begins with oils of ginger, mandarin and cardamom. At the heart is a juniper-cypress blend, a co-distillation process created exclusively for Tiffany, which brings a sense of modernity to the fragrance. Sandalwood, vetiver and the common ingredient of the duo, the signature blue sequoia note, complete the base of this masterful composition.

product_name: Tiki Single Vineyard Chardonnay 750ml
description: Tiki single vineyard chardonnay a delicate, pale straw green with nn elegant blend of aromas from chardonnay fruit, integrated toasty oak and yeast lees along with subtle malolactic fermentation aromas. a complex chardonnay exhibiting strong varietal flavours supported by a fullness and creaminess derived from extended time on yeast lees in barrel. partial malolactic fermentation has helped to soften the wine and this, combined with the flavours of the best oak barrels provides a wine of density and depth.

product_name: Tiki Single Vineyard Marlborough Pinot Noir 750ml
description: Smokey, leathery notes with complex fruit well integrated with toasty oak flavours. these flavours are enhanced by a acid-tannin balance that gives good length, making this an ideal food wine. 12.6% alc/vol.

product_name: Tiki Single Vineyard Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description: Ripe tropical and passionfruit aromas are enhanced by a subtle herbal background. this is a refreshing, zingy wine with fine acidity and a generously full and textural palate which complement the aromatics perfectly. intense flavours fill the mouth and the wine has a deliciously long finish. 13% alc/vol.

product_name: Tiki Single Vineyard Pinot Gris Wht 750ml
description: Tiki single vineyard pinot gris - a delicate, pale straw gold. very aromatic with fruit aromas of ripe pear and quince and spicy notes.this wine is refined and well-balanced with a full palate with the ripe fruit flavours counter balanced by a soft phenolic structure. the finish is dry with lingering flavours enhanced by a low ph and moderate acidity which provide the wine an element of minerality.

product_name: Strange Nature Gin 1L
description: SEEK STRANGE, FIND WONDER Inspired by experimentation and the discovery of something different, Strange Nature gets its name from its surprising origin and the unusual character that instils; It’s traceable and trusted... Born in one of New Zealands most sustainable vineyards, Strange Nature has true terroir. Quite extraordinary! Going against the grain, Strange Nature was salvaged from a rather delectable by-product - the distillate of the world’s first 0% alcohol New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc wine. Naturally flavoured and distilled with a single botanical, the one that defines gin – juniper. Less is more and you can really taste it.

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Sea Salt Caramel 10 Pieces
description: Life’s too short to eat bad chocolate! Enjoy these Supremely Gourmet chocolates, lovingly made with blended premium Belgian chocolate and filled with delicious. New Zealand favourites. These Salted Caramel milk chocolates are filled with New Zealand caramel and sea salt from Marlborough. They’re a straight up marvel. Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Ingredients: Milk Chocolate (Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Whey Powder, Skimmed Milk Powder, Butter Oil, Emulsifiers [Soy lecithin 322, 476], Vanillin), Salted caramel [Glucose Syrup, Sugar, Water, Milk Solids, Thickener (1442), Butter, Stabiliser (401), Salt, Flavour, Preservative (202), Acidity Regulator (330), Emulsifier (471)]. Chocolate Contains: Dry cocoa solids: 33%; Average Milk solids: 11%. Allergens:  Contains milk and soy as indicated in bold type. Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts. Manufactured by The Chocolate Guys.

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Feijoa Milk Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Real NZ Feijoa encased in NZ dairy milk chocolate and wrapped in coloured foil. Ingredients:  MILKChocolate: Sugar,Cocoa Butter, MILK Solids (Whole MILK Powder, WHEY Powder, Skim MILK Powder, Butter Oil), Cocoa Mass, Emulsifiers (SOY Lecithin [322],PGPR [476]), Natural VanillaFlavourings;  Feijoa center: Non-Wheat Glucose, Sugar, Water,Invert Sugar, Real Feijoa (pulp), Pectin [440a],Flavour, Citric Acid [330], Preservative [202], Salt. Chocolate contains: Dry cocoa solids: 33%; Average MILK solids: 11%; Fruitcontent: appx. 7.4% in Jelly; 2.5 % in finished product. Produced in a plant that also processes products that cotain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts Allergens:  Contains Milk and Soy as indicated in bold type

product_name: Stil Feijoa Vodka 1L
description: We craft our STIL Vodka at the base of the Kaimai Ranges in New Zealand's Bay of Plenty. Using water collected from the Toutou and Waiorohi spring-fed streams, our vodka is triple distilled and charcoal filtered to create a pure, still spirit. Blended with natural feijoa flavour, perfect on the rocks or mixed into your favourite cocktail. Alcohol:  37.2%

product_name: Stil Vodka 1L
description: Triple Distilled Charcoal Filtered Vodka made in Tauranga, New Zealand. Alcohol:  37.2%

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Butterscotch Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Life’s too short to eat bad chocolate!  Enjoy these Supremely Gourmet chocolates, lovingly made with blended premium Belgian chocolate & filled with delicious New Zealand favourites. These Butterscotch milk chocolates are filled with soft New Zealand butterscotch and sweet caramel. Double the decadence. Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Ingredients: Milk Chocolate (Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Whey Powder, Skimmed Milk Powder, Butter Oil, Emulsifiers [Soy lecithin 322, 476], Vanillin), Butterscotch caramel [Glucose Syrup, Sugar, Water, Milk Solids, Thickener (1442), Butter, Stabiliser (401), Salt, Flavour, Preservative (202), Acidity Regulator (330), Emulsifier (471)]. Chocolate Contains: Dry cocoa solids: 33%; Average Milk solids: 11%. Allergens:  Contains milk and soy. Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts.

product_name: Starward Whisky Solera 1L
description: "Solera was our very first Starward whisky. Made using the traditional solera process means there is a drop of our very first whisky in every bottle. Matured in Australian Apera barrels, this whisky is a bona fide Starward Australian take on a traditional whisky.  Tasting notes: Nose / Bright tropical and orchard fruits, caramel and vanilla. Palate / Toasty caramel and creme brûlée, banana, figs and sweet spice. Finish / Juicy and full with a lingering dry spice." Alcohol: 43% Starward Whisky Solera 1L is Travel Exclusive Size

product_name: Starward Whisky Fortis 1L
description: Fortis is a single malt Australian whisky which celebrates Australian ingredients and the red wine barrel maturation Starward is known for. The first higher ABV release for us, Fortis is matured in 100% American Oak red wine barrels to give it a fuller and richer mouthfeel.  Tasting notes: Nose / Madagascan vanilla pods, rich toasted American oak, blackberry jam, raisins, caramelised fig, over ripe plums.  Palate / Upfront vanilla, quince paste, Muscadelle raisins, chocolate ganache, cinnamon & baked banana bread.  Finish / Viscous and long, balanced with a finish of baking spices from the oak and ripe figs & raisins.  Future / Sip straight and savour. Or shake it up in a classic cocktail, like vermouth, campari and orange bitters. Alcohol: 50% Starward Whisky Fortis 1L is Travel Exclusive Size

product_name: Stoneleigh Wine Australia Latitude Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description:
Stoneleigh Latitude is sourced exclusively from what is know as “The Golden Mile”. The Golden Mile is an infertile strip of land ruinning through the very heart of the Rapaura sub-region. Covered in ancient river stones this area is known for outstanding grape growing conditions. The result is a range of wines that aromatically lifted with deep, complex and concentrated flavour. .
 Nose: This wine exhibits aromas of tropical fruit, fresh pineapple and passionfruit with underlying citrus notes. Taste: Honeydew melon and grapefruit zest are overlaid with tropical fruit and a rich, weighty structure. This wine has natural weight and concentration and finishes with a flinty stone minerality.

product_name: Stoneleigh Rapaura Series Marlborough Pinot Noir, New Zealand 750ml
description: This single vineyard range takes the best elements of Stoneleigh and adds in a number of extra dimensions resulting in refined, premium quality wines with more complexity which deliver the most intense expression of Marlborough. This range takes its name from the distinctive stony soils on which the Stoneleigh vineyards are located. The wine has a dark, plummy hue with vibrant raspberry and cherry notes. Smokey, toasty oak also features. The palate is rich and warm, with perfumed Black Doris plum, blackberry and raspberry notes, with finely integrated charry oak. Layers of complexity coupled with finely textured silky tannins round off the palate. Alcohol:  14.5%

product_name: Stoneleigh Rapaura Series Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc, New Zealand 750ml
description: This single vineyard range takes the best elements of Stoneleigh and adds in a number of extra dimensions resulting in refined, premium quality wines with more complexity which deliver the most intense expression of Marlborough. This range takes its name from the distinctive stony soils on which the Stoneleigh vineyards are located. Tasting Notes: Nose: Pungent, with hints of smokey complexity, vibrant fruit intensity, and upfront passionfruit and tropical aromas. Taste: Ripe tropical fruit with fresh passionfruit aromas, supported by white-fleshed nectarine highlights and wet river stone minerality. The palate is rich and weighty, showing enormous varietal intensity, finishing with a fresh crisp acidity. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Southern Comfort 100 Proof 1L
description: Super strength deluxe version of Southern Comfort, this smooth liqueur has a potent kick and is great for giving a bit of extra bite to any of the myriad cocktails that use it. 50% Alc./Vol.

product_name: Spy Valley Envoy Johnson Pinot Noir 750ml
description: Handpicked in the cool of morning, the grapes naturally fermented and were hand plunged in open vats over several weeks. A portion of the bunches were left as whole bunches. After draining to barrels for 14 months, barrels were selected and blended for further ageing for several months before bottling. Red berries, plum with a typical liquorice and floral background. Appearing soft and fruit focussed at first, this wine has a substantial fine-grained tannin structure typical for this site. Layers of dark fruit sit behind the dominant red berry notes. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Southern Comfort 1L
description: This is whiskey at its most laid back. Smooth. Satisfying. With that just-right balance of sweetness and spice. Southern Comfort Original is the one-of-a kind taste you'll keep coming back to. Fix your drink any way you like it. On the rocks, with soda, juice, whatever's handy. One delicious sip, and you feel like yourself.  A laidback blend of smooth whiskey, stone fruits and spices Aroma: sweet mix of whiskey and fruit Body: smooth caramels with a touch of spice Finish: slow and satisfying. Tasting Notes: Color: Medium amber-gold hue Nose: Candied and dried peach, cinnamon, and star anise Palate: The vanilla-bean flavor is pleasant and strong straight away on the palate. The whiskey component tastes young, as one might expect in a mass-produced, whiskey-based liqueur, but it adds a freshness to the flavor profile, which is made more interesting by zippy spice notes of star anise, cinnamon, nutmeg, and black cracked pepper. Finish: The peach and maraschino cherry hard candy finish is laced in spice, but it turns concentrated, almost like cold medicine. The alcohol, too, makes its presence known with a little bit of burn and numbing on the finish. Alcohol:  35%

product_name: Southern Comfort Black 1L
description: Smooth taste. Bold character. Southern Comfort Black brings unmistakable whiskey flavor, with our signature touch of stone fruit and spices. It doesn't follow all the whiskey rules - just always leads to a good time. Enjoy it straight up, on the rocks, or to reinvent your favorite classic whiskey cocktail. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Somrus Mango Cream Liqueur 1L
description: Everyone loves mango! When mango is married with handcrafted rum and real dairy cream, you have a taste sensation that keeps you coming back for more. Inspired by Mango Lassi, this liqueur is like a vacation in a bottle. Alcohol:  15%

product_name: St Remy VSOP Brandy 1L
description: St Remy VSOP is a rounded, balanced spirit that is easy to drink. With its light and subtle nose, St Remy VSOP is excellent served as an aperitif or in cocktails.  Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Squishmallows 7.5 Inch Plush Assorted
description: This is an assorted product and we cannot guarantee which design you will receive as products are selected at random for online orders. Squish time is playtime when you add to your Squishmallows Squad! This ultra-squeezable plush is made with high-quality and ultrasoft materials. Each Squishmallows has a unique name and bio found on the inside of their hangtag. Add this adorable plush to your Squishmallow Squad! Official Squishmallows product.

product_name: Squishmallows 12 Inch Plush Assorted
description: This is an assorted product and we cannot guarantee which design you will receive as products are selected at random for online orders. Squish time is playtime when you add to your Squishmallows Squad! This ultra-squeezable plush is made with high-quality and ultrasoft materials. Each Squishmallows has a unique name and bio found on the inside of their hangtag. Add this adorable plush to your Squishmallow Squad! Official Squishmallows product.

product_name: St Remy Authentic Xo 1L
description: Multi-award-winning across the globe, St-Rémy XO is a rich and complex brandy. Its French aromatic intensity remains true to the style of the House. Intense and aromatic. Subtle notes of wood and vanilla are enriched with flavours of gingerbread, candied apricots, dates, figs and nuts. The taste is subtly spicy and offers a long finish. Offering multiple layers of flavours that make it remarkable to critics and connoisseurs alike, St-Rémy XO can be enjoyed neat, on ice or in classic cocktails. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Squishmallows 3.5 Inch Clip-On Plush Squad Assorted
description: This is an assorted product and we cannot guarantee which design you will receive as products are selected at random for online orders. Squish time is playtime when you add to your Squishmallows Squad! This ultra-squeezable plush is made with high-quality and ultrasoft materials. Each Squishmallows has a unique name and bio found on the inside of their hangtag. Add this adorable plush to your Squishmallow Squad! Official Squishmallows product.

product_name: Stoneleigh Rapaura Series Marlborough Pinot Gris, New Zealand 750ml
description: This single vineyard range takes the best elements of Stoneleigh and adds in a number of extra dimensions resulting in refined, premium quality wines with more complexity which deliver the most intense expression of Marlborough. This range takes its name from the distinctive stony soils on which the Stoneleigh vineyards are located. Tasting Notes: Nose: Complex, warm and rich with aromas of poached pears and apple strudel Taste: Honeyed pears and rich spicy notes. The palate is full bodied and rich with long, lingering flavours leaving the palate with a lasting textural complexity. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Stone's Green Ginger Wine 750ml
description: Produced under licence in Australia by Angove Family Winemakers for over 40 years, the time honoured recipe remains largely unchanged since it was first produced in 1740. Stone’s is one of the world’s oldest surviving alcoholic beverage brands. Stone’s Original Green Ginger is a rich golden brown colour with a powerful pungent ginger aroma. This spicy character follows on the palate where its zest is quite noticeable but moderated by a softening sweetness. The aftertaste is fairly warming and this sensation contributes a certain glow to the palate. Alcohol:  13.9%

product_name: Squishmallows 5 Inch Plush Assorted
description: This is an assorted product and we cannot guarantee which design you will receive as products are selected at random for online orders. Squish time is playtime when you add to your Squishmallows Squad! This ultra-squeezable plush is made with high-quality and ultrasoft materials. Each Squishmallows has a unique name and bio found on the inside of their hangtag. Add this adorable plush to your Squishmallow Squad! Official Squishmallows product.

product_name: Stoneleigh Rapaura Series Marlborough Chardonnay, New Zealand 750ml
description: This single vineyard range takes the best elements of Stoneleigh and adds in a number of extra dimensions resulting in refined, premium quality wines with more complexity which deliver the most intense expression of Marlborough. This range takes its name from the distinctive stony soils on which the Stoneleigh vineyards are located. Subtle melon and tropical fruit notes coupled with toasty oak aromas. Peach and stone fruit flavours combine in a rich and creamy palate with layers of complexity. Alcohol:  13%

product_name: Starward Whisky Two-Fold 1L
description: Two-Fold is an approachable whisky crafted to be enjoyed any way you like. Two-Fold is a spirit that folds together Australian barley and wheat, fully matured in red wine barrels from our famed Australian wine regions. Tasting notes: Nose / Bright red berries coated in buttery vanilla spice. Palate / Imagine a smooth, rich caramel dessert balanced by tropical fruit. Finish / Delicate and long. A delicious, dry finish from a faded sweetness. Mix with / Tonic and garnish with a wedge of ruby grapefruit. Alcohol: 40% Starward Whisky Two-Fold 1L is Travel Exclusive Size

product_name: Stoneleigh Latitude Marlborough Pinot Noir, New Zealand 750ml
Stoneleigh Latitude Marlborough Pinot Gris, New Zealand 750ml
description: Made from grapes sourced from the ‘Golden Mile’, a strip of land covered with ancient sunstones and highly regarded for its outstanding grape-growing conditions. The resulting wines are aromatically lifted and riper in spectrum, a result of higher concentration of the stones inthe area and the effect these have on the vines. This wine displays fresh aromatics, with ripe white fleshed nectarine and tropical honeydew melon coupled with ripe Nashi pear. The palate is rich and warm with spicy floral highlights and tropical notes and a lengthy, weighty finish.

product_name: Stoneleigh Latitude Marlborough Chardonnay, New Zealand 750ml
Supremely Gourmet Peanut Butter Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Life’s too short to eat bad chocolate!  Enjoy these Supremely Gourmet chocolates, lovingly made with blended premium Belgian chocolate & filled with delicious  New Zealand favourites. These Peanut Butter milk chocolates are filled with delightfully smooth peanut butter. Salty and sweet. How yummy is that? Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Ingredients:  MILK Chocolate (Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, WHEY Powder, Skimmed MILK Powder, Butter Oil, Emulsifiers [SOY lecithin 322, 476], Vanillin), Smooth New Zealand made PEANUT Butter [appx.30%] (PEANUTS, Marlborough sea salt). Chocolate contains: Dry cocoa solids: 33%; Average MILK solids: 11%. Allergens:  Contains peanuts, milk and soy as indicated in bold type. Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts. Manufactured by The Chocolate Guys.

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Fruits Of New Zealand Milk And Dark Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Premium Belgium Chocolates filled with three delicious NZ sourced Kiwifruit, Boysenberry and Feijoa fruits Manufactured in NZ from local and imported ingredients.

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Raspberry Milk Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Must try these very yummy Supremely Gourmet Chocolates made with premium Belgium Chocolate and filled with delicious Raspberry Fruit centre Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts Ingredients:  Milk Chocolate(Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Milk Solids, Butter Oil, Emulsifiers [Soy Lecithin 322 & 476], Vanillin), Raspberry filling (Non-Wheat Glucose, Sugar, Water, Invert Sugar, Raspberry Puree, Pectin [440a], Flavour Citric Acid[330], Preservative [202], Salt) Chocolate contains:  Cocoa solids: 31.7%, Fat Free Cocoa Solids: 5.4%. description: Real NZ Kiwifruit dipped in pure NZ dairy milk chocolate and wrapped in coloured foil.
