Chocolate contains: Dry cocoa solids: 31.6%; Average MILK solids: 14.8%; ‍Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts Allergens:  Contains Milk and Soy as indicated in bold type

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Hokey Pokey 100g
description: Life’s too short to eat bad confectionery! Enjoy these Supremely Gourmet Honeycomb delights, made with delicious New Zealand ingredients. Delicious chunks of crunchy yummy Hokey Pokey honeycomb. It’s as Kiwi as you can get. Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Ingredients: Compound Chocolate 65% (Sugar, Palm Kernel Oil (SG) (RSPO - certified Sustainable). Milk Solids, Cocoa Powder, Soy Lecithin, Flavour), Hokey Pokey (Honeycomb) 35% (Sugar, Maize Glucose, Water, Sodium Bicarbonate, Gelatine (Beef), Salt).  Compound Chocolate Contains: 18% Milk Solids and 5% Cocoa Solids. Allergens:  Contains Milk Soy and Maize as indicated in bold type.

product_name: Suntory Umeshu Liqueur Plum 750ml 17%
description:
Plum Liqueur matured in the toasted cask in YAMAZAKI
Using more than 95% of casked Umeshu from YAMAZAKI
This Plum liqueur is aged in toasted oak whisky casks and is mixed with whisky that has been matured in plum liqueur casks to produce a full-bodied plum liqueur. 
Enjoy the fragrant aromas and a rich depth of taste imparted by toasted oak casks, together with a soft, lingering aftertaste

product_name: Suntory Chita Whiskey 700ml
description:
Chita is a single grain whisky was made with diverse unblended
whisky brewing techniques and master craftsmanship
developed over many years at the Chita Distillery in Aichi
Prefecture. It features a light taste and delicately sweet fragrance.
The bottle design features black calligraphy that expresses
the distinctive qualities of Japanese whisky, set on a white
Japanese washi paper label representing the light flavor. Alcohol: 43%

product_name: Supremely Gourmet Manuka Honey Milk Chocolates 10 Pieces
description: Enjoy these Supremely Gourmet chocolates, lovingly made with blended premium Belgian chocolate and filled with delicious Manuka Honey Manufactured in New Zealand from local and imported ingredients. Ingredients: MILK Chocolate: Sugar, Cocoa Butter, MILKSolids (Whole MILK Powder, WHEY Powder, Skim MILKPowder, Butter Oil),Cocoa Mass, Emulsifiers (SOYLecithin [322], PGPR [476]), Natural Vanilla Flavourings; Honey center:HONEY (Manuka), Pectin [440a], Flavour, Citric Acid [330], Preservative [202], Salt). Chocolate contains: Dry cocoa solids: 33%; Average MILK solids: 11%; HONEY content: appx. 7.4 % in Jelly; 2.5% infinished product Produced in a plant that also processes products that contain Peanuts and other Tree Nuts Allergens:  Contains Milk and Soy as indicated in bold type

product_name: Suntory Toki Whisky 1L
description: TOKI, Japanese for “Time”, is a vivid blend of Yamazaki and Hakushu Single Malt whisky and Chita Single Grain whisky. Fifth Generation Chief Blender, Shinji Fukuyo, challenges the conventional hierarchy between malt and grain whisky, highlighting the quality of the Chita grain whisky not as a base but in equal standing to the Hakushu and Yamazaki malts. Basil, green apple, and honey on the nose, with grapefruit, green grapes, peppermint and thyme on the palate.  A subtly sweet and spicy finish with a hint of vanilla, oak, white pepper, and ginger. Alcohol:  43%

product_name: Surveyor Thomson Pinot Noir 750ml
description: Pale to medium ruby color, the  pinot noir gives a gamey / meaty nose over a core of kirsch and dried mulberries with hints of mushrooms and damp earth. medium bodied and elegantly styled in the mouth, the mature palate is in a sweet spot at the moment with lots of lively layers and a good long finish.

product_name: Talisker 10 YO 1L
description: Talisker 10 Years Old - The classic stalwart of the Talisker family. The perfect companion for when the day is done, smooth, smoky with a comforting afterglow.A classic Island dram from the Isle of Skye. Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks, this welcome member of Diageo's Classic Malts series has been recognised numerous times for its excellence.

product_name: Strange Nature Gin 700ml
description: SEEK STRANGE, FIND WONDER Inspired by experimentation and the discovery of something different, Strange Nature gets its name from its surprising origin and the unusual character that instils; It’s traceable and trusted... Born in one of New Zealands most sustainable vineyards, Strange Nature has true terroir. Quite extraordinary! Going against the grain, Strange Nature was salvaged from a rather delectable by-product - the distillate of the world’s first 0% alcohol New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc wine. Naturally flavoured and distilled with a single botanical, the one that defines gin – juniper. Less is more and you can really taste it.

product_name: Strange Nature Barrel Aged Gin 1L
description: Embracing the golden age of strange, the gin has been gracefully aged for nine months in used French and German wine barrels. The aging process has resulted in a gin that preserves the signature flavours of Strange Nature while unveiling elegant characteristics and intriguing complexity. Layers of citrus, berries, and spice, elevate the sipping experience.  Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Strange Nature Pinot Noir Gin 700ml
description: Strange Nature sources rich and full-bodied Pinot Noir grapes from the famed Marlborough Southern Valleys. After pressing the grapes, the vibrant skins are soaked in the spirit, then distilled with the only botanical the gin needs, juniper. Delivering aromas of bright red cherry and wild strawberry, intertwined with savory herbal notes of rosemary and thyme. On the palate, savor the juicy red fruit flavors, overlaid with a hint of peppercorn spice. Alcohol:  41%

product_name: Talisker Dark Storm Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L Travel Exclusive
description: Talisker Dark Storm Single Malt Scotch Whisky is matured in heavily-charred oak casks for an intensely smoky flavour, designed to capture the wild, untamed spirit of a full-blown storm at sea. Tasting notes:A whisky with extra spice and smoke, matured in heavily charred casks. Alcohol:  45.8%

product_name: Talisker Skye Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: Talisker Skye is the latest release from the windswept distillery on the Isle of Skye. Tasting notes:The liquid has been made from a combination of toasted and refill American oak casks to accentuate the citrus and sweeter notes of Talisker, whilst delivering the gentle smoky and salty flavours that are so unique to whiskies from the distillery. Alcohol:  45.8%

product_name: Suntory World Whisky Ao 700ml
description: From Suntory, we have this exceptional blend of whiskies from five different countries, namely: Scotland, Japan, Ireland, and Canada.  The ‘Ao World Whisky’ was originally released for the travel retail market.  The name comes from the Japanese word for the ocean – which binds every continent on Earth!

product_name: Talisker Single Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: A surge of warmth rises through the current, radiating a sweet, charred undertone. The crash of sea-salt spray against the ship’s bow relights the fire of exploration in determined sailors. Against an unforgiving sea the caravel, an iconic Portuguese sea vessel, forges on, braving harsh elements to reach the farthest corners of the earth. Alcohol:  59.7%

product_name: Tamnavulin Sauvignon Blanc Cask Edition Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: Tamnavulin Distillery was opened in 1966 on the banks of the River Livet, deep in the heart of Speyside, the most celebrated whisky producing region in Scotland. To complement the sweet, smooth and fruity flavour of Tamnavulin, this Speyside single malt has been matured in American oak barrels and then further matured in Sauvignon Blanc and Semillon French white wine casks which provide the signature notes of apple, apricot and citrus. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Talisker Surge 700ml
description:
Introducing Talisker Surge, a Global Travel Exclusive offering from single malt brand Talisker. The first Talisker variant aged in 100% bourbon casks making it uniquely rich spiced and vibrant.   Made by the sea; flashes of surging spice and rich honeyed berries electrify the palate, while rolling smoke rumbles underneath. Liquid lightning that stirs the soul and sets pulses racing. 
 Taste:  Flashes of surging spice and rich, honeyed berries electrify the palate, while rolling smoke rumbles underneath, before a delicious chili bite surges forward. Liquid lightning that stirs the soul and sets pulses racing. Country of origin:  Great Britain 
 Ingredients:  Water, Alcohol, Barley, Colouring
with colourant
Manufacturer information: Diageo Scotland Limited,Lochside Place 11-12,EH12 9HA Edinburgh,GB Alcohol:  45.8% 
 Warnings:  Drink responsibly Storage conditions:  Store in a cool dry place.

product_name: Tamnavulin Speyside Olorose Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: The Signature Speyside Malt, the initial maturation takes place in American White oak ex-bourbon barrels then, the spirit is transferred into Oloroso Sherry butts for finishing. Aroma: Warm, rounded aromas which are both complex and powerful with subtle nutty and spicy notes. Taste: Rich flavours of tarte tatin, pineapple and maple syrup followed by hints of thicks treacle cake and orange marmalade. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Tanqueray No.10 Grapefruit And Rosemary 1L
Tanqueray Blackcurrant Royale Gin 1L
description: Tanqueray Blackcurrant Royale is a sumptuous and unique distilled gin made with French blackcurrants and vanilla notes, elevated with a black orchid inspired flavour and balanced with the four classic London Dry botanicals. Alcohol: 41.3%

product_name: Tanqueray No. Ten Gin 1L
description:
Charles Tanqueray created the world’s finest London Dry Gin in 1830 and it is made today to the same classic, timeless recipe. Tanqueray No. Ten was created with this heritage in mind and set the standard as one of the very first ultra-premium gins.
 Tanqueray No. TEN Gin is distilled four times with Tanqueray’s standard gin botanicals of refreshing juniper, peppery coriander, aromatic angelica and sweet liquorice. Whole citrus fruits, including limes, oranges and pink grapefruit are then added with chamomile flowers to Tiny Ten, the still from which the liquid gets its name.

product_name: Tanqueray Malacca Gin 1L
description: Tanqueray Malacca Gin is based on a recipe developed by Charles Tanqueray dating back to 1839. Botanicals include cinnamon, clove, nutmeg and cardamom but the exact botanicals remain a secret.

product_name: Tanqueray Rangpur Gin 1L
description:
Tanqueray Rangpur Distilled Gin was first created in 2006 by adding rangpur, an exotic citrus fruit from India with the zestiness of lime and the juiciness of mandarin oranges, together with ginger and bay leaves to Tanqueray’s premium London Dry Gin. The latter is still made today according to the same classic, timeless recipe that Charles Tanqueray created in 1830. It is distilled four times to remove any traces of neutral grain spirit and to allow the added flavours of a perfect balance of four classic gin botanicals – refreshing juniper, peppery coriander, aromatic angelica and sweet liquorice – to shine through. 

The result of adding rangpur, ginger and bay leaves to the original premium product is an easy-drinking gin with a citrus twist.  
Back in the 1830s, Charles Tanqueray was not afraid to mix up brave ideas in his own unique style. He invented a gin which is still celebrated to this day. The perfect mix of ingenuity, heritage and hard work.  Tasting notes: Rangpur – an exotic citrus from India – ginger and bay leaves are added to Tanqueray gin. 41.3% Alcohol

product_name: Tamnavulin Speyside Tempranillo Single Malt Scotch Whisky 1L
description: The Signature Speyside Malt, matured in American White Oak and finished in Tempranillo red wine cask for a rich, fruity finish to complement the sweet, mellow flavour of Tamnavulin. Aroma: Aromatic, fruity notes of red berries, blackcurrants, rich fruit cake with hints of vanilla pod and caramelised tangerines. Taste: Warm, sweet flavours of figs, maple syrup and toffee apple with notes of peaches, decadent chocolate ganache and a touch of coffee. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Tanqueray Flor De Sevilla Gin 1L
description:
Tanqueray Flor de Sevilla is a unique distilled gin made with Sevilla orange essences and other fine botanicals. Inspired by Charles Tanqueray’s original recipes and the ripening oranges growing on the trees in sun-drenched SEVILLE, the result is a perfect balance of the uniquely bittersweet taste of Seville oranges balanced with the complexity of Tanqueray London Dry Gin. It is best served with Premium tonic and a squeeze wedge of orange.
 Tanqueray's founder, Charles Tanqueray, was an innovator and pioneer in pursuit of the world's finest gin. In this pursuit he sourced botanicals from all around the world and created over 300 recipes. It is thought that his travels to the sun-soaked groves of Spain in the 1860s inspired the creation  of a unique gin liqueur using Seville oranges.
Back in the 1830s, Charles Tanqueray was not afraid to mix up brave ideas in his own unique style. He invented a gin which is still celebrated to this day. The perfect mix of ingenuity, heritage and hard work.   Tasting notes: Made with bittersweet Seville oranges for a fruitful and zesty taste. 41.3% Alcohol

product_name: Tanqueray London Dry Gin 1L 47.3%
description: Created by Charles Tanqueray in 1830, Tanqueray London Dry Gin is made today according to the same classic, timeless recipe. Tanqueray London Dry Gin is distilled four times and has the perfect balance of four classic gin botanicals – refreshing juniper, peppery coriander, aromatic angelica and sweet liquorice. It is best enjoyed with tonic water, plenty of ice and a wedge of lime, but can be used as a great base for a wide range of cocktails.

product_name: Taylor's 20 Year Old Tawny Port 750ml
description:
Taylor’s is one of the most highly respected producers of aged tawny port wines. 20 year old tawny port is fully matured in seasoned oak casks each holding about 630 litres of wine. here, over many years of ageing, the port wine gradually takes on its characteristic amber ‘tawny’ colour, slowly developing the complex mellow flavours and the smooth luscious palate which are the hallmarks of this style of port. 

taylor’s blends its magnificent 20 year old tawny ports from its extensive reserves of old cask aged ports matured in the firm’s cool and tranquil cellars (known as ‘lodges’) in oporto on portugal’s atlantic coast. 

in the 20 year old tawny, the fruit has mellowed further than in the 10 year old, and the spicy, nutty aromas of ageing are more powerful and intense.

the most popular 20 year old aged tawny port in the united states of america.

these port wines are bottled when ready to drink and do not require any further ageing in bottle.

product_name: Taylor's 10 Year Old Tawny Port 750ml
description: From the grand masters in port comes taylor's 10 year old tawny from portugal. it is derived from maturation in 630 litre casks and is noted for its delicate wood notes combined with gentle scented, sweet ripe red fruits. displays lovely fresh lemon, spice, floral and caramel notes with a hint of honey. drier than typical aussie tawnies, but very enjoyable with power and a very long finish.

product_name: Taylor's Fine Ruby Port 750ml
description: As they age, they gain smoothness and elegance while retaining their fruitiness, intensity and youthful ruby colour.  they are then blended together for balance and consistency. with its firm tannins and concentrated fruitiness, fine ruby is perfect for the classic port-and-cheese combination

product_name: Taylor's Fine Tawny Port 750ml
description: Mellow nose of ripe berry fruit with aromas of butterscotch, smooth and round on the palate full of rich strawberry jam flavours.

product_name: Snickers Pouch Minis 500g
description: An easy pouch full of delicious Snickers bars in a mini format. Share them with all your friends or family - there's plenty to go round. Ingredients: Sugar, peanuts, glucose syrup, skimmed milk powder, cocoa butter, sunflower oil, cocoa mass, lactose, milk fat, whey powder (from milk), palm fat, salt, emulsifier (soya lecithin), coconut oil, egg white powder, natural vanilla extract, hydrolysed milk protein. Allergens:  Contains peanuts, soya, egg, milk

product_name: Smirnoff Blue Vodka 1L
description: A Smirnoff vodka favourite, Smirnoff Blue Vodka has a delicious, smooth taste that your guests will love. Add to any of the classics, such as a Moscow Mule or martini, or spice up your go-to Bloody Mary. Smirnoff Blue Vodka is Kosher Certified and gluten free. Alcohol:  50%

product_name: Nestle Smarties Activity Kit 136g
description: Encourage imaginative play with the NESTLE SMARTIES Activity Kit Tin. Bring their journey to life with colourful creative fun and the delicious chocolate of four 34g tubes of SMARTIES for a tasty treat anywhere. Smooth milk chocolate inside crispy, colourful shells made with no artificial colours or flavours. Learn through play, the sustainable way. product_name: Skyy Vodka 1L
description: Premium, award-winning SKYY® VODKA, created in 1992, inspired by the progressive spirit of San Francisco. product_name: Shiseido Clarifying Cleansing Foam 125ml
description: A rich and creamy foaming cleanser that protects skin hydration while sweeping away impurities, pollutants and makeup that cause problems, for a smooth, glowing skin.

product_name: Shiseido Extra Rich Cleansing Milk 125ml
description:
What it is:
A gentle foaming milk cleanser that effectively removes impurities, pollutants, and makeup for soft, plumped-looking, and hydrated skin.
Solutions for:
- Dryness
If you want to know more…
A gentle foaming milk cleanser formulated for dry skin featuring internal power resist technology, this cleanser helps remove impurities while softening and strengthening the skin. Moisturizing ingredients remain on the skin for a refined, dewy, and plumped feel. Inspired by the bathing ritual of the Japanese, this Extra Rich Cleansing Milk contains pure Kirishima mineral spring water from Japan to support natural minerals for healthy-looking skin.
What else you need to know:
It is soap-free and dermatologist-tested.
Research results:
Tested in France in April 2017 on 110 people, immediately after use:
- 95% said it softens skin and lifts away dirt and impurities
- 90% said it intensively removes dirt and impurities while being gentle to skin
After 8 hours:
- 85% said it does not leave skin feeling dry and protects its moisture
After 2 weeks:
- 96% said it supports roughness and leaves skin feeling smooth 
- 90% said it refines skin texture
- 91% said is makes skin supple

product_name: Sheep Dip Blended Malt Scotch Whisky 700ml
description: Sheep Dip is a small batch, handcrafted, premium blended Scotch whisky created by Richard Paterson, Scotland’s only 3rd generation master blender. Inspired by the illicit distilling practiced by farmers of old, it marries together 16 single malt whiskies in an enigmatically refined blend that packs plenty of punch. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whisky 1L
description: Blending peanut butter with whiskey? We thought the idea sounded a little nutty too. But it's high time a whiskey was bred to take the party to the next level. Grab a bottle of Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whiskey, break away from the pack and woof down some good times.   The aroma is peanut butter, vanilla, and caramel corn with whiskey undertones. Additional time in the glass brings out butterscotch notes. The thick syrupy entry is candy sweet with simple syrup, orange, and vanilla. Alcohol:  35%

product_name: Shiseido Deep Cleansing Foam 125ml
description: A freshening foaming cleanser with purifying granules that effectively lifts away oil, dirt in pores, sebum, pollutants and makeup from skin and pores for a clear, smooth finish.

product_name: Saint Louis Vsop Brandy 1L
description: Saint Louis VSOP Brandy is double distilled and aged in oak barrels for 5 years. Dark amber in colour, the brandy has aromas of citrus and orange notes with hints of nuts and cloves. On the palate, the brandy has flavours of vanilla, caramel, almond, and wood. Alcohol:  40%

product_name: Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum 1L
description: Smooth, spicy notes balanced with vanilla and toffee. Sailor Jerry Ltd. produces a 92 proof spiced Navy rum featuring a quintessential Sailor Jerry hula girl on the label. As the bottle is emptied, additional Pin-up girls designed by Sailor Jerry are visible on the inner side of the label. The rum is distilled in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It takes its influence from Caribbean rum, which sailors would spice with flavours from the Far East and Asia to make it more enjoyable to drink. 40% Alc./Vol.

product_name: Santa Teresa 1796 Rum 1L 40%
description: Santa Teresa 1796 is a bold and elegant rum created to commemorate the bicentennial of the Hacienda Santa Teresa and the mastery of rum-making. The blend is made of different types of rums aged at least 4 years in bourbon oak barrels that, once mixed, finishes its maturation through the artisanal Solera method, resulting in a smooth, dry and balanced rum, that evolves in every sip.

product_name: Scapegrace Classic Gin 1L
description: Scapegrace Gin is distilled in New Zealand, at the foot of the Southern Alps. 12 botanicals are used, many native, and the result is a gin packed full of citrus and juniper with a hint of spice. 40% Alcohol

product_name: Stil Gin 1L
description: STIL Gin is a proud NZ made Gin. It's easy drinking and smooth on the taste buds. It's very versatile and overall just an all-round great addition to the liquor cabinet. Alcohol:  37%

product_name: The Shinobu 15YO Pure Malt Dragon 700ml
description: Selected with only the finest malt whiskies uniquely chosen to celebrate the Year of the Dragon. Aged more than 15 years in Sherry and Bourbon casks. Finished in Mizunara oak barrels, adding an unparalleled oriental elegance to this special edition spirit. All-natural ingredients and without coloring and other additives. A true expression of fine craftsmanship. A 2020 World Whisky Awards Category Winner. The Shinobu Dragon Year edition is a testament to its distinguished taste and quality. Tasting Notes: Nose: Fresh oak, vanilla, and floral notes, with a subtle touch of sandalwood. Palate: A refined mix of ripe fruits and lemon zest, with hints of leather and a blend of cinnamon and ginger. Finish: Long, rich finish with oak and fruity undertones, lightly accented by sandalwood. Alcohol:  43%

product_name: Scapegrace Blood Orange Gin 700ml

product_name: Sisley Black Rose Precious Face Oil 25ml

With a high concentration of active ingredients, this silky-smooth dry oil prepares, nourishes and has an anti-aging effect: - Rich in omega 3 and 6, it prepares the skin to receive its daily skin care With its powerful blend of plant-based active ingredients that nourish, regenerate and protect (Padi pavonica, Unsaponifiables of avocado and tural Tocopherols), this oil provides the essential elements for the skin’s vitality and youthfulness. It is combined with essential oils of Bulgarian Rose and Magnolia which have toning and soothing properties for a delicious awakening of the senses. product_name: FRUIT LAND SEEDLESS TAMARIND MIXED W/ICING 200G
description: ​ ​ Tamarind is blessed with distinctive shape and flavour. Inside its brown curved pod is moist and sticky flesh with a sweet mellow taste. Having long been heralded for its health benefits, tamarind has been a favourite snack for local for ages. Fruit Land selects only the best tamarind varieties; Srithong and Srichompoo . havested from the orchards under the code of Good Agricultural Practices. Only fully ripened ones make the cut for our production to ensure that the pods are plump with firm and lumpy flesh as well as naturally sweet and sour taste. Our tamarinds are ready to eat as all seeds are removed from every pod. We operate the steamer in a hygienic closed system factory so the tamarinds still maintain their juicy and fragrant flesh. For a full flavour, we mix the tamarinds with icing before having them wrappedd in an aluminium foil to better preserve its colour. You can enjoy this althernative snack anytime and anywhere. ​ ​ Tamarind is blessed with distinctive shape and flavour. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI SI PASSIONE EDP 50 ml
description: Sì Passione, the new perfume for women by Giorgio Armani. A powerful reinvention of the signature Armani fragrance, Sì Passione adds a new dimension to Giorgio Armani’s feminine fragrance personality - in his own words, “an irresistible combination of grace, strength and independent spirit". An intense, uncompromising scent for a confident woman who dares to say yes.  The red lip effect in a bottle, Sì Passione is a bright and sensual perfume that emits confidence, seduction, and strength. Bright and fresh in its initial impression, Sì Passione opens with notes of spicy pink pepper, like a burst of adrenaline. After initially drawing attention, sparkling and radiant pear brightens the iconic juicy blackcurrant to add boldness. A floral heart beats passionately with rose and feminine jasmine to create a powerful scent, like a seemingly fragile woman who shows incredible strength when guided by passion. The addition of heliotrope makes this perfume addictive and acts as an invitation to self-indulgence and pleasure. The warm and sensual vanilla and cedarwood dry down mirrors the self-assurance that a swipe of red lipstick can instantly give the wearer.  Sì Passione, the new perfume for women by Giorgio Armani. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Acqua di Gio Pour Homme EDT 50 ml
description: ​ ​ This aquatic, aromatic fragrance opens with a splash of fresh Calabrian bergamot, neroli and green tangerine. Light, aquatic nuances mix with jasmine petal, crisp rock rose, rosemary, fruity persimmon and warm Indonesian patchouli to create a masculine scent that is both fresh and sensual. Natural and authentic, it is the perfect fragrance for gifting. ​ ​ This aquatic, aromatic fragrance opens with a splash of fresh Calabrian bergamot, neroli and green tangerine. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Designer Essence-in-balm Mesh Cushion #2 107G
description: Designer Essence-in-Balm Mesh Cushion, a cushion innovation.  The formula melts onto your skin giving you ultimate radiance and an anti-dullness effect while providing SPF 50/PA+++ protection. Electric blue pearls and hollow powders combine to deliver instant radiance while glycerin and hyaluronic acid moisturize skin. The high water composition provides a fresh and cooling sensation. The cushion's mesh layer allows for controlled and even application while the three application gestures - a tap, rub or wipe - offer endlessly adaptable coverage. product_name: Giorgio Armani My Way EDP 50ml
description: ​ ​ My Way is the scent of discoveries and connections for an openminded, curious and authentic woman who is ready to broaden her horizons and live meaningful encounters around the world. This feminine fragrance is an encounter of consciously sourced ingredients. Bergamot meets orange blossom from Egypt in a luminous, sparkling start, with an amplified bright floral bouquet of tuberose and jasmine from India as the beating heart. Finally, a vibrant cedarwood from Virginia meets a sensual vanilla from Madagascar and white musks to sign the composition. I AM WHAT I LIVE. *Minimum 3-year shelf life if unopened ​ ​ My Way is the scent of discoveries and connections for an openminded, curious and authentic woman who is ready to broaden her horizons and live meaningful encounters around the world. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Crema Nera Extrema Supreme Clarifying Foam-In-Cream - 150 ml
description: ​ ​ For supreme clarity and comfort, Crema Nera Extrema Supreme Foam-in-Cream Cleansing Moisturizer effectively and softly removes impurities while smoothing rough skin on the face. With a soap-free formula, this foaming cleanser is completely gentle and is the perfect cleanser for all skin types. 1. Do not apply it on the part where you have a scar, eczema, or dermatitis. 2. It is recommended to stop using the product when the following occur and continuously using it will worsen the situation so please consult a dermatologist. 1) When you feel irregular responses on your skin such as irritation, swelling, itching or rash. 2) When the above symptoms occur on the part of the skin where the product is applied by direct sunlight 3. Caution for treatment and storage 1) Tighten the lid after using it. 2) Keep away from the reach of children 3) Do not keep it in places where the temperature is extremely hot or low and exposed to the direct sunlight. ​ ​ For supreme clarity and comfort, Crema Nera Extrema Supreme Foam-in-Cream Cleansing Moisturizer effectively and softly removes impurities while smoothing rough skin on the face. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI My Armani To Go Cushion Foundation Case - Crystals

product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Acqua Pantelleria - 150 ml
description: Inspired by the mythical waters of Pantelleria Island, Acqua Pantelleria is a lotion made from the fusion of four vital minerals and Reviscentalis™, an extract from a powerful resurrection plant. Enriched with grapefruit extract from Italy for its sophisticated freshness and with vitamin E, Acqua Pantelleria delivers instant hydration and comfort to revitalize the skin, for a more luminous, younger-looking complexion. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Lip Power 201
description: A longwear satin lipstick that delivers vivid color, all-day wear and comfort, and precision application with an innovative, drop-shaped bullet. It combines the color of a lipstick and the comfort of a balm. 1. Do not apply it on the part where you have a scar, eczema, or dermatitis. 2. It is recommended to stop using the product when the following occur and continuously using it will worsen the situation so please consult a dermatologist.      1) When you feel irregular responses on your skin such as irritation, swelling, itching or rash.      2) When the above symptoms occur on the part of the skin where the product is applied by direct sunlight 3. Caution for treatment and storage      1) Tighten the lid after using it.      2) Keep away from the reach of children      3) Do not keep it in places where the temperature is extremely hot or low and exposed to the direct sunlight. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Designer Glow Foundation #1
description: A concentrate of pure radiance. Infused with unique Prussian Blue Pearl & precious oils to correct dullness & elevate skin’s natural radiance. Day-long youth revitalization. New formula boosted with derma ingredients (hyaluronic acid & 4 ceramides) to strengthen skin & preserve glow all day long. Use the Designer brush to apply from the center of the face, outwards. Backstage tip: Advise Designer Glow to clients with anti-aging concerns for a firming effect. A concentrate of pure radiance. Infused with unique Prussian Blue Pearl & precious oils to correct dullness & elevate skin’s natural radiance. Day-long youth revitalization. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI ARMANI/PRIVÉ VERT MALACHITE EAU DE PARFUM 100ML
description: The fragrance duo Vert Malachite and Rouge Malachite pay tribute Russia, a land of inspiration and emotion for Giorgio Armani. Vert Malachite expresses the natural expanse and vastness of these magnificent lands with a contemporary white flower, interpreted as a Russian gem. In this delicate, balanced floral fragrance, both fresh and intoxicating, lily and white flowers are infused with essences of bitter orange and vanilla, creating a rich and luminous accord poised between flowers and spices. The fragrance is enveloped in a green stone-like bottle, a colour linked to the earth, the meeting of mineral and botanical. Apply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI LIP MAESTRO 400 THE RED
description: Giorgio Armani introduces Lip Maestro, the first lip lacquer with a comfortable velvety texture and a radiant finish. Lips appear instantly plumped and radiant. The sensual, non-sticky texture offers hours of hydration and comfort. Concentrated pigments permeate the gel formula, offering an intense, seductive, illuminating lip stain.  Giorgio Armani introduces Lip Maestro, the first lip lacquer with a comfortable velvety texture and a radiant finish. Lips appear instantly plumped and radiant. The sensual, non-sticky texture offers hours of hydration and comfort. Concentrated pigments permeate the gel formula, offering an intense, seductive, illuminating lip stain.

product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI ARMANI/PRIVÉ PIVOINE SUZHOU EAU DE TOILETTE 100ML
description: PIVOINE SUZHOU is Mr Armani's tribute to the classical gardens of Suzhou, considered as "the Venice of the East". A celebration of these beautiful gardens crossed by canals and bridges, fed by the great Yangtze River, where pagodas can be glimpsed above the walls of gardens, and where beautiful peonies distill their splendor to the eyes of lucky wanderers. The opulence of the peony is balanced by its own ethereal delicacy, creating a plethora of luminous emotions, from sparkling fruity notes to soft and seductive musks. Inspired by peony's brightness, the juice dresses in a blushing powdery pink color. Apply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Luminous Silk Foundation 2
description: First released in 2000, this iconic GIORGIO ARMANI foundation is still a professional makeup artists’ favorite. Inspired by charmeuse silk, "The Fabric of Emperors," this luminous foundation glides on weightlessly for a flawless lit-from-within glow thanks to the blend of advanced moisture complex and high-impact pigments. Using exclusive Micro–fil™ technology to sculpt and brighten, this buildable coverage foundation improves skin texture and blurs imperfections.  Apply with the Maestro Signature Blender Brush for a seamless, airbrushed finish. Add more layers for buildable coverage. Mix with Fluid Sheer for a quick application and all over glow. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Lip Maestro Satin 08
description: The new skin-on-skin watery vibrant lip color from Armani. The futuristic lip color, inspired by the skin-on-skin satin feel. For the first time, the unexpected blend of 2 incompatible gels in a patented* breakthrough technology makes the impossible triad possible - the color impact of a stick, the care of a balm, and the wear of a liquid. Experience the next generation of lip color When Lip Maestro Satin is first applied, it creates a skin-on-skin, satin-like feel, combined with an ultra-hydrating effect.  Then in its second phase, the feel “flips,” unveiling its unique luminous blurred finish with high-impact color. Featuring a new elevated pack with a new diamond-shaped applicator for a mistake-proof and precise, one-stroke application. Live the unexpected with our best of color-care-wear. All-on-one. *in China, Japan, Germany, Spain, France, UK, Italy, US.  For the most intense, apply on bare lips, starting one layer on the center of the lips, then adding another layer to intensify. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Power Fabric Concealer 3
description: Long-lasting, multipurpose concealer with smart coverage that visibly corrects imperfections and dark circles, while blending seamlessly for a natural matte second-skin finish. Now with an even higher concentration for high coverage up to 24 hours*. *Consumer test on 105 women. For targeted retouching of blemishes, breakouts and spots, use the pointed tip of the applicator to dab the concealer directly onto the spot. Gently blend with fingers or a concealer brush. To cover larger areas such as dark circles, use the flat surface of the applicator to apply an even thin layer over the area. Blend gently with your fingertips or a concealer brush. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI POWER FABRIC+ SETTING POWDER 0
description: Ultra-fine setting powder with a natural matte finish that maximizes make-up wear. Formulated with technical powders to absorb sebum and humidity and keep your skin looking flawless and shine-free for 16h. The ultra-fine pigments perfectly adhere on the skin, providing a transparent film for an non-cakey feel and 24h comfort. Use the white flocked side of the sponge to apply the powder all over the face and matify your liquid foundation, or concentrate on the T-zone to matify the area. You can also use a Blush or Loose Powder Brush to apply all over the face. To use the powder as a standalone without foundation, use the black side of the sponge to build coverage over a primer. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI Luminous Silk Glow Blush #50
description: Silky powder blush that softly drapes the skin with a luminous flush of color so natural that it looks like it’s coming from within. Powered by Armani’s Luminous Silk filler technology, these blushes smooth skin, while delivering a dose of color and a subtle glow finish. The formula is buildable and blendable for mistake-proof application and lasting color that layers beautifully with other makeup. product_name: GIORGIO ARMANI My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar - 50 ml
description: My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar invites you on a sensorial journey, capturing a liberated and free-spirited vision of femininity. This fruity floral fragrance, born from the delightful encounter of succulent Pear and the radiant Tuberose, is encapsulated in a new pink bottle crowned with a translucent pink talisman cap. The fragrance opens with a burst of freshness, juicy Pear accord and vibrant, aromatic Rhubarb accord. These fruity notes harmonize with the zesty Bergamot Heart and the captivating Orange Blossom, creating an intense and invigorating blend. At its heart, a white floral bouquet, unveiling a creamy heart of Tuberose Absolute. A blend of white woods and warm cedarwood enhances the sensually comforting Vanilla Bourbon infusion at base, with the comforting second-skin effect of white musks. I AM WHAT I LIVE. Apply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck. My Way Eau de Parfum Nectar invites you on a sensorial journey, capturing a liberated and free-spirited vision of femininity. product_name: FRUIT LAND Dried Seedless Sweet Tamarind 650 g
description: Tamarind is blessed with distinctive shape and flavour. Inside its brown curved pod is moist and sticky flesh with a sweet mellow taste. Having long been heralded for its health benefits, tamarind has been a favourite snack for the local for ages. Fruit Land selects only the best tamarind varieties; Srithong and Srichompoo, harvested from the orchards under the code of Good Agricultural Practices.  Only fully ripened ones make the cut for our production to ensure that the pods are plump with firm and lumpy flesh as well as naturally sweet and sour taste.  Our tamarinds are ready to eat as all seeds are removed from every pod. We operate the steamer in a hygienic closed system factory so the  tamarinds still maintain their juicy and fragrant flesh. You can enjoy this alternative  snack anytime and anywhere. *Company reserves the right not to accept an exchange, a return or a refund after purchasing unless the defect or damage is caused by the manufacturing process or QC errors. product_name: URBAN DECAY Eyeshadow Primer Potion - Original 10 g
description: Just when you thought Eyeshadow Primer Potion couldn’t get any better, we found a way. With revamped packaging that includes an applicator, our legendary primer looks more gorgeous and applies with more versatility. And the paraben-free formula still packs the powers it’s famous for: 24-hour, crease-free shadow, more vibrant color and smoother application.  Once you’ve tried Eyeshadow Primer Potion, you'll never want to live without it. Our formula glides on smoothly, and space-age polymer technology fills in any imperfections on the skin’s surface, prepping your lids for all-day shadow.   Choose your favorite shade or stash them all in your makeup bag to swap them out as often as you want. Our Original shade blends beautifully on all skin tones and dries invisibly. The nude matte finish of Eden offers full coverage while hiding ALL redness (and gives you a gorgeously subtle look when worn alone). And Minor Sin, a champagne shimmer, is a sheerer version of Sin that we reworked based on customer feedback (yes, we do listen to you!).   Easy on the eyes in more ways than one, this coveted primer now comes in revamped packaging with gorgeous ombré artwork and a faceted, jewel-like cap. Squeeze the Potion directly from the tube or use the flocked wand applicator. Either way, you get precise, controlled application every time. product_name: URBAN DECAY All Nighter Ultra Matte Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray 118 ml
description: All Nighter Ultra Matte Setting Spray’s microfine mist refreshes skin while mattifying and setting your look. No makeup meltdowns here—Ultra Matte's breathable formula keeps makeup looking shine-free and fresh for up to 16 hours without fading or settling into fine lines. So sweat, get wet, and go to the afterparty...no touch-ups needed. If you see white droplets on your skin after you spray, that’s just the kaolin clay and ultra-mattifying effect at work! Shake the bottle 5 times to activate the formula, then prime it by pressing fully down on the pump and spraying it in the air a few times. This ensures even and translucent application. Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free. Minimum 3-year shelf life if unopened All Nighter Ultra Matte Setting Spray’s microfine mist refreshes skin while mattifying and setting your look. product_name: URBAN DECAY Perversion Waterproof Fine-Point Eye Pen - 0.55 ml
description: ​ ​ There are two universal truths about black liquid liner: It can never be too black or too perfect. Nail the look every time with Perversion Waterproof Fine-Point Eye Pen. This super-smooth, free-flowing pen lays down intensely black lines with absolute precision. The pen’s unique cartridge system allows for a constant flow of ink. The ultra fine tip glides on smooth without skipping or pulling, providing a smooth, controlled application. Easily create everything from fine lines to bold, thick lines. The waterproof formula lays down long-lasting black lines with ink that dries quickly and won’t smudge, run or feather. Perversion Waterproof Fine-Point Eye Pen comes in an eye-catching, metallized black tube with pale purple artwork. ​ ​ There are two universal truths about black liquid liner: It can never be too black or too perfect. product_name: VERSACE Versense EDT 100 ml
description: ​ ​ A fragrance combining Mediterranean elements with woman glamourous sensuality. A beautiful bouquet, inspired by nature's elements, conveying freshness and energy. Classified as woody floral musk, its composition opens with fruit of the mediterranean; bergamot, green mandarin and fig. The heart notes are sea lily, jasmine petals and spicy accords of cardamom. Finally, the base notes are woody accords,sandalwood, cedar, olive wood and musk to perfectly complete the composition. product_name: VERSACE Eros Homme EDT 100 ml
description: Love, passion, beauty, and desire are the key concepts behind this new men’s fragrance by Versace. As Greek mythology and classic sculpture have characterized the Versace world since the beginning, so the perfection of the male body is evoked with an allusion to Eros, the god of love. Versace Eros is a fragrance for a strong, passionate man, who is master of himself. Eros interprets the sublime masculine through a luminous aura with an intense, vibrant, and glowing combination of fresh mint leaves, Italian lemon zest, and green apple. An addictive sensuality accented by oriental, intriguing, and enveloping notes like tonka beans, amrboxan amber, geranium flower, and vanilla melds with a racy virility symbolized by woods—such as cedarwood from Atlas and Virginia—while vetiver and oak moss provide intensity and power.     Olfactive family: Fresh-Oriental-Woody  Fragrance Notes: Lemon Italy Opur, Ambroxan, Geranium Flower, Vetyver Love, passion, beauty, and desire are the key concepts behind this new men’s fragrance by Versace. product_name: VALENTINO Donna Born in Roma Eau de Parfum - 50 ml
description: ​ ​ Inspired by Rome, a place where past and present coexist, Born in Roma fragrances tell a story of self-expression: a celebration of people living life freely, while embracing their heritage. Born in Roma is a modern Haute Couture floriental. A couture elegance made of three Jasmine to bring a luxurious femininity when blended with Vanilla Bourbon, the most expensive extract in the world. This mix is twisted with a radiant trio of modern woody notes, for an edgy touch inspired by Rome’s street culture today. Born in Roma fragrance collection: Many ways to be you. product_name: VALENTINO V-Lighter Face Base - 25 ml
description: ​ ​ Take care of your skin with a unique multi-use makeup formula. Valentino Beauty premiers the first multi-use primer with skincare benefits: a lightweight, yet nourishing face base that highlights the skin with a sophisticated glow. Enriched with skincare ingredients, the skin is hydrated and feels comfortable for 24H. The formula also contains an active that helps to reduce wrinkles and has a gel base made of a high content of water that brings a fresh feeling upon contact with the skin. With V-Lighter, imperfections appear reduced, and the skin looks instantly smoother and plumper. Infused with our Roma-Light Complex™, made of ultra-fine light-reflecting pearls to refract back light in multiple directions, V-lighter creates a diffused glow, enhancing the skin’s natural luminosity. This technology delivers a continual healthy radiance that looks instantly bright and radiant, yet never overdone. V-Lighter is available in 2 shades: a ROSA shade, best suited for cool undertones and light skin, and an AMBRA shade best suited for warm undertones and deeper skin. Wear alone, under, or on top of your foundation, the V-Lighter will always take care of your skin while simultaneously improving and illuminating your complexion. ​ ​ Take care of your skin with a unique multi-use makeup formula. product_name: VALENTINO Born In Roma Uomo EDP Intense - 50 ml
description: An outstanding tribute to Rome and its sunsets, Born In Roma Intense aims at exalting your magnificent personality, celebrating a night in the eternal city. The scent of this Born In Roma fragrance amplifies the Born In Roma addiction by pushing powerful vanilla infusion. This unsweetened and leathery note is intensified by the Heart of vetiver and lifted with a floral and aromatic freshness thanks to lavandin. This vibrating scent is a playful duel between an explosion of freshness and deep sensuality. Born In Roma Intense allows cool kids to express themselves with intensity and experience life with abundance and duality. This iconic duo playfully challenges the rivalry between day and night, classic and intensity and you and me. product_name: VALENTINO Liquirosso Liquid Matte Lip & Blush 6.5 ml - 111A Undressed Velvet
description: Blur the lines with Liquirosso, the very first easy-to-wear intense liquid matte color by Valentino Beauty, for lips and cheeks. Runway inspired, Liquirosso is the perfect tool to work vibrant colors in layers, from subtle to intense couture color. Its unique formula contains pigments specifically treated to have better affinity with lips, offering beautiful buildable color coverage in a blur matte finish. When dabbed upon first application, Liquirosso can subtly veil your cheeks to give them a delicate glow. Yet with one stroke on your lips, it will deliver instant striking color coverage. Liquirosso’s innovative formula lives up to the expectations of a vibrant matte color without compromising on comfort and hydration. Infused with peony flower extract, it offers 12 hours comfort and a moisturizing sensation on lips and cheeks. Its perfect balance of volatile oils and spherical fillers ensure the formula to glide softly during application. It blends effortlessly for flawless results with the sensation of a weightless second skin that never feels cakey or dry. As light oils evaporate, Liquirosso gets a powdery finish thanks to the combination of two light-diffusing gels resulting in a blur matte finish. Skin Type: All Skin Type Blur the lines with Liquirosso, the very first easy-to-wear intense liquid matte color by Valentino Beauty, for lips and cheeks. product_name: VERSACE Dylan Blue EDT 100 ml
description: A fougère fragrance. Highly distinctive with a fragrant woody aroma, Dylan Blue is full of character and individuality, an expression of a man's strength. Dylan Blue is the new fragrance that captivates the sensual scents of the Mediterranean. Woody notes of ambrox envoke tradition, while exquisite citrus-bergamot and grapefruit, give off modernity. Aquatic hints add invigorating freshness. Enveloping notes of black pepper, papyrus wood and incense bestow masulinity, forming the fragrance's pulsating heart. The base is accentuated in a combination of seductive mineral musk, tonka beans, and saffron- recalling a man's individuality.    Olfactive family: Woody-Aromatic-Fougere  Fragrance Notes: Fig Leaves, Aquatic Notes, Patchouli Bio, Pyrogene Incence A fougère fragrance. product_name: VERSACE Yellow Diamond EDT 90 ml
description: A perfume which enchants with its Mediterranean refinement of sparkling Bergamot, Citron of Diamante, and noble Neroli, with the captivating addition of irresistible and attractive accents of Pear Sorbet. The heart celebrates an intense and glamourous femininity, which expresses itself with creamy and velvety facets of Jasmine petals and Osmanthus, together with precious notes of Orange Blossom and Freesia. The sensual and enveloping dry down is based on deep and vibrant tones of Amber Wood and Palo Santo, enriched by the voluptuous notes of Benzoin and sparkling and seductive Musk. Pure as sunlight, an extraordinary bright hue that radiates with a fiery intensity, sparkling the way that only a diamond can. Pure sensuality, transparency, light: a fresh and vivid floral perfume.    Olfactive family: Floral-Fruity-Woody  Top notes: Neroli, Bergamot, Amalfi Lemon, Pear  Heart notes: African Orange flower, Water Lily, Freesia, Mimosa  Base notes: Musk, Guaiac Wood, Amber A perfume which enchants with its Mediterranean refinement of sparkling Bergamot, Citron of Diamante, and noble Neroli, with the captivating addition of irresistible and attractive accents of Pear Sorbet. product_name: VERSACE Bright Crystal EDT 50 ml
description: ​ ​ Versace introduces this new Bright Crystal, a precious jewel of timeless elegant characterized by a fresh, vibrant, flowery scent. An enthralling and voluptuous fragrance, for a strong and confident women yet feminine, sensual and always glamourous, who loves to be enveloped in a fragrance that delicately reveals colorful and juicy pomegranate grains, iced freshness and shining Yuzu. The beauty of Magnolia, Peonia and Lotus Flower provides voluptuousness and transparency, while vegetal amber is delicately sensual and will delight the senses. product_name: VERSACE Eros Pour Femme EDP 100 ml
description: Eros Pour Femme EDP, the new fragrance from Versace, embodies strength, individuality and seduction. Attraction, desire, passion. Eros in a perfume. An alchemy of seductive, luminous and feminine notes. A refined accord of lemon and jasmine, enhanced with soft and sensual woods.     Attraction: Vibrant and precious, the Sicilian lemon and Calabrian bergamot draw attention with their brilliance. Delicious and inviting pomegranate seeds surprise and seduce.   Desire: The jasmine infusion and the Jasmine Sambac Absolute convey an authentic and timeless femininity. Peony petals lend a velvety touch, while the luminous lemon flower exalts the floral accord and recalls Versace's tradition and homeland.   Passion: Finally the ambrox is unveiled, mysterious and deep. It is accompanied by an accord of sensual woods, sandalwood and musk, revealing intense and enchanting notes.    Olfactive family: Floral-Woody-Musk  Fragrance Notes: Calabrian Bergamot, Sambac Jasmine, Jasmine Infusion, Sandalwood Eros Pour Femme EDP, the new fragrance from Versace, embodies strength, individuality and seduction. Olfactive family: Floral-Woody-Musk  Fragrance Notes: Calabrian Bergamot, Sambac Jasmine, Jasmine Infusion, Sandalwood

product_name: VERSACE Eros Pour Femme EDT 100 ml
description: A new addictive freshness. The primal power of a woman, captured in a radiant, sensual essence of strength, individuality and seduction. Eros Pour Femme Eau de Toilette offers a new sensual and addictive freshness based on the association of precious citrus notes—Sicilian lemon and mandarin—with crisp, fruity notes of raspberry and blackberry. A touch of calone creates the icy effect of a temping sorbet. Velvety floral petals of magnolia and jasmine confer femininity, while a touch of orange blossom adds intensity and character. The dry down offers notes of white woods, musk, and ambrox to convey elegance and add a sensual dimension.    Olfactive family: Floral-Fruity-Woody  Fragrance Notes: Raspberry Sorbet, White Currant, Jasmine Petals, White Patchouli A new addictive freshness. product_name: VERSACE Yellow Diamond EDT 50 ml
description: A perfume which enchants with its Mediterranean refinement of sparkling Bergamot, Citron of Diamante, and noble Neroli, with the captivating addition of irresistible and attractive accents of Pear Sorbet. The heart celebrates an intense and glamourous femininity, which expresses itself with creamy and velvety facets of Jasmine petals and Osmanthus, together with precious notes of Orange Blossom and Freesia. The sensual and enveloping dry down is based on deep and vibrant tones of Amber Wood and Palo Santo, enriched by the voluptuous notes of Benzoin and sparkling and seductive Musk. Pure as sunlight, an extraordinary bright hue that radiates with a fiery intensity, sparkling the way that only a diamond can. Pure sensuality, transparency, light: a fresh and vivid floral perfume. product_name: VERSACE Dylan Blue EDT 50 ml
description: A fougère fragrance. Highly distinctive with a fragrant woody aroma, Dylan Blue is full of character and individuality, an expression of a man's strength. Dylan Blue is the new fragrance that captivates the sensual scents of the Mediterranean. Woody notes of ambrox envoke tradition, while exquisite citrus-bergamot and grapefruit, give off modernity. Aquatic hints add invigorating freshness. Enveloping notes of black pepper, papyrus wood and incense bestow masulinity, forming the fragrance's pulsating heart. The base is accentuated in a combination of seductive mineral musk, tonka beans, and saffron- recalling a man's individuality.    Olfactive family: Woody-Aromatic-Fougere  Fragrance Notes: Fig Leaves, Aquatic Notes, Patchouli Bio, Pyrogene Incence A fougère fragrance. product_name: VERSACE Eros Pour Femme EDP 50 ml
description: Eros Pour Femme EDP, the new fragrance from Versace, embodies strength, individuality and seduction. Attraction, desire, passion. Eros in a perfume. An alchemy of seductive, luminous and feminine notes. A refined accord of lemon and jasmine, enhanced with soft and sensual woods.     Attraction: Vibrant and precious, the Sicilian lemon and Calabrian bergamot draw attention with their brilliance. Delicious and inviting pomegranate seeds surprise and seduce.   Desire: The jasmine infusion and the Jasmine Sambac Absolute convey an authentic and timeless femininity. Peony petals lend a velvety touch, while the luminous lemon flower exalts the floral accord and recalls Versace's tradition and homeland.   Passion: Finally the ambrox is unveiled, mysterious and deep. It is accompanied by an accord of sensual woods, sandalwood and musk, revealing intense and enchanting notes. product_name: VERSACE Bright Crystal Absolu EDP 90 ml
description: Versace introduces Bright Crystal Absolu, the intense version of one of the most beloved jewel-fragrances in the world, where the essence of Bright Crystal is enhanced to the extreme. Absolu is a floral and fruity fragrance with a musk note. The amazing vibrancy of yuzu immediately stands out between coloured and juicy pomegranate seeds creating an unusual freshness, pure and natural. The heart is enriched with inviting and velvety accents of raspberry, accented by the elegance of peony along with refined notes of magnolia and lotus flowers. Then a trail evokes an intense and voluptuous sensuality, with precious vegetal amber, deep acajou wood, bright and vibrant musk. product_name: URBAN DECAY All Nighter Waterproof Setting Powder - 7.5g
description: Urban Decay’s All Nighter Waterproof Setting Powder is like a magic wand in your makeup bag. This weightless powder instantly makes any foundation totally waterproof for a mattified complexion that lasts all day, no matter what. This high-tech formula blurs pores and imperfections and blocks shine, without dulling your inner glow. Your luminosity shows through while the powder keeps moisture out. No one should have to sacrifice a good look for fear of makeup meltdown. Cry, sweat, get wet—your makeup will stay waterproof and flawless for up to 11 hours. Your makeup will last through anything (so no need to worry about it—just live your life!). Simply buff the powder over your foundation for long-lasting, locked-in coverage. Then, finish the rest of your color routine—applying your blush and highlighter. Add extra staying power to your setting powder by spritzing on All Nighter Long Lasting Makeup Setting Spray. This feather-light formula is completely translucent, so it works on a wide range of skin tones and with any foundation. All Nighter Waterproof Setting Powder smoothes the appearance of skin, adds luminosity and extends the life of foundation, so there’s no need to reapply (even in hot climates!). Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free. Urban Decay’s All Nighter Waterproof Setting Powder is like a magic wand in your makeup bag. product_name: URBAN DECAY All Nighter Long Lasting Makeup Setting Spray - 118 ml
description: Is makeup meltdown ruining your midnight mojo? Mist on this weightless spray to give your makeup serious staying power. Urban Decay’s All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray keeps your makeup looking gorgeously just-applied for up to 16 hours—without melting, fading or settling into fine lines.    Developed in an exclusive partnership with SKINDINÄVIA, UD’s groundbreaking, tested formula is suitable for all skin types and features patented Temperature Control Technology. Yep, this baby actually lowers the temperature of your makeup to keep foundation, eyeshadow, blush and concealer in place—even in hot and humid or cold and windy conditions. The result? Smoother-looking skin and vibrant makeup that lasts all day (or all night).    In a 7-day clinical study:    • 78% of participants said All Nighter helped their makeup last for 16 hours.  • Over 80% said their makeup not only looked better, it stayed on better (even in the T-zone) without settling into fine lines.  • Whether they had combination, oily or dry skin, 88% or more said All Nighter was the best product to help their makeup last.    All Nighter's sleek, modern packaging hints at the high-tech formula inside. The white box features a gorgeous, sophisticated watercolor design in deep purple with coordinating type, and the soft-touch bottle has a color-coordinated cap. Unlike similar products on the market, the sprayer delivers a microfine mist that goes on so light, you'll hardly feel it—and once you've applied it, you won't even know it’s there. If you've tried other setting sprays that feel sticky or tight on your skin, you'll be AMAZED by how different this is. Beware of imitations! Is makeup meltdown ruining your midnight mojo? product_name: WELCARE Surgical Face Mask  50pcs - Green
description: Face Mask Welcare 3Ply Surgical mask is made of high-quality, breathable non-woven fabric, which is placed in three layers to ensure excellent filter function to protect the wearer from Bacteria, Virus and Particles of less than 0.3 micron. Welcare 3PLY surgical mask is tested and certified by a number of leading institutes such as Nelson Laboratories, USA and Thai Industrial Standards (TISI Certification). It is widely used in the leading Hospital Group such as BDMS group.   - BFE or Bacteria filtration efficiency Most of the standards are at 95% (meets the medical surgical mask industry standard). Welcare is the first manufacturer in Thailand to use BFE> 99% standard (Nelson Laboratories, USA).  - PFE or Particle filtration efficiency measured at 0.1 microns, Welcare's filter layer contains PFE > 99%, tested by Nelson Laboratories, USA  - VFE or Viral Filtration Efficiency determines how well the mask can filter virus-containing droplets about 3 microns in size. Welcare Mask can filter 98% of virus-containing droplets it is exposed to.  - Fluid Resistance measures the ability of a mask’s material construction to minimize fluids from traveling through the materials. The higher the fluid resistance, the better the protection.  - The Delta P Flow Rate demonstrates the breathability and air flow through materials. Welcare mask indicates the Delta P of 4mmH2O/cm2. The less of the number, the better the air flow. (Easy to breath)  - Soft Spandex ear straps made of soft spandex with high-flexibility. It helps the wearer feel comfortable and hurtless  - Welcare is the first and only brand that has passed both Nelson Laboratories USA and Thai Industrial Standards (TIS).   Instructions 1. Wash your hand before touching face mask 2. Ensure the Welcare logo faces outwards (Dedicate the front side). 3. Put the mask to cover your nose and chin. 4. Secure the soft spandex ear loop over your ears. 5. Pinch the nose wire to the shape of your nose. 6. Do not touch the mask while using it. If do so, wash your hands. product_name: หน้ากากอนามัย WELCARE Mask Level 2 Medical Series 50 ชิ้น - สีขาว
description: ​ ​ หน้ากากอนามัย 3 ชั้น ใช้ครั้งเดียว มาตรฐาน มอก.2424-2562 การป้องกันระดับที่ 2 ใช้งานทางด้านการแพทย์ทั่วไป ระดับที่ 2 สำหรับใช้ทางการแพทย์ในหน่วยฉุกเฉิน ทันตกรรม การรักษาแผลขนาดเล็ก หรือการรักษาที่อาจพบการกระเด็นหรือสัมผัสละอองฝอยของสารคัดหลั่งหรือเลือดเพียงเล็กน้อยถึงปานกลาง ***เทียบเท่ามาตรฐานอเมริกา ASTM F2100-11 Level 2 (ASTM F2100 Requirement for medical Face Mask) ประสิทธิภาพการป้องกัน - BFE ≥ 99% ความสามารถในการกรองละอองแบคทีเรีย (Bacterial Filtration Efficiency) มากกว่าหรือเท่ากับ 99% - VFE ≥ 99% ความสามารถในการกรองระอองไวรัส (Viral Filtration Efficiency) มากกว่าหรือเท่ากับ 99% - PFE (0.1 µm) ≥ 99% ความสามารถในการกรองละอองอนุภาค (Particle Filtration Efficiency) ที่ขนาด 0.1 ไมครอน ซึ่งมีขนาดเล็กกว่า PM 2.5 ถึง 25 เท่า มากกว่าหรือเท่ากับ 99% - P < 5 mmH2O / cm2 ค่าความต้านทานในการไหลของอากาศผ่านหน้ากากอนามัย (Differential Pressure Air on either side of Mask) แสดงถึงความสะดวกในการหายใจ ซึ่งมีค่าน้อยกว่า 5 mmH2O / cm2 ยิ่งค่าต่ำยิ่งหายใจง่าย Fluid Resistance 120 mmHg ความสามารถในการป้องกันการซึมผ่านของเลือดเทียม (Synthetic Blood Resistance) ที่ความดัน 120 mmHg *** คือความดันหลอดเลือดแดง*** ความสามารถในการทนต่อการลามไฟ ระดับที่ 1 เป็นระดับที่ดีที่สุด เผาไหม้ช้าและเกิดเปลวไฟในระยะไม่ไกล Soft Spandex Ear-loop (Latex free)สายคล้องหูถักทอแบบพิเศษ ความยืดหยุ่นสูง น้ำหนักเบา ลดการรัดตึง และการแพ้หรือระคายเคือง เนื่องจากไม่มีส่วนผสมของยางธรรมชาติ สิขสิทธิ์เฉพาะ Welcare ข้อแตกต่างจาก Level 1 : หน้ากาก มอก. ระดับ 2 รูปทรงจีบแบบโอเมก้า สายคล้องหูสีน้ำเงิน ​ ​ หน้ากากอนามัย 3 ชั้น ใช้ครั้งเดียว มาตรฐาน มอก.2424-2562 การป้องกันระดับที่ 2 ใช้งานทางด้านการแพทย์ทั่วไป ระดับที่ 2 สำหรับใช้ทางการแพทย์ในหน่วยฉุกเฉิน ทันตกรรม การรักษาแผลขนาดเล็ก หรือการรักษาที่อาจพบการกระเด็นหรือสัมผัสละอองฝอยของสารคัดหลั่งหรือเลือดเพียงเล็กน้อยถึงปานกลาง ***เทียบเท่ามาตรฐานอเมริกา ASTM F2100-11 Level 2 (ASTM F2100 Requirement for medical Face Mask) ประสิทธิภาพการป้องกัน - product_name: TISSOT Chemin des Tourelles T1392071104800 Watch - 34 mm
description: What’s in a name? The Chemin des Tourelles takes its name from the street that leads to Tissot's home in the Swiss mountains, where we’ve been crafting beautiful watches since 1853. It’s our icon, an ultra-sophisticated wristwatch. Note its smooth round case and gently domed sapphire crystal, two symbols of ageless modernity. product_name: TISSOT Diver Seastar T1206071744100 Watch - 46 mm
description: Wherever you go and whatever adventure you find yourself on, you’ll find balance with the Seastar 2000 Professional Powermatic 80 on your wrist. This is a highly technical, assertive watch that’s brimming with easy confidence, whether you take it deep into the urban jungle, or hundreds of metres below the surface of the sea. With its chic, stylish profile, it’s a versatile piece you can wear everyday. But with its muscular architecture, up to 60bar (600m / 2000ft) of water resistance and ISO 6425 (2018) diver’s watch certification, it’s the tool watch you can rely on when you need it most, too. Specifications include a uni-directional rotating bezel with a ceramic bezel insert, a screw-down crown, an automatic helium escape valve and a water-proof black rubber and blue fabric strap. A black or gradient blue to black dial with a wave motif is the symbol of its impeccable underwater credentials. So just where will you go? product_name: TISSOT Seastar 1000 Powermatic 80 40 mm - Grey/Yellow Gold
description: This updated edition of one of Tissot's main collections now introduces a 40mm casing option with the Powermatic 80 at its heart. For this new release, the casing has undergone a subtle transformation, incorporating a notch along its case edges, resulting in a more compact and sophisticated appearance. These timepieces are perfect for those in search of a sporty yet assertive accessory, offering water resistance up to 1000 feet (300 meters) and improved visibility in dim conditions thanks to the Super-LumiNova® coated hands and hour markers. This release features five distinct models, varying in dial colors and finishes from stainless steel to bi-color combinations, including unique blue to black gradients and exclusive black PVD-coated options. Each variant delivers a unique aesthetic while maintaining the collection's signature sporty yet bold appeal. product_name: TISSOT T-Race Chronograph 45 mm - Silver
description: This year it comes back with a new design that now features a more elegant dial – giving the watch a purer look – but still respecting its sporty roots. Like biking, Tissot is where passion meets innovation and style. The T-Race collection is inspired by that lifestyle and – freedom, the open road, and passion: it is the gentleman biker’s watch of choice. The T-Race family keeps the earer immersed in the mechanical environment, and constantly evokes its spirit. For example, there is a brake disc and calibre on the bezel, the pushes are inspired by handlebars, and engine cooling fins are depicted on the side of case. It is water resistant, with a Quartz chronograph movement, and distinct hour and minute hands coated with SuperlumiNova. Tissot has taken inspiration from their collaboration to produce watches that reflect the dynamic natures of bikes themselves and the emotion of the sport. product_name: TISSOT T-Race Motogp™ Automatic Chronograph 2024 Limited Edition 45 mm
description: The thrills of MotoGPTM and the passion of Tissot cannot be separated. Celebrating a quarter-century as the championship's official timekeeper and honouring the 75-year legacy of MotoGP™, Tissot introduces this distinct T-Race MotoGP™ timepiece to honour the well-oiled partnership and those important milestones. One eye on the clock, the other on the road. Adorned in a distinct palette of blue and red, this watch features design cues like brake discs, handlebar-inspired pushes, and engine cooling fins. The automatic Valjoux model has a black PVD bezel and a semi-transparent dial, revealing some of the intricate mechanisms. This watch is water resistant and has hour and minute hands coated with Super-LumiNova®, clarity and great readability in all circumstances. This watch comes packaged in a mini helmet, ideal for aficionados who are looking for something that represents their love for their favourite sport. product_name: TEA TIME HEALTHY TEA GIFT SET (3 CANS)
description: Tea Time product philosophy aligns completely to King Bhumibol’s Sufficiency Economy  framework, where the product make-ups and the production process help bring about economic well-being and sustainability across local communities. product_name: TISSOT T-Race Motogp™ Chronograph 2024 Limited Edition 45 mm
description: The thrills of MotoGPTM and the passion of Tissot cannot be separated. Celebrating a quarter-century as the championship's official timekeeper and honouring the 75-year legacy of MotoGP™, Tissot introduces this distinct T-Race MotoGP™ timepiece to honour the well-oiled partnership and those important milestones. One eye on the clock, the other on the road. Adorned in a distinct palette of blue and red, this watch features design cues like brake discs, handlebar-inspired pushes, and engine cooling fins. The automatic Valjoux model has a black PVD bezel and a semi-transparent dial, revealing some of the intricate mechanisms. This watch is water resistant and has hour and minute hands coated with Super-LumiNova®, clarity and great readability in all circumstances. This watch comes packaged in a mini helmet, ideal for aficionados who are looking for something that represents their love for their favourite sport. product_name: THAI AREE PAD THAI MEAL KIT 200 G.
description: A taste from our own home:  Thai Aree proudly presents our Pad Thai Meal Kit using our homemade Pad Thai sauce recipe which was developed 80 years ago by our grandmother, Sa-ngiem Pienlert.   Our grandmother created this original recipe of Pad Thai sauce for our family to use within our own household. She combined quality ingredients including fine fish sauce, natural sugar, tamarind sauce which had been carefully filtered and shallot from garden. It was the start of this delicious homemade Pad Thai Sauce recipe, which we are bringing to you from our own home. product_name: THAI AREE Thai Massaman Curry Paste 80g
description: How to prepare: 1. Add coconut milk (200 g) and water (50 g) to a sauce pot and bring to boil. 2. Add meat of your choices (150 g) a dice of potatoes (50 g) a dice of carrots (50 g) and mix well until cooked. Close the lid. 3. Add Thai Massaman Curry Paste (80 g) to the pot and mix well until boil. 4. Add slices of onions (100 g) to the pot. 5. Add peanuts (30 g) mix well. Close the lid to avoid evaporation. 6. Boil with low heat until cooked (about 5 minutes) or continue cooking until soup is concentrated to your preference. Ingredients: Coconut Sugar 20%, Tamarind Paste 14%, Sugar 14%, Garlic 7.6%, Spices 7.1%, Shallot 6.8%, Galangal 6.5%, Fish Sauce 3% How to prepare: 1. product_name: THAI AREE THAI LEMONGRASS CHICKEN MARINADE 60 G.
description: How to Cook 1. Prepare chicken meat. Or other meats (300g) 2. Use 5 tablespoons of marinated sauce (60g) to mix and marinate for 15 minutes. 3. Bring the marinated meat to grill in the oven at 180 C for 15-20 minutes. Alternatively,  you can use grill in flat pan with low heat, add on a little oil and always flip while grilling. 4. Place nicely cooked meat on dish and enjoy your good meal. Information for food allergy: Contains ingredients from fish and coconut How to Cook 1. Prepare chicken meat. Or other meats (300g) 2. Alternatively,  you can use grill in flat pan with low heat, add on a little oil and always flip while grilling. 4. Place nicely cooked meat on dish and enjoy your good meal. product_name: THAI AREE Thai Tom Yum Paste 80g
description: How to prepare: 1. Boil water (400 g) in medium pot until boil. 2. Add shrimp or meat of your choice (150 g) and mushroom (50 g) into boiling water, until cooked. 3. Add Tom Yum Paste (80 g) mix well. 4. Pour Tom Yum soup into the serving bowl. 5. Garnish with Coriander, Kaffir Lime leaf, Lime or Lemon juice and Chilli to your preference then ready to serve. Remark : If thick soup preferred, add coconut milk (30 g) after put Tom Yum paste (No.3) as an alternatives. Ingredients: Sugar 35%, Fresh Spices (Shallot, Galangal, Lemongrass, Kaffir Lime Leaf, Chilli) 32%, Soybean Oil 12%, Non Iodized Salt 11%, Tamarind Paste 5% How to prepare: 1. product_name: THAI RICHY Raw Lychee Flower Honey 150 ml (215g)
description: Thai Richy Raw Honey derived from flowers nectar in fruit orchards. Flapping of bee's wing in reduced moisture naturally. No heat process during harvest of honey. Naturally sweet, floral scented and golden tan appearance. - Lychee Flower Honey : Both Longan and Lychee flowers contain high volumes nectars and flower pollens prior fruiting. Similarly the bee's hives are placed in Lychee orchards during flowering season in Northern Thailand.                               *1 millilitre of honey is approximately equal to 1.44 grams (net weight of honey may vary with honey's moisture). Honey is denser than water, if moisture in honey increases, the density in honey will otherwise decrease. How to calculate: 215 grams of honey divided by 1.44 is equal to 150 milliliters Thai Richy Raw Honey derived from flowers nectar in fruit orchards. product_name: SISLEY Phyto Poudre Libre Rose d'Orient # 3
description: Phyto-Poudre Libre is an airy powder that's exceptionally fine and light as a veil. It creates a perfecting halo that gives incomparable radiance and sets make-up. It glides over the face like a second skin for a perfectly natural result and imperceptible make-up. Completely translucent, Phyto-Poudre Libre unifies and mattifies the complexion, smoothing and visually refining the skin texture. Enriched with natural skincare active ingredients (Hibiscus flower extract, Linden Blossom extract and Mallow extract), it preserves the skin's hydration and suppleness giving a sensation of comfort all day long. Tested under dermatological conditions, it is suitable for all skin types, even the most sensitive. Advantages: an exceptional quality velvet powder puff for ultra-fine application and a round, elegant and practical box with mirror.  Usage Tips: Apply using the powder puff with a light tapping over the entire face, concentrating on the T zone. Remove excess powder with a brush if necessary.  For lighter coverage, apply with a brush only. May be used over a foundation to improve its hold or on its own to smooth, lighten and give a matte finish. product_name: SISLEY Hydra Global Serum 30ml
description: Hydra-Global serum is a fundamental daily step in reinforcing the skin’s power of auto-hydration.  This serum has 3 unique features helping to  boost the skin’s intensive natural hydration :  1. THE SKIN’S POWER OF AUTO-HYDRATION  A powerful hydration-booster, it acts on the 3 key stages of the water cycle by using the power of active ingredients of natural origins.  • It increases water reserves,  thanks to yeast extracts of Blue Agave from Mexico and Carob seeds, it increases the quantity of Hyaluronic acid.  The hydro-cushion is plumped up.  Thanks to Japanese Cedar bud extract, it helps trap and retain water, thus restoring suppleness to the skin.  • It promotes water circulation in the epidermis,  thanks to Wild Pansy extract, it reactivates the water-carrying capacity within cells,  that in turn quenching the skin.  • It lastingly retains water in the skin. Iris extract protects newly formed Hyaluronic acid, while Edelweiss extract increases impermeability at the surface*. Filled with water, the skin appears bouncier.  Rehydrated from within, the skin is more beautiful and ready to withstand the hands of time.  2. THE PLEASURE OF A WATERY TEXTURE AND AN ENERGIZING FRAGRANCE  A fresh, delicate and light texture that leaves a bare-skin sensation. Instantly absorbed, it allows daily skin care to be applied immediately.  The olfactory signature of the Hydra-Global range: the essential oils of Sage, Lavender and Marjoram naturally fragrance the serum.  3. NUMEROUS POSSIBLE USES TAILORED FOR YOUR NEEDS  • An ideal addition to all skin care products: it completes the care, bringing intense hydration to every level of the skin  • As part of the expert moisturizing duo: daily use of this skin care product ,combined with the serum optimizes the skin's moisturizing performance.  30 ml     Hydra-Global serum is a fundamental daily step in reinforcing the skin’s power of auto-hydration. product_name: SISLEY Velvet Nourishing Cream With Saffron Flowers 50ml
description: The Velvet Nourishing Cream with Saffron flowers that would boost your skin's efficiency while pleasuring for your comfort. Skincare without compromise that has 3 actions for visibly more beautiful skin: 1. THE POWER TO MAKE THE SKIN MORE RESISTANT This skin care product works day and night, providing double targeted action.  - During the day, Buckwheat seed extract protects this vulnerable skin from oxidation. - At night, Shea butter repairs and fortifies skin. Protected during the day and repaired at night, skin is more resistant. 2. product_name: SISLEY Le Phyto-Rouge 22 Rose Paris
description: Le Phyto Rouge is a care lipstick with an ultra-silky texture that envelops the lips with a fine, smoothing, contouring and hydrating film. Thanks to the "Hydrobooster Complex" composed of microspheres of Hyaluronic Acid and Konjac Glucomannans, lips are  immediately plumped up, voluptuous and smoothed.  With repeated applications, Le Phyto Rouge preserves the youthfulness of lips : a cocktail of enhancing oils provides nutrition, suppleness and elasticity. Day after day, lips are more suple, softer, more elastic.   Its new-generation gel texture blends into the lips upon contact like a fluid and provides a sensation of incomparable, lasting comfort.  A combination of ultra-pure pigments provides an immediate color impact and an ultra-luminous finish.  Available in a palette of 20 radiant shades, from the most natural nudes to the most vibrant shades, adapted to all skin tones.  Its zebra-striped, magnetic case, both elegant and modern, contains a faceted bullet for fine and precise application. product_name: SISLEY Sisleÿa L'Intégral Anti-Âge Anti-Wrinkle Concentrated Serum
description: Wrinkles symbolize our journey through life and our experiences. Caused by a variety of factors, they can be attributed to age and facial expressions, as well as to the environment and busy lifestyles. After the launch of Sisleÿa L'Intégral Anti-Âge, Sisley Research is going even further in its innovation and going back to the very origin of behavioral aging by launching Sisleÿa L’Intégral Anti-Âge Anti-Wrinkle Concentrated Serum for visibly smoother skin that radiates youthfulness. DOUBLE INNOVATION FROM SISLEY to act against all types of wrinkles:  1. "Awakening" the skin’s anti-wrinkle potential Natural aging and lifestyle damage collagen production, responsible for the smooth appearance of the skin surface. Cacao Porcelana extract, a new Sisley active ingredient, very rich in polyphenols acts to awaken and boost the skin’s anti-wrinkle potential. Wrinkles and fine lines are reduced. 2.
