product_name: SISLEY All Day All Year - 50 ml
description: During the daytime, our skin uses its energy to protect itself. All Day All Year is the perfect day care product, supporting the skin by acting as a global protective shield. It protects the skin while activating its self-defense* mechanisms to keep the skin looking younger for longer. When designing All Day All Year, Sisley’s Laboratories studied the internal and environmental factors to which we are exposed over our lives. These factors are grouped together under the scientific term exposome, which encompasses solar radiation, pollution and cigarette smoke in particular. They are responsible for 80% of skin aging. The complex and highly concentrated formula of All Day All Year protects the skin from aggressors that cause premature aging and enhance its self-defense* power thanks to two complementary physical and biological shields. The physical shield provides comprehensive protection on the surface of the skin:  - against UVA and UVB rays all day long*, by means of its encapsulated filters that do not penetrate the skin**/***.  - against pollutants to limit their penetration into the skin***. Within the skin, the biological shield stimulates its natural defenses by : - strengthening the skin barrier. - activating the skin’s self-defense* capabilities to limit the harmful effects of pollutants*** and UV rays*. - providing an anti-aging action. A global shield that immediately protects the skin at the surface, reinforces its resistance and stimulates its natural power*. Its comfortable and melt-in texture leaves a silky, non-shiny finish on the skin and allows make-up to be applied soon after application. Its glass bottle has been designed to be recyclable, in particular through a removable pump and the use of glass compatible with recycling technologies. The skin’s defense power is strengthened*. * in vitro test* in vitro test - ** more than 99% of the filters remain on the skin’s surface - *** ex vivo test During the daytime, our skin uses its energy to protect itself. product_name: SISLEY Supremÿa The Supreme Anti-Aging Skin Care Lotion - 140 ml
description: During the day, while the skin uses all of its energy fighting and protecting itself against external stress factors, it is at night, when the skin is sheltered from stress, that the natural skin repair processes are activated. Night-time is thus the optimal time for skin regeneration to effectively fight against the visible signs of aging. It is the understanding of this cutaneous chronobiology that is at the origin of the expertise of Supremÿa Collection. The Supreme Anti-Aging Skin Care Lotion is the prelude to the Supremÿa at Night ritual to ideally prepare the skin at the surface and improve its receptiveness to subsequent regenerating skin care products. An essential and highly sensory step to awaken the power of night, with three actions: Intensely moisturizes A combination of moisturizing key ingredients ideally prepares the skin for the skin care ritual to encourage optimal absorption of the subsequent ingredients. The skin is intensely moisturized, more supple, softer and silkier. Stimulates and tones The Supreme Anti-Aging Skin Care Lotion improves skin's receptiveness to the benefits of the Supremÿa skin care. The skin is revitalized and toned. Activates the nocturnal mechanisms Infuses the skin with key anti-aging ingredients to activate the nocturnal mechanisms and therefore initiate the regenerating power of the Supremÿa at Night ritual. The face is visibly refreshed and rested, the skin appears regenerated. Innovative and ultra-sensory, its precious texture creates a sensation of freshness and transforms into a comfortable, enveloping veil when massaged in. Non-greasy, silky and soft, The Supreme Anti-Aging Skin Care Lotion leaves an imperceptible velvety finish on the skin's surface. The subtle signature floral notes of Supremÿa—Damask Rose, Magnolia and Geranium—offer an olfactory bouquet for a moment of absolute well-being. The glass bottle was designed to be recyclable. product_name: SISLEY L'Eau Rêvée d'Alma - 100 ml
description: Dreams inspire our creativity, they nourish us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées express this imaginary place where inspirations collide, join together and become one – the inspirations of different generations of the d’Ornano family, the creators of Sisley. This collection is made up of six mixed fragrances, olfactory odes with a perfect, ambivalent nature. AN IRIS BETWEEN WATER AND ICE If it was a picture on the wall, L'Eau Rêvée d’Alma would be a French countryside brimming with reeds, rivers and ponds. It has the silky clear depths of fresh waters, it’s like a crystalline song that grasps and awakens you. A blend of delicate aquatic iris and frosty cardamom, L'Eau Rêvée d'Alma is a crystalline and joyful fragrance. Designed in collaboration with two artists, Elżbieta Radziwiłł et Bronisław Krzysztof, L'Eau Rêvée d'Alma transports us to the world of dreams imbued with lightness. Canson paper case and glass bottle made in France. Case and bottle are recyclable. Dreams inspire our creativity, they nourish us with images, memories and sensations. product_name: SISLEY L'Eau Rêvée d'Ikar - 100 ml
description: Dreams inspire our creativity, they nourish us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées express this imaginary place where inspirations collide, join together and become one – the inspirations of different generations of the d’Ornano family, the creators of Sisley. This collection is made up of six mixed fragrances, olfactory odes with a perfect, ambivalent nature. AN INSIDE OUT LENTISK “The fairest of the stars became his doom,” wrote the poet Phillippe Desportes in one of his beautiful evocations of the myth of Icarus. Free and adventurous, L'Eau Rêvée d’Ikar (named after Icarus) in turn takes inspiration from the radiant sun, freshness and proud landscapes of Corsica, one of the places the d’Ornano family call home. The essence of green lentisk, an airy resinous shrub, is combined with an earthy vetiver revealing warm, unexpected facets. A powerful and seductive fragrance. Designed in collaboration with two artists, Elżbieta Radziwiłł et Bronisław Krzysztof, L'Eau Rêvée d'Ikar transports us to the world of freedom-filled dreams.Canson paper case and glass bottle made in France. product_name: SOFFELL Mosquito Repellent Liquid Spray Floral Fragrance (4x80ml)
description: Soffell works by giving out chemicals (DEET) that are unwanted by the mosquitoes. They hide the sweat and scatter the biological range of mosquitoes. It makes the effect of carbon dioxide negligible thus helping you stay away from these flying beasts.Soffell protects the body from mosquito bites with protection that effectively lasts for approximately 8 hours. How to use: Spray or apply Soffell on legs, arms, or neck Warning: Do not eat, do not use the product with children under 4 years old, do not substitute the product with regular lotions, only use it for protecting from mosquitoes, do not apply the product in sensitive areas such as eyes, lip, eye lids, and wounds. product_name: SIAMAYA 70% Dark Chocolate 75 g
description: We make our signature 70% dark chocolate with cacao beans grown in northern Thailand. Our 70% captures a wonderful red berry, cherry note present in our Thai cacao thanks to the careful farming and a unique fermentation process used by our producers. Experience the unique terror of northern Thailand cacao in our signature 70% dark chocolate bar. Tasting notes - Red berry, cherry, wine Pairs with - Red wine with cherry or berry undertones like Pinot Noir or Merlot - Shot of espresso or cup of fresh roasted coffee - With cured meats and hard cheeses Our commitment to our cacao We buy our beans directly from Cocoa Nakorn Lampang Community Social Enterprise and other farmers in the region. We know our chocolate is only as good as our cacao beans, so we prioritize healthy soil, sustainable farming, and happy farmers. Together, these compounds play vital roles in antioxidant and vision functions. Our Jackfruits are harvested from and being processed under tight control of GMP, HAACP and BRC standard.

product_name: RITUALS The Ritual of Jing Body Scrub - 300 g
description: Treat yourself to the most relaxing exfoliation experience ever with this new body scrub from The Ritual of Jing. This 92% natural origin salt scrub contains magnesium and a rich blend of oils to thoroughly remove dead skin cells and hydrate the skin. Magnesium is well known for its anti-stress properties and can help maintain your skin’s balance and keep it in good physical condition. The salt scrub stimulates skin cell renewal, helps even out your skin tone and allows creams and oils applied afterwards to penetrate deeper into the skin. Massage into your skin with circular movements and breathe in the relaxing fragrance of sacred lotus and jujube. Finish up your routine with The Ritual of Jing dry oil or body cream. This scrub with 92% ingredients of natural origin is carefully curated to benefit your skin optimally. The remaining 8% are clean & conscious lab-made ingredients which support the integrity and safety of our formulations. How to use: Massage the body scrub into damp skin. Rinse off with warm water. product_name: SEIKO Prospex “Save The Ocean” Special Edition Automatic Diver’S 200M. Srpg57K
description: Seiko Save The Ocean returns with the Special Edition, the seventh edition in the series. Featuring Antarctica, the world's largest maritime sanctuary and a unique landscape of sky, rock and ice, that reflect the unique colors. As a result, this special edition diver's watch uses a gradation technique on the dial. Using blue and white which replicates its inspiration from the white of snow and the color of the sky reflecting the enchanting glaciers of the Antarctic color on the wearer's wrist. A special design highlight in this new model is the surface that played with streaks of snow patterned by the wind. Add an imaginative twist with the footprints of penguins passing by in the snow on the dial. To remind and commemorate the beauty of nature and its habitat also remind that if we do not help to maintain the environment in balance. In the future, we may not be able to see the footprints of all Antarctic living animals. product_name: SEIKO Storm Thailand Limited Edition Model : SRPK51K
description: SRPK51K monster design inspiration from STORM, comes with black body, the inspiration from darkness of the sky during storms. The dial is using a special technique to create a surface similar to how the clouds are forming until it became a fierce and strong storm that ready to destroy everything in the path. Enhance the distinctiveness of the dial with the bezel. There are two-tone minute scale shown on 12 – 4 o’clock as blue, contrast with the black case and a strap. Decorated with a sub-window indicating the day and date at the 3 o'clock position. LumiBright coating is applied in minute hand, hour hand, and second-hand. Comes with special Black IP coated stainless-steel band, making this storm even more beautiful and elegant, while the crown and case back coating rose gold color. product_name: SEIKO Retro Color Collection2 Special Edition Model SRPK65K
description: Seiko’s rally divers – such as the early 1969 Seiko 6119-8300 Sport diver here – were a popular series of 70 meter sport divers made by the Japanese manufacture in the late 1960s and early 1970s. Easily discernible, the rally divers obtained their nickname from the distinctive checkered pattern on its bezel inserts, which resembled a checkered racing flag. The Seiko rally series began with the 6106 models, followed shortly thereafter by the 6119s, with a overlap in production between both. Colors in the dial, Retro Color Collection2 inspired from watches in the 60s period “checkered flag” model, bringing back to tell a new story through the popular SKX Series design. product_name: SEIKO Zimbe 19 : The Last Zimbe! Thailand Limited Edition Model SPB443J
description: The inspiration for the final whale shark of this collection does not come from travels or adventures. Instead, it comes from the "spots on the whale shark's body," which are unique. Each whale shark has a different pattern of spots on its body. Come with a First Diver's design, case sea-blue dial, adorned with the dark blue pattern of a whale shark's skin, it replicates the image of the white spots on a whale shark as it dives deep into the ocean, giving the sense that this journey is coming to a beautiful end. Adding to its special features, the watch includes a bright blue second hand, the same shade as the dial. The bezel of the watch case is designed in dark blue, contrasting beautifully with the dial and enhancing its perfect prominence. Completing the package is a light gray watch box, matching the tone of a whale shark's skin, exclusively produced for this model. It comes with an additional outer wrapping made from recycled dark gray paper, featuring a pattern of whale shark skin engraved onto the surface, reflecting the texture of these majestic travelers. Even though the journey of Zimbe comes to an end, the spirit of conservation in the Save The Ocean project must continue endlessly. It comes with an additional outer wrapping made from recycled dark gray paper, featuring a pattern of whale shark skin engraved onto the surface, reflecting the texture of these majestic travelers. Even though the journey of Zimbe comes to an end, the spirit of conservation in the Save The Ocean project must continue endlessly. product_name: SCENTIO MILK PLUS WHITENING Q10 BODY LOTION 400ml
description: Whitening Body Lotion is full of readily absorbed bioactive milk protein extract and Co-Enzyme Q10, a naturally-occurring skin revitalizer. While milk protein extract conditions and lightens your skin tone, the key component, Co-Enzyme Q10, helps defend against skin aging, provides energy, and protects skin cells from damage caused by environmental factors such as exposure to sunlight. Co-Enzyme Q10 prevents the free radical that is 50 times more powerful than vitamin E. After a short time of use, skin becomes brighter, more even, softer, and more refined. How to use: Smooth into skin as often as needed. Continuous applications will prevent over-dry skin from recurring. Tasting notes: - Aromatic spices, cinnamon, caramel Pairs with: - Spiced rum or  spiced rum and Coke cocktail - Holiday drinks like eggnog or mulled wine - After Indian curries Our commitment to our cacao: We buy our beans directly from Cocoa Nakorn Lampang Community Social Enterprise and other farmers in the region. We know our chocolate is only as good as our cacao beans, so we prioritize healthy soil, sustainable farming, and happy farmers. Our support of local cacao producers helps ensure the future and growth of cacao farming in northern Thailand. product_name: SERGE LUTENS Parole D´Eau Eau De Parfum - 100 ml
description: ​ ​ A moment of serenity, a return to roots to reconnect with the essential through the new Matin Lutens collection. "Colourless and odourless by definition, yet an eau can conceal a deep and discreet fragrance..." An original, modern composition which puts an end to the myth of odourless water. A fragrance which embodies a return to true deep waters. An immersion in pure water. A ritual to combine with the Matin Lutens cleansing gels for a long-lasting scent. Matin Lutens, a line whose understated aesthetics and purity evoke the simplicity of a ritual focussed on morning essentials: water, bath and... a little spritz of perfume. Natural ingredients, colours that reflect a return to serenity, perfectly in keeping with the organic vibe of this collection’s olfactory creations, Matin Lutens promises a long-awaited return to your roots: a peaceful morning wake-up! ​ ​ A moment of serenity, a return to roots to reconnect with the essential through the new Matin Lutens collection. product_name: SERGE LUTENS Santal Majuscule Eau De Parfum - 50 ml
description: ​ ​ Sandalwood with a capital S. When Lutens was young, he always marked the importance of particular things, periods and places which fascinated him by writing them with a capital letter. From this childhood obsession is born an enlightened Middle Ages. "Sandalwood written in capital letters, full scale and life sized! Oboedi silentiis meis non imperii: “Do not obey my orders, obey my silence”. Turning powdery under the influence of bitter cacao, the sandalwood plunges deep into a velvety trap."Serge Lutens ​ ​ Sandalwood with a capital S. product_name: RABANNE Invictus Victory Extreme Eau de Parfum - 50 ml
description: The atmosphere is electric. Defeat is not an option. Reach for the sky and achieve your aims. Push your limits to the extreme. Accept any challenge and win hands down. Strong and beguiling, nothing can stop it. Revealed: a new and extremely powerful fresh amber scent by RABANNE. The birth of an addiction to Victory and its accompanying perfume. product_name: POLA B.A MILK N 80 ml.
description: B.A MILK N The rich oil melts into the skin, producing firm skin that is soft and plump with moisture. - The dense, rich MILK softens on the skin to permeate into the stratum corneum. product_name: PRADA Luna Rossa Carbon Eau de Toilette - 50 ml
description: Prada Luna Rossa Carbon is grounded in the earth and nature, but its mineral freshness also belongs to the world of the factory and industrial innovation. Its strong mineral presence plays against the essence of bright, fresh water. It refracts its raw, organic elements through the lens of industry. Its contemporary nature is everything: Carbon is the base of every organic form on the planet – dazzling or dark, diamond or graphite. Prada Luna Rossa Carbon is forged as much as blended – stronger than the most robust rock, but with the freshness of air. Prada Luna Rossa Carbon is an iconoclastic fougere fragrance that brings together steam-distilled botanicals and synthetics in a mix that is full of energy. It is a meticulous fragrance blend  ​ ​ : the green citrus of Vert de Bergamote from Italy, the radiant woody notes of patchouli and the dry amber of ambroxan. It is citrus and pepper, soft and verdant, wet soil and rock. Lavender is at the heart of all the Luna Rossa fragrances – its classic metallic notes used in a radical, modern way. product_name: PRADA Infusion de Rose Eau de Parfum - 100 ml
description: ​ ​ Each Infusion is a poetic interpretation of a single, emblematic natural ingredient. The scents reinterpret ancient perfumery techniques and reinvent the natural in forms that feel entirely modern, clear, and precise. The experience is one of déjà-vu, an olfactory flirtation with the past that looks boldly to the future. Infusion de Rose is a sublime and luxurious scent inspired by apparent contradictions. Imagine garden roses of ancient variety, highly scented, infusing in a perfumed water of Neroli, Mandarin and Galbanum. This is the Rose's very essence. *Minimum 3-year shelf life if unopened ​ ​ Each Infusion is a poetic interpretation of a single, emblematic natural ingredient. product_name: PRADA Paradoxe EDP - 50 ml
description: Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum, the new iconic signature by Prada. This feminine floral fragrance is an invitation to explore and express the paradoxical multi-dimensions of women. The celebration of being never the same, always yourself. A floral ambery fragrance that embraces the paradoxes of iconic ingredients to reveal new scented sensations. Reinventing freshness with the first Neroli bud extraction for PRADA, to capture the flower’s fresh dimension. Reinventing sensuality with AmbrofixTM, a bio-converted amber, revealing a vibrant warmth. Reinventing intensity through a new revolutionary musk molecule: the SerenolideTM, for an intense yet subtle and comfortable trail noticeable right from the top. Encapsulating the very essence of Prada, the Paradoxe refillable bottle reinvents the most iconic code of the brand: its triangle logo. Tilted yet powerfully grounded, the radical shape of the bottle is softened by rounded angles, while the delicate coral pink color of the fragrance contrasts with the deep black cap and Prada coat of arms. product_name: PRADA Paradoxe Virtual Flower Eau de Parfum - 50 ml
description: CHALLENGING PERCEPTIONS True to its creative and innovative spirit, Prada expands the boundaries of sensory perception and challenges the understanding of reality. Prada Paradoxe Virtual Flower embodies this search for the avant-garde as the epitome of a Prada Paradoxe femininity that questions traditional expectations. By rethinking florality, one of the most famous symbols of femininity, Paradoxe women reinterpret classical attributes to challenge traditions. AUGMENTED CREATIVITY Paradoxe Virtual Flower is a floral musky signature challenging the boundaries of sensory perception. To open a new perspective on florality, our master perfumers Nadège Le Garlantezec, Shyamala Maisondieu and Antoine Maisondieu chose one of the most sophisticated flowers in perfumery and wanted to express it like never before: Jasmine. They leveraged the power of Artificial Intelligence to create a unique Prada accord capturing the scent of the flower in nature. Top notes of Italian Vert de Bergamot that undergoes a specific cold expression process and molecular distillation to reveal the greenest and freshest facets of this iconic ingredient. Heart notes of Neroli and a Jasmine AI accord born from Artificial Intelligence, to perfectly express the airy and lively scent of Jasmine in nature. Base notes of SerenolideTM Musk and Ambrette, to create a clean and comforting second-skin sensation. Base notes of SerenolideTM Musk and Ambrette, to create a clean and comforting second-skin sensation.

product_name: Pranali Reed Diffuser Jasmine 100ml
description: Create a perfect refreshing, relaxing atmosphere for any room or workplace with Pranali Reed Diffuser. An ideal alternative to traditional scented candle as it is flameless and the scent dispersed from the diffuser could last up to 3 months in a single use. With its stylish design, it can easily be an additional decorative item to your room.  Jasmine: A wonderful sweet scent of a jasmine bouquet fills the air with a wonderful subtle sweet scent to calm your mind, relax your mood, and create a pleasant atmosphere. Direction:  1. Immerse reed sticks into the bottle and wait for a few minutes for the aromatic oil to be absorbed. Then flip the dry end of the round reed sticks into the bottle instead. 2. The pleasant aroma from soaked up reeds will disperse naturally. 3. Whenever the scent is fading, simply flip the dry end of the reeds in the bottle, exposing the wet ends to the air. If the reeds have permanently stopped diffusing (due to clogging with dust for example), replace them with new set of reeds. 4. Perfectly suitable for an area of 15-20 square meters. For a larger space, place additional Pranali Reed Diffuser in different location to scent up the entire area. product_name: RADO Centrix Collection Model No. R30019732
description: The classic Centrix Automatic Diamonds watch has been reworked not only technically, but also aesthetically. The modified model has a rounded sapphire crystal that extends all the way to the edge and a curved case blending with the curved crystal edge. The overall appearance of this iconic timepiece is completed with adjusted case lugs and a bracelet made of polished rose-gold-coloured PVD-coated stainless steel with brown high-tech ceramic middle links. The brown facetted dial has an opulent 3D effect created by stamping a shaped dial and then filling it with lacquer. Inside, the three-hand calibre R582 movement exceeds standard accuracy test requirements from 3 to 5 positions, thanks to its antimagnetic Nivachron™ hairspring for increased reliability and accuracy. The watch is water resistant down to 50 m and offers 48 hours of power reserve. product_name: RALPH LAUREN Earth Antilles Vetiver EDT - 100 ml
description: Polo Earth Antilles Vetiver is a vegan and 97% natural origin* fragrance for all genders that celebrates the beauty of nature. Supporting a cooperative of 200 vetiver producers from three villages and harvested completely by hand, our Vetiver Heart from Haiti is sourced sustainably and is Certified Fair for Life*. At the core of Antilles Vetiver Eau de Toilette, the iconic dark and smokey facets of Vetiver Heart are softened by Vanilla Bourbon. Juxtaposed with the bold citrus tones of Green Mandarin and the spicy florality of Lysylang, the fragrance unfolds to reveal a brilliant, sparkling Vetiver. The result, a refined fragrance that captures the naturally earthy essence of Antilles Vetiver. Antilles Vetiver includes 7 sustainably-sourced ingredients: Vetiver Heart, Bergamot Heart, Green Mandarin, Neroli, Vanilla Bourbon, Sage Heart and Lavandin Heart. *Certified Fair for Life means we respect human rights and fair working conditions. We respect ecosystems and the promotion of biodiversity and the sustainable agricultural practices of local communities. product_name: RALPH LAUREN Polo Earth EDT - 100 ml
description: ​ ​ Polo Earth is a gender-free, 97% natural-origin* fragrance celebrating the beauty of nature, with 7 ingredients sourced sustainably from local communities around the world (Bergamot Heart, Diva Lavender, Green Mandarin, Turkish Rose, Sage Heart, Haitian Vetiver and Bourbon Geranium). product_name: RALPH LAUREN Earth Moroccan Neroli EDT - 100 ml
description: Polo Earth Moroccan Neroli is a vegan and 97% natural-origin* fragrance for all genders that celebrates the beauty of nature. Our Neroli is derived from orange trees grown in the Northern regions of Morocco. Local communities hand-pick the blooming flowers, while leaving the buds to support future harvests. Great care is taken to enhance continued growth and fruit production for years to come. The harvesting, culture and distillation process of Neroli helps provide a reliable source of income for many in the region. Moroccan Neroli Eau de Toilette captures the very essence of Neroli in all its floral and aromatic intensity. The freshness of Neroli blossoms when paired with sparkling Bergamot Heart, and Green Mandarin is balanced with the aromatic note of Lavender. Ambrette adds an elegant, woody-ambery touch that strikes the perfect harmony between naturality and sophistication. Moroccan Neroli Eau de Toilette includes 8 sustainably-sourced ingredients: Ambrette, Bergamot Heart, Bourbon Geranium Heart, Diva Lavender Heart, Vetiver Heart, Sage Heart, Green Mandarin and Neroli Polo Earth Moroccan Neroli is a vegan and 97% natural-origin* fragrance for all genders that celebrates the beauty of nature. product_name: RALPH LAUREN Earth Provencial Sage EDT - 100 ml
description: Polo Earth Provencial Sage is a vegan and 97% natural origin* fragrance for all genders that celebrates the beauty of nature. It has been created as a tribute to the rich heritage and lush botanical gardens of Provence in the south of France, an area known as the birthplace of perfumery. Harvested by members of local communities, our sustainably-sourced Sage Heart supports the economy in the region and the mission of farmers to improve and reduce their environmental impact. Naturally herbaceous with an aromatic intensity from its signature Sage Heart note, this Eau de Toilette sparkles with the fresh, floral and fruity extravagance of Bergamot Heart and Green Mandarin. Nuanced with rich, woody tones of Vetiver and Sandalwood, Provencial Sage leaves a lasting impression of a fresh and luminous elegance. Provencial Sage Eau de Toilette includes 7 sustainably-sourced ingredients: Bergamot Heart, Green Mandarin, Vetiver Heart, Sage Heart, Lavandin Heart, Diva Lavender and Bourbon Geranium Heart. Narciso Rodriguez’s signature heart of musk pulsates throughout the fragrance, whilst fresh threads of green citrus and spicy pepper tie up the smokey base of woods and glowing amber for a seductive dry down.

product_name: PAÑPURI Indochine Ambience Diffuser 100 ml
description: A citrus blend of the iconic Thai Lemongrass, inspired by Indochina, helps allieviates mental fatigue and revitalizes the spirit to feelings of invigoration. Top Note : Lemongrass, Mandarin, May Chang Heart Note :  Organic Lavender, Neroli Base Note : Sandalwood Scent Profile : Citrus Description :  Enigmatic fragrances of natural, pure essential oils are housed in timeless glass vessels. The Reed Diffusers are designed to perfume your space, transforming it into an olfactive world of cherished dreams and imaginations. Scent :  Tropical, vibrant, balancing. This signature citrus blend, redolent of Indochina and its sundry traditions, reveals the iconic Thai Lemongrass central to Thai cuisine and wellness traditions, enhanced by revitalizing peels of Mandarin to promote an equilibrium of the senses, resulting in an exhilaratingly fresh experience. How to use :  Fill 1/2 of the PAÑPURI diffuser glass vessel with the diffuser oil and immerse reed sticks in the glass vessel. Reverse sticks two to three times to saturate and diffuse scent. Reverse sticks again to re-absorb diffuser oil when scent start to dissipate. Do not re-use reed sticks with other fragrances. product_name: PAÑPURI One Night In Bangkok Ambience Sachet 40 g
description: PAÑPURI Ambience Sachet is thoughtfully designed to enhance your well-being and elevate your senses, bringing a touch of tranquility to your space Scent Profile : Floral Description :  The PAÑPURI Ambience Sachet is designed promote your wellness and elevate your senses. Infused with natural essential oils, this exquisite sachet leaves a pleasant fragrance and adds luxury to your space, while soothing your mind, body and spirit. Perfect for use in any space, from your home to your office or car. Simply place it in a closet, hang it in a car, or tuck it in a suitcase for a lingering fragrance that lasts for up to 3 months. Scent :  In this corner of Bangkok is a town alive with tradition. Flower stalls line the street, the heady sensual scent of Tuberose rises above the din of aroma. The spicy kick of Black Pepper adds a touch of newness to this iconic flower, making it an unforgettable fragrance spent in a hidden garden of Bangkok. How to use :  Tear open the foil bag to take the aromatic sachet inside. Put the aromatic sachet inside the decorated fabric pouch. Hang the ambience sachet in any desired area to allow the fragrance to slowly diffuse. When the scent fades, shake the sachet to stimulate the oil dispersion inside. For optimal use, hang it in a space no larger than 4 square meters. Avoid placing it in direct sunlight, heat or windy areas. product_name: PAÑPURI Memoria Mimosa Extract Perfume Oil 50 ml
description: An ancient art of perfumery. An answer to modern fragrance. PAÑPURI weaves together precious raw ingredients, rich with olfactive heritage, to preserve the enigmatic beauty of the Perfume Oil and create a new expression of scent that goes beyond modern perfumery.   Top Note : Cardamom, Neroli Heart Note : Mimosa Absolute Base Note : Tonka Bean, Vanilla Absolute Scent Profile : Floral Decription : The PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil is a return to the ancient culture of perfumery, innovated for modern sensorial expression. The highly concentrated fragrance is non-irritating and long-lasting, derived from precious raw materials and blended with the antioxidant-rich, skin-nourishing Certified Organic Moringa Seed Oil, a carrier oil found in ancient Ayurvedic wellness traditions. The iconic multidimensional bottle mimicks a Thai pagoda from ancient Siam, embodying the spiritual journey of each PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil to nurture the mind, body and soul. Scent : Golden sunshine brightens the powdery sweetness of Mimosa blossoms. A nostalgic warmth radiates from within as the precious spice Cardamom adds warmth and wonder to the youthful, floral bouquet, awakening the mind with daydreams of a cherished past. How to use : Apply liberally to pulse points and glide gently onto skin as heat from pulse points activates the perfume – on your wrist, inside your elbow, behind your knee, behind your ears, and at the bottom of your throat. To enhance longevity, moisturize with the Body & Hand Lotion of the same scent before applying the Perfume Oil. Ensure oil is absorbed before coming into contact with delicate fabrics. product_name: PAÑPURI Sacred Lotus Leaf Electric Diffuser
description: In the delicate balance between dawn and dusk, where moonlight's tender touch awakens nature's embrace, the Sacred Lotus Leaf Electric Diffuser emerges as a sensory sonnet. Drawing inspiration from the ethereal form of the Sacred Lotus Leaf, it captures the essence of tranquil mornings and whispered evenings. As morning's first light graces the horizon, the Diffuser unfurls its fragrant mist—a ritual that harmonizes modernity with the embrace of nature. With each whisper of aroma, a symphony of serenity unfolds, inviting you to immerse in the gentle elegance of quiet reflections and timeless beauty. Effortlessly blending into your home, it becomes both a decorative cornerstone and a sensory oasis. How to use:  Remove the top cover and add water to the water tank until it reaches the RED maximum water marker. Avoid adding water beyond the RED maximum water marker to ensure the proper functioning of the device. Add 7-10 drops of your favorite PAÑPURI essential oils into the water tank. Reattach the top cover, ensuring proper alignment with the base. Plug the power adaptor into a power outlet. Press the mist button once to start the Diffuser; the default time is 2 hours. Press the mist button a second time for a 4-hour scent dispersion. Press the mist button a third time for an 8-hour intermittent scent dispersion (5 minutes on and 5 minutes off). Press the mist button for the fourth time to switch off the Diffuser. Cautions: Avoid adding water beyond the RED maximum water marker to ensure the proper functioning of the device. Please thoroughly read the user's manual before use to prevent improper usage that could damage or deteriorate the Diffuser. product_name: PAÑPURI Sacred Santal Ambience Diffuser 450 ml
description: A woody blend of Sandalwood and Orris Root inspired by the burning of Sandalwood in ancient holy temples, grounding and pacifying the soul. Top Note : Japanese Cypress, Cardamom Heart Note : Orris Root, Juniper Berry Base Note : Sandalwood, Amber, Cedarwood, Oakmoss, Vetiver Scent Profile : Woody Description :  Enigmatic fragrances of natural, pure essential oils are housed in timeless glass vessels. The Reed Diffusers are designed to perfume your space, transforming it into an olfactive world of cherished dreams and imaginations. product_name: PAÑPURI Sacred Santal Extract Perfume Oil 50 ml
description: An ancient art of perfumery. An answer to modern fragrance. PAÑPURI weaves together precious raw ingredients, rich with olfactive heritage, to preserve the enigmatic beauty of the Perfume Oil and create a new expression of scent that goes beyond modern perfumery. Top Note : Japanese Cypress, Cardamom Heart Note : Orris Root, Juniper Berry Base Note : Sandalwood, Amber, Cedarwood, Oakmoss, Vetiver Scent Profile : Woody Decription : The PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil is a return to the ancient culture of perfumery, innovated for modern sensorial expression. The highly concentrated fragrance is non-irritating and long-lasting, derived from precious raw materials and blended with the antioxidant-rich, skin-nourishing Certified Organic Moringa Seed Oil, a carrier oil found in ancient Ayurvedic wellness traditions. The iconic multidimensional bottle mimicks a Thai pagoda from ancient Siam, embodying the spiritual journey of each PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil to nurture the mind, body and soul. Scent : The soul of sacred Indian forests echo with the warmth of Sandalwood burning in holy temples, evoking the richness of ancient meditative rituals. An unforgettable fragrance, its woody notes are enhanced by the earthy smoothness of Orris Root that when blended with the rare Sandalwood grounds the soul on a spiritual pilgrimage across Asia. How to use : Apply liberally to pulse points and glide gently onto skin as heat from pulse points activates the perfume – on your wrist, inside your elbow, behind your knee, behind your ears, and at the bottom of your throat. To enhance longevity, moisturize with the Body & Hand Lotion of the same scent before applying the Perfume Oil. Ensure oil is absorbed before coming into contact with delicate fabrics. product_name: PAÑPURI Sacred Santal Ambience Sachet Refill 40 g x 2
description: PAÑPURI Ambience Sachet is thoughtfully designed to enhance your well-being and elevate your senses, bringing a touch of tranquility to your space Scent Profile : Woody Description : The PAÑPURI Ambience Sachet is designed promote your wellness and elevate your senses. Infused with natural essential oils, this exquisite sachet leaves a pleasant fragrance and adds luxury to your space, while soothing your mind, body and spirit. Perfect for use in any space, from your home to your office or car. Simply place it in a closet, hang it in a car, or tuck it in a suitcase for a lingering fragrance that lasts for up to 3 months. Scent : The soul of sacred Indian forests echo with the warmth of Sandalwood burning in holy temples, evoking the richness of ancient meditative rituals. An unforgettable fragrance, its woody notes are enhanced by the earthy smoothness of Orris Root that when blended with the rare Sandalwood grounds the soul on a spiritual pilgrimage across Asia. How to use :  Tear open the foil bag to take the aromatic sachet inside. Put the aromatic sachet inside the decorated fabric pouch. Hang the ambience sachet in any desired area to allow the fragrance to slowly diffuse. When the scent fades, shake the sachet to stimulate the oil dispersion inside. For optimal use, hang it in a space no larger than 4 square meters. Avoid placing it in direct sunlight, heat or windy areas. product_name: PAÑPURI Siamese Water Ambience Diffuser 100 ml
description: A floral blend featuring the Thai Jasmine, this fragrance evokes age-old traditions to uplift and calm the senses, while relieving stress. Top Note : Mint Heart Note : Thai Jasmine, Ylang Ylang Base Note : Sandalwood Scent Profile : Floral Description :  Enigmatic fragrances of natural, pure essential oils are housed in timeless glass vessels. The Reed Diffusers are designed to perfume your space, transforming it into an olfactive world of cherished dreams and imaginations. Scent :  A PAÑPURI signature blend beguiles with its exotic floral notes, harkening back to the scent of jasmine steeped in ceramic jars of rainwater, an ancient Siamese tradition to refresh the senses. Imbued atop the honey-colored Thai Jasmine is the bracing sharpness of Mint to delicately weave together a rich and uplifting fragrance. Reverse sticks again to re-absorb diffuser oil when scent start to dissipate. Do not re-use reed sticks with other fragrances. product_name: PAÑPURI Heaven Moon Osmanthus Ambience Candle - 250 g
description: The golden essence of Osmanthus Absolute shimmers in the air, whispering legends of moonlit soirees. Jasmine blooms, their delicate fragrance a mesmerizing dance. A touch of Vetiver grounds the experience, leaving a trace of the moon's magic in your wake. Top Note : Petitgrain Heart Note : Lily of the valley, Osmanthus Absolute, Jasmine Sambac Base Note : Musk, Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Vetiver Scent Profile : Floral Description : Inspired by exotic voyages and private journeys, the PAÑPURI Ambience Candle reinterprets and heightens recollections of bygone times deeply ingrained in memories. Each experience inspiring, every second unforgettable. Fire-blown and hand-polished, the PAÑPURI glass candle is a vessel of artisanal spirit. Sustainably-sourced, hand-poured natural soy and vegetable wax blend is paired with a self-trimming, lead-free cotton wick that prevents smoke, turning each PAÑPURI Ambience Candle into a sensorial masterpiece for all cherished occasions and spaces. Scent :  Bathed in the ethereal glow of Heaven Moon Osmanthus, a celestial tale unfolds. The golden elixir of Osmanthus Absolute whispers the legend of the Jade Emperor's ascent. Jasmine blooms, moonlit dancers twirling in the air, capture the magic of a celestial soirée. Vetiver grounds the scent, an earthly reminder of the journey from the Moon Palace. An olfactory odyssey—a fragrant dance under the moon's tender gaze, where aromatic tales harmonize, and the essence of a mythical evening lingers in each delicate note. How to use :  Trim wick to 1/4"" before every lighting to prevent smoke and residue. Always burn the candle until the entire surface melts to avoid tunneling. Recommend burning candle for two to four hours for optimal use. Extinguish candle with care and re-center the wick after extinguishing the flame while the wax is still liquefied to ensure even burning for subsequent use. Keep the candle in a cool, dry place away from dust, avoiding direct sunlight. CAUTION: Keep lit candle away from drafts, windows and flammable materials. Always place lit candle on a heat-resistant surface. Do not move candle while burning or while wax is still hot. Never extinguish candle with water. Keep out of reach of children or pets. product_name: PAÑPURI Heaven Moon Osmanthus Extract Perfume Oil - 10 ml
description: An ancient art of perfumery. An answer to modern fragrance. PAÑPURI weaves together precious raw ingredients, rich with olfactive heritage, to preserve the enigmatic beauty of the Perfume Oil and create a new expression of scent that goes beyond modern perfumery. Top Note : Petitgrain (Bitter Orange) Heart Note : Lily of the Valley, Osmanthus Absolute, Jasmine Sambac Base Note : Musk, Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Vetiver Scent Profile : Floral Description : The PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil is a return to the ancient culture of perfumery, innovated for modern sensorial expression. The highly concentrated fragrance is non-irritating and long-lasting, derived from precious raw materials and blended with the antioxidant-rich, skin-nourishing Certified Organic Moringa Seed Oil, a carrier oil found in ancient Ayurvedic wellness traditions. The iconic multidimensional bottle mimicks a Thai pagoda from ancient Siam, embodying the spiritual journey of each PAÑPURI EXTRACT Perfume Oil to nurture the mind, body and soul. product_name: PAÑPURI Inner Glow Peptide Lip Rejuvenation Oil Osmanthus Glow - 5 ml
description: This peptide-rich lip oil delivers intense hydration and noticeable plumping, leaving lips looking luxuriously full and radiant. Light-reflecting shimmers add a touch of natural glow, while Osmanthus infuses a hint of sweet fragrance. Skin Types : All skin types Description : Peptide visibly plumps lips and deeply hydrates, reducing the look of fine lines, while healing dry, chapped lips and restoring gentle softness. Further blended with healing Argan Oil, this rejuvenating formula hydrates, plumps, and revitalizes for healthier, fuller-looking lips all day long. product_name: PAÑPURI Inner Glow Peptide Lip Rejuvenation Scrub - 15 ml
description: Gentle yet effective, this lip scrub unveils a new level of smoothness for your lips. It polishes away dry, flaky skin with a blend of, peptide, Thai Sangyod Rice, and berry. Skin Types : All skin types Description : Peptide visibly plumps lips and deeply hydrates, reducing the look of fine lines, while healing dry, chapped lips and restoring gentle softness. Restore softer, smoother lips with this concentrated vegan lip scrub. Gently exfoliating and melting away rough, dry lips, it leaves the lips with a fresher, healthier look. product_name: PAÑPURI Distant Shores Body & Hair Nourishing Dry Oil - 250 ml
description: This rich yet fast-absorbing body oil is intensely nourishing, imparting skin and hair with softness and a lingering fragrance that uplifts the soul. Skin Types: Aromatic Drescription:  Certified Organic Moringa Oil, cold-pressed from the seeds of the Moringa tree, is known as one of the best anti-aging oils due to its rich omega fatty acids, vitamins and antioxidants. It heals and hydrates dry skin, while minimizing the appearance of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles, imparting a soft, youthful glow to the skin. This rich yet fast-absorbing body oil is intensely nourishing due to its special formulation of fatty acids and antioxidant-rich plant-based oils: Certified Organic Moringa, Certified Organic Virgin Coconut, and Neem. The miracle blend works in unison with Vitamin E to provide long-lasting hydration, while nurturing the skin to feel softer and more radiant, imparting skin and hair with softness and a lingering fragrance that uplifts the soul. Scent:  Warm, comforting, soothing. Reminiscent of distant shores, lush coastal hills and fields of newly opened blossoms imbuing the senses with calm and composure, this delicate veil of Geranium relaxes and unwinds the mind. Fused with a delectable billow of Australian Eucalyptus, this blend relaxes and soothes the soul with its fresh and aromatic scent. How to use:  Apply liberally all over body on dry skin as an after-bath moisturizer; or apply as a massage oil by warming the oil in between palms before massaging. From feet up to neckline, knead in upward, circular motions to increase circulation and detoxification. Additionally, apply a small amount to the tips of dry, damaged hair to lightly perfume hair and restore healthy, lustrous locks. product_name: PAÑPURI Eternal Sunshine Extract Perfume Oil - 10 ml
description: Eternal Sunshine Extract Perfume Oil, the first oil-based perfume from PAÑPURI, has won the Editors' Choices award for The Shining Star of Thai Brands at the HELLO! Beauty Awards 2023. An ancient art of perfumery. An answer to modern fragrance. PAÑPURI weaves together precious raw ingredients, rich with olfactive heritage, to preserve the enigmatic beauty of the Perfume Oil and create a new expression of scent that goes beyond modern perfumery. Top Note: Lime Zest, Bergamot, Mandarin Heart Note: Sweet Basil, Lemon Basil Base Note: Vetiver, Patchouli Scent Profile: Citrus Decription: The PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil is a return to the ancient culture of perfumery, innovated for modern sensorial expression. The highly concentrated fragrance is non-irritating and long-lasting, derived from precious raw materials and blended with the antioxidant-rich, skin-nourishing Certified Organic Moringa Seed Oil, a carrier oil found in ancient Ayurvedic wellness traditions. The iconic multidimensional bottle mimicks a Thai pagoda from ancient Siam, embodying the spiritual journey of each PAÑPURI Extract Perfume Oil to nurture the mind, body and soul. Scent: Dawn paints thousands of pagodas in resplendent gold, transforming the plains of Bagan into a mythical realm. The crisp, citrus aroma of Lime Zest rises above the pagodas in synergy with the rising sun, while herbal, spicy notes of Thai Basil embrace the heart to inspire within an eagerness and joy for the coming day. How to use: Apply liberally to pulse points and glide gently onto skin as heat from pulse points activates the perfume – on your wrist, inside your elbow, behind your knee, behind your ears, and at the bottom of your throat. To enhance longevity, moisturize with the Body & Hand Lotion of the same scent before applying the Perfume Oil. Ensure oil is absorbed before coming into contact with delicate fabrics. product_name: PAÑPURI Indochine Body & Hair Nourishing Dry Oil - 250 ml
description: This rich yet fast-absorbing body oil is intensely nourishing, imparting skin and hair with softness and a lingering fragrance that uplifts the soul. Skin Types: Citrus Drescription:  Certified Organic Moringa Oil, cold-pressed from the seeds of the Moringa tree, is known as one of the best anti-aging oils due to its rich omega fatty acids, vitamins and antioxidants. It heals and hydrates dry skin, while minimizing the appearance of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles, imparting a soft, youthful glow to the skin. This rich yet fast-absorbing body oil is intensely nourishing due to its special formulation of fatty acids and antioxidant-rich plant-based oils: Certified Organic Moringa, Certified Organic Virgin Coconut, and Neem. The miracle blend works in unison with Vitamin E to provide long-lasting hydration, while nurturing the skin to feel softer and more radiant, imparting skin and hair with softness and a lingering fragrance that uplifts the soul. Scent:  Tropical, vibrant, balancing. This signature citrus blend, redolent of Indochina and its sundry traditions, reveals the iconic Thai Lemongrass central to Thai cuisine and wellness traditions, enhanced by revitalizing peels of Mandarin to promote an equilibrium of the senses, resulting in an exhilaratingly fresh experience. How to use:  Apply liberally all over body on dry skin as an after-bath moisturizer; or apply as a massage oil by warming the oil in between palms before massaging. From feet up to neckline, knead in upward, circular motions to increase circulation and detoxification. Additionally, apply a small amount to the tips of dry, damaged hair to lightly perfume hair and restore healthy, lustrous locks. product_name: PAÑPURI Memoria Mimosa Hand Concentrated Cream - 50 ml
description: A rich, hydrating hand concentrated cream that contains nurturing botanical emollients and healing Centella Asiatica to keep hard-working hands soft and lightly scented without any greasiness. Skin Types: Floral Description:  The antioxidant-rich, skin-nourishing Certified Organic Moringa Seed Oil is an oil found in ancient Ayurvedic wellness traditions. Rich in fatty acids, and Omega 6 and 9, it soothes and hydrates skin and nails throughout the day. It can support the skin barrier, aid in wound healing, and even delay signs of aging. A rich, hydrating hand concentrated cream that contains nurturing botanical emollients and healing Centella Asiatica to keep hard-working hands soft and lightly scented without any greasiness. Scent:  Golden sunshine brightens the powdery sweetness of Mimosa blossoms. A nostalgic warmth radiates from within as the precious spice Cardamom adds warmth and wonder to the youthful, floral bouquet, awakening the mind with daydreams of a cherished past. How to use: Apply to clean hands, nails and cuticles as often as desired, especially after washing hands. product_name: PAÑPURI One Night In Bangkok Blended Essential Oil - 10 ml
description: A floral blend of Tuberose and Black Pepper, inspired by Bangkok's oldest flower market, evoke an intense and sweet scent that stimulates, enhances and warms the soul. Top Note: Bergamot, Eucalyptus Heart Note: Jasmine Sambac, Tuberose, Ylang Ylang, Neroli Base Note: Black Pepper, Clove, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood Scent Profile: Floral Description: PAÑPURI Essential Oils are multisensorial elixirs derived from the raw natural healing properties of aromatic ingredients. Each essential oil is meticulously formulated for mental, physical and spiritual well-being. Scent: In this corner of Bangkok is a town alive with tradition. Flower stalls line the street, the heady sensual scent of Tuberose rises above the din. The spicy kick of Black Pepper adds newness, making it an unforgettable fragrance. How to use: Add 4-8 drops of desired essential oil in the water of a PAÑPURI Oil Burner or Aroma Diffuser. Let its scent transform your space into a serene olfactory world. product_name: ORIGINS Ginzing™ Glow Boosting Serum 30 ml
description: This multi-action serum visibly brightens dull skin in one shot. Infused with Vitamin C plus a 5% Skin-Renewing Complex, the formula noticeably smooths skin and reduces the look of pores over time. Our 5% Skin-Renewing Complex with Green Coffee Seed helps support skin’s natural enzymatic action to boost cell turnover for smoother skin texture and less visible pores. Infused with potent Vitamin C, this fast-acting formula visibly brightens dull-looking skin in one use, while Hyaluronic Acid plumps skin with hydration. With our carefully-calibrated serum, the radiance is real. How to use: Apply AM & PM on clean skin. If you experience brief tingling or minor sloughing, don’t be concerned—this is normal:- Our 5% Retexturizing Complex gently resurfaces skin and gives cell turnover a jumpstart. As the product activates on skin, you may experience minor sloughing upon application; superficial dead skin cells are combining with the product and being lifted off to unveil smoother, brighter skin. -  To minimize sloughing, gently pat (don’t rub) serum into skin. - Wait until skin is dry and serum is fully absorbed before applying moisturizer; if sloughing does occur, simply sweep away with fingertips. If irritation occurs, limit frequency of use and if it persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Avoid eye area. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after. product_name: ORIGINS Plantscription™ Wrinkle Correction Eye Cream with Encapsulated Retinol 15 ml
description: The power of Retinol, now gentle enough for eyes. This ultra-hydrating, plumping eye cream has Encapsulated Retinol to noticeably improve the look of fine under eye lines, crow’s feet, and frown lines while the velvety-soft formula instantly melts into skin and smooths the delicate eye area.This treatment helps rejuvenate eyes with an innovative combination of Fibrillin-supporting Anogeissus and Encapsulated Retinol. Why “encapsulated”? It helps preserve Retinol’s stability and potency. The formula minimizes the look of lines and wrinkles while it hydrates and smooths it’s an eye win-win. Testers saw a -17% visible reduction in the length of crow’s feet*.  *Clinical testing conducted by third party on 32 Chinese women, Fitzpatrick II-IV, ages 37 - 65, after using product twice daily for 13 weeks. Effect varies by individual. How to use: Gently pat in a small amount on crow’s feet, between the brows, and under eye. For the first 2 weeks, start using 3x/week at night and increase to 2x/day as skin builds tolerance. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using it. You may experience mild dryness or flaking skin. These conditions are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working. Avoid getting in eyes.Tip: A little goes a long way, so use half a pea-sized amount or less. The formula is designed to melt into skin on contact for effortless application. product_name: ORIS Hank Aaron Limited Edition
description: ORIS celebrates the great humanitarian and baseball Hall-of-Famer Hank Aaron with a limited-edition Big Crown Pointer Date created and named in his honour. Hank Aaron was one of the greats in Major League Baseball (MLB) history. Throughout his career, he encountered racism on and off the field, yet rose above it with grace and dignity to become a symbol of perseverance and strength through adversity, and an agent of social change. The watch is based on ORIS’s signature design, the Big Crown Pointer Date, with touches that point to the great man and his record-breaking career. The colour palette of blue, red and white is inspired by Hank Aaron’s famous baseball uniform. The case back is engraved with a motif of Hank Aaron and his famous cross-handed batting stance, another thing that set him apart in the world of baseball. product_name: ORIS X Bracenet 43.50 mm
description: The ORIS X Bracenet 43.50 mm watch features a unique dial made from melted fishing nets, sourced from Bracenet. Bracenet focuses on the dangers of ‘ghost nets’— lost fishing nets that harm marine life. With up to a million tonnes entering oceans annually, these nets pose a long-term threat. Each dial is unique due to the random process. The result is an ocean-inspired dial, a daily reminder of your contribution to ocean conservation. product_name: ORIS ProPilot X Kermit Edition
description: ORIS watches, like the ProPilot X Kermit Edition, aim to bring joy. We collaborated with Disney's Kermit the Frog for a watch with a frog green dial. Beyond its cheerful exterior, it's a high-performance titanium ProPilot X, powered by our Calibre 400. To encourage slowing down, we initiated ‘Kermit Day’ on the first of every month. Kermit appears in the watch’s date window as a reminder to chill out. Just for a day. Find some joy. Find a smile. It’s the Kermit way. ProPilot X Kermit Edition features our Calibre 400. This automatic has a five-day power reserve, high accuracy, anti-magnetism, and superior reliability. With 10-year service intervals and a 10-year warranty, when you sign up to MyOris. That’s ‘The New Standard’.
